name: Amaretto Colada
ingredients: 30 ml Amaretto; 30 ml Coconut Cream; 90 ml Pineapple Juice; 1 Pineapple Slice
description: Mix ingredients in a blender with crushed ice until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish with pineapple slice and serve.

name: Abbey Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 37 1/2 ml Orange Juice; 2 dashes Orange Bitters;Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Stir well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

name: 50 – 50
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 50 ml Dry Vermouth; 1 Olive
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the olive.

name: Alibi
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 25 ml Ginger Simple Syrup; squeeze of Fresh Lime; Soda Water
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice.Top up with a splash of soda water.

name: Alcoholic Dr.Pepper
ingredients: 250 ml Beer; 250 ml Cola; 25 ml Amaretto
description: Pour the beer in first, then the cola on top. Drop the shot glass of Amaretto in, when it hits the bottom of the glass, drink.

name: Algonquin
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Rye Whiskey; 20 ml Dry Vermouth; 20 ml Pineapple Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well for 20 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Alexander
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 25 ml Crème de Cacao; 25 ml Half & Half; grated Nutmeg
description: Mix in a cocktail shaker with ice for 10 – 15 seconds. Pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: Abaci Batida
ingredients: 50 ml Cachaca; 75 ml Pineapple Juice;12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup
description: Build in rocks glass, add all the ingredients, add lots of crushed ice and churn with a bar spoon for 20 seconds.

name: Accomplice
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; Champagne; 3 Strawberries;
description: Muddle 2 strawberries in a Boston Mixing Glass. Add vodka, simple syrup and lemon juice. Fill with ice and shake for 10 seconds. Double strain into a chilled martini glass. Top-up with Champagne and garnish the glass with a strawberry.

name: Adios M.F
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml  Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Rum; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao
description: Pour all ingredients, except the lemon-lime soda, into a chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Top with the lemon – lime soda and stir gently.

name: Admiral Benbow
ingredients: 50 ml Plymouth Gin;  25 ml Dry Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with several ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass with ice. Garnish with maracschino cherry.

name: Admiral Perry
ingredients: 50 ml Pear Vodka; 25 ml Cinnamon Schnapps; 25 ml Dry Vermouth; 5 ml White Crème de Cacao; Pear Slice
description: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass and stir with ice until chilled. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with slice of pear.

name: 20th  Century
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 20 ml  Lillet Blanc; 20 ml Crème de Cacao; 20 ml Fresh Lemon Juice
description: Shake ingredients in an iced cocktail shaker, and strain into a  chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Amarula and Eve
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml  Amarula Cream; 12 1/2 ml Citrus Vodka; 65 ml  Lychee Juice; 20 ml  Ruby Red Grapefruit Juice; Lychee Fruit
description: Combine all ingredients in a shaker glass filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a coup glass. Garnish with lychee fruit on the rim.

name: Angel Delight
ingredients: 20 ml Triple Sec; 20 ml Gin; 25 ml Cream; 2 dashes Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes.  Shake well for 15 seconds.  Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: American Collins
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Premium Gin; 20 ml Simple Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 4 Bing Cherries; 8 Blueberries; Soda Water; Lemon Wheel
description: In a Collins glass, muddle the blueberries and the cherries in the lemon juice and simple syrup. Add premium gin and ice and stir briefly.Top up with Soda water. Garnish with a lemon wheel and bing cherry.

name: Anani Punch
ingredients: 50 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml Orange Juice;12 1/2 ml Pineapple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Passion Fruit Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly for 20 seconds and strain into a rocks glass.

name: Americano
ingredients: 25 ml Campari; 25 ml Sweet Vermouth; dash of Soda Water; Lemon Peel
description: Begin by topping up long glass with cubed ice. Add both alcohols and top up with soda water. Stir with bar spoon to make sure ingredients are mixed properly. Garnish with a lemon zest and add 2 long straws.

name: Anaconda
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Tennesse Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml White Sambuca
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well for 20 seconds and strain into a shot glass.

name: Agave Kiss
ingredients: 50 ml Silver Tequila; 25 ml  White Crème de Cacao; 25 ml Double Cream; 12 1/2 ml Chambord; White Chocolate flakes; Raspberries
description: In a cocktail shaker with ice, add tequila, white crème de cacaco, double cream and chambord. Shake for 15 seconds. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass, rimmed with white chocolate add a spear of fresh raspberies and serve.

name: Air Force One
ingredients: 50 ml Hpnotiq Liqueur; 25 ml Citrus Vodka; juice from a Lemon Wedge; Lemon-Lime Soda; Lemon Spiral
description: Fill a tall glass with ingredients and add ice. Stir well for 20 seconds and garnish with lemon spiral.

name: Agent Orange
ingredients: 25 ml  Vodka; 75 ml Carrot Juice
description: Mix both ingredients in an Old-Fashioned glass with ice and serve.

name: Anejo HighBall
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Anejo Rum; 20 ml Lime Juice; 15 ml Orange Curacao; 3 dashes Angostura Bitters; Lemon Slice
description: Chill highball glass with soda. Add anejo rum, orange curacao, angostura bitters, lime juice into the glass and fill with ice. Give a quick stir to combine the flavours. Top up with ginger beer. Add straw and garnish with lemon slice.

name: Affinity
ingredients: 25 ml Scotch Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Sweet Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 2 dashes Orange Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Stir well with a bar spoon. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Adonis
ingredients: 25 ml Dry Sherry; 12 1/2 ml  Sweet Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 2 dashes Orange Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Stir well with a bar spoon. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Adult Hot Chocolate
ingredients: 50 ml Peppermint Schnapps; Hot Chocolate; Whipped Cream; Chocolate Shavings
description: Pour the schnapps into an Irish coffee glass. Fill with hot chocolate. Stir well. Top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

name: Alabama Slammer
ingredients: 20 ml Amaretto; 20 ml Southern Comfort; 20 ml Sloe Gin; fill-up Orange Juice
description: Mix ingredients in Collins glass with ice and top up with orange juice.

name: Alabazam
ingredients: 50 ml Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Orange Curacao; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters; 20 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; 50 ml Soda Water
description: Pour the brandy, lemon juice, orange curacao, simple syrup and Angostura Bitters into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice.Top with soda water.

name: Alaskan Iced Tea
ingredients: 15 ml Gin; 15 ml Vodka; 15 ml Tequila; 15 ml White Rum; 15 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 30 ml Gomme syrup; splash of Blue Curacao
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir with bar spoon, garnish with lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Amaretto Sour
ingredients: 50 ml Amaretto; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; dash Egg-White;  dash Angostura Bitters; Lemon Zest
description: Add all ingredients into mixing glass. Dry shake for 5 seconds. Add cubed ice into shaker and shake for 10 seconds. Fill rocks glass with cubed ice and strain mixture into glass. Garnish with lemon zest, spreading the oils across the glass.

name: Backdraft
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml  Drambuie; 37 1/2 ml Grand Marnier; Cinnamon
description: Pour into brandy snifter and light. Place hands over top of glass to form airtight seal that extinguishes flame. Slide straw between fingers keeping seal as tight as possible. Drink beverage through straw.

name: Aspenlicious
ingredients: 50 ml Coconut Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Amaretto; 12 1/2 ml Coffee Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Rum; 12 1/2 ml Irish Cream Cocktail; splash Half - And - Half; dash Chocolate Syrup; Grated White Chocolate.
description: Coat a martini glass with dark chocolate syrup. Wet the rim with chocolate syrup and dip in grated white chocolate. In a pint glass, mix liquid ingredients with ice, shake and strain into the chocolate coated glass. Garnish with the grated chocolate on the surface of the cocktail.

name: Bacardi
ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi White Rum; 20 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Grenadine Syrup
description: Shake ingredients together in a mixing tin with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: As Night Falls
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 25 ml White Grapefruit Juice; 2 Coriander Leaves; 7 Red Peppercorns; 1 1/2 teaspoon White Sugar; small piece of Ginger; Whole Star Anise; Orange Zest
description: Muddle the peppercorns in a cocktail shaker. Add thinly sliced ginger and muddle again. Add the other ingredients and ice. Shake vigorously. Double strain into a chilled coupette glass. Garnish with an orange zest and a piece of star anise.

name: Atone-Mint
ingredients: 50 ml Blueberry Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 50 ml Sparkling Water; 25 ml  Simple Syrup; fresh Mint Leaves; Lemon Wedge
description: Muddle the mint and simple syrup in a highball glass. Fill the glass with ice. Add the vodka and lemon juice.Top off with sparkling water. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Autumn Slumber Toddy
ingredients: 50 ml  Gin; 12 1/2 ml Crème de Cassis; dash of Simple Syrup; 1 teaspoon Lemon  Juice; Hot Water
description: Pour the liquors, syrup and lemon into an Irish coffee glass.Top up with hot water and stir.

name: Aviation
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Maraschino Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 5 ml Crème de Violette
description: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Axis Kiss
ingredients: 5 ml Amaretto; 5 ml Crème de Cassis;75 ml  Champagne
description: Pour the Amaretto and crème de cassis into a Champagne flute. Gently top with Champagne.

name: B & B
ingredients: 25 ml Cognac; 25 ml Benedictine
description: Combine both ingredients in a snifter glass and stir for 10 seconds with a bar spoon.

name: B-52
ingredients: 10 ml Coffee Liqueur; 10 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 10 ml Triple Sec
description: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

name: B-52 Gunship
ingredients: 10 ml Coffee Liqueur; 10 ml Irish Cream Liqueur ; 10 ml Absinthe
description: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

name: Apple Cin
ingredients: 30 ml Apple Vodka; 20 ml Spiced Rum; 25 ml Cranberry Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; Cinnamon
description: Add apple vodka, spiced rum, cranberry juice and simple syrup into a shaker with ice. Shake well for 15 seconds and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with dash of cinnamon.

name: Apple Sour
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 20 ml Triple Sec; 30 ml Apple Juice; 5 ml Lemon Juice; 2 dashes Orange Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass over ice.

name: B-52 in the Desert
ingredients: 10 ml Coffee Liqueur; 10 ml Tequila; 10 ml Triple Sec
description: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

name: Apocalypse Now
ingredients: 10 ml Dry Vermouth; 10 ml  Irish Cream Liqueur; 10 ml Tequila
description: Pour the dry vermouth and tequila into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass. Float the Irish cream liqueur on top.

name: Aperol Sunrise
ingredients: 45 ml Tequila; 90 ml Orange Juice; 15 ml Aperol Orange Liqueur; Orange Slice
description: Pour the tequila and orange juice into the glass over ice. Add the Aperol orange liqueur, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish with orange slice and serve.

name: AntiFreeze
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Blood Orange Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao;12 1/2 ml Orange Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bayou Slime
ingredients: 50 ml Dark Rum; 6 fresh Mint leaves; 12 1/2 ml Spiced Cordial Syrup; 1 Egg White
description: Muddle mint leaves and syrup together , making sure to crush the mint leaves. Place all ingredients into a shaker. Shake until well chilled and frothy. Strain into a well-chilled martini glass. Garnish with additional crushed mint leaves.

name: Bay Breeze
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 25 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Cranberry Juice; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; Orange Wedge
description: Add all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and mix. Single strain drink into Tiki glass. Garnish with orange wedge.

name: Bazooka Joe
ingredients: 10 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 10 ml Banana Liqueur; 10 ml Blue Curacao
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well for 20 seconds and strain into a shot glass.

name: Beam Me Up Scotty
ingredients: 10 ml Coffee Liqueur; 10 ml Crème de Banane; 10 ml Irish Cream Liqueur
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Beachcomber
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Light Rum; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 1 dash Maraschino Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 20 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Beautiful
ingredients: 25 ml Cognac; 25 ml Grand Marnier
description: Build Cognac and Grand Marnier in a brandy snifter glass.

name: Bearded Lady
ingredients: 50 ml  Whiskey; 1 teaspoon Lemon Juice; 1/2 teaspoon Egg White; 25 ml Grenadine Syrup
description: Shake all ingredients togther in a cocktail shaker with ice for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve chilled.

name: Belladonna
ingredients: 25 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml Light Rum; 25 ml Cranberry Juice; 25 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Orange Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice.

name: Belizean Pina Colada
ingredients: 30 ml White Rum; 30 ml Evaported Milk; 90 ml Pineapple Juice; 1 Pineapple Slice
description: Mix ingredients in a blender with crushed ice until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish with pineapple slice and serve.

name: Bee Tea
ingredients: 25 ml Barenjager; 50 ml Fresh Brewed Tea; Lemon Wedge
description: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in the Barenjager and fill the glass with fresh brewed tea. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Bed of Roses
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Jagermeister; 50 ml Lemon Juice; 25 ml Grenadine Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; Lime Slice
description: Combine and shake all ingredients over ice for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a slice of lime to garnish.

name: Beautiful Boat
ingredients: 40 ml Rose Champagne; 50 ml Vodka; 2 Mint Leaves
description: Shake the vodka and mint in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Float Champagne over top.

name: Banana Boomer
ingredients: 30 ml Vodka; 30 ml Banana Liqueur
description: Pour the ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Banana Daiquiri
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Light Rum; 1 tablespoon Triple Sec; 1 Banana; 37 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 1 teaspoon Sugar; 1 Marasschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with a cup of ice . Blend at low speed for a few seconds then at high speed until smooth. Pour contents into a chilled hurricane glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Banana Daiquiri Jelly Shot
ingredients: 75 ml Rum; 75 ml Crème de Banane; 25 ml Lime Juice; 25 ml Water; 5 ml Unflavoured Gelatin;
description: Pour the lime juice, simple syrup and water into a glass container and add the gelatin. Allow this to sit for 1 minute. Microwave on high for 30 seconds. Stir thoroughly, ensuring the gelatin is dissolved. Add the rum and the banana liqueur. Stir thoroughly. Pour into shot glasses. Refrigerate until the liquid sets. Serve cold.

name: Banana Hammock
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Spice Rum; 20 ml Banana Syrup; 20 ml Lime Juice; dash of Angostura Bitters;Caramelized Banana Dust
description: Make the banana dust by caramelizing sugar with banana syrup and spiced rum. Rim a coupe glass with the banana dust. Pour the rum, syrup, lime and bitters into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into the prepared coupe glass.

name: Black Nail
ingredients: 20 ml Irish Whiskey; 20 ml Irish Mist Liqueur; Orange Peel
description: Build the ingredients in an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange peel.

name: Black n Tan
ingredients: 200 ml Stout Beer; 200 ml Pale Ale Beer
description: Pour the pale ale into a pint glass. Float the stout on top to fill the glass by pouring it over a bar spoon over the pale ale.

name: Black Mushroom
ingredients: 25 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 25 ml Black Haus
description: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail shaker with plenty of ice for 20 seconds. Strain into shot glass.

name: Black Martini
ingredients: 90 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml  Blackberry Brandy; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake Well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Black Magic
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 20 ml Coffee Liqueur; dash of Lemon Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into the Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add dash of lemon juice. Stir gently and serve with lemon twist.

name: Black Jack
ingredients: 15 ml Jack Daniels; 15 ml Black Sambuca
description: Layer the Jack Daniels on top of the black sambuca in a shot glass.

name: Black Haze
ingredients: 15 ml Whiskey; 15 ml Frangelico
description: Combine equal amounts of the ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Black Cossack
ingredients: 250 ml Stout; 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Dark Rum
description: Start with a 1/2 pint of ice cold stout. Drop 1 shot of vodka into stout followed by 1 shot of dark rum.

name: Black Cherry Breezer
ingredients: 50 ml Black Cherry Vodka; 5 ml Grenadine Syrup; dash of Lemon Juice; Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass filled with ice. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Black Cat
ingredients: 25 ml  Vodka; 25 ml Cherry Brandy; Cranberry Juice; Cola
description: Pour the vodka and brandy into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill the glass with equal amount of cranberry juice and cola.

name: Black and Red
ingredients: 25 ml Black Bush Irish Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Sweet Vermouth; 2 dashes Bitters; Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Black and Gold
ingredients: 50 ml Blavod Black Vodka; 25 ml Goldschlager
description: Pour the Blavod black vodka into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top up with Goldschlager.

name: Black Adder
ingredients: 10 ml Jagermeister; 10 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 10 ml Coffee Liqueur
description: First pour Jagermeister in a shot glass. Then carefully layer the Irish cream liqueur and then the coffee liqueur.

name: Black `n` Blue
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 5 ml Crème de Mure; 65 ml  Apple Juice; 19 Blueberries
description: Add the blueberries to the mixing tin, muddle with the gin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake well and fine strain into a chilled martini glass. Top with 3 blueberries.

name: Bitter Sweet Symphony
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Vodka; 25 ml Triple Sec; 12 1/2 ml Apricot Brandy; 37 1/2 ml Grapefruit Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly for 10 – 15 seconds and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with cherry.

name: Bitter Elder
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 75 ml Apple Juice; 20 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Elderflower Cordial; 3 dashes Old Fashioned Bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into a Collins glass with loads of ice. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Bishop Cocktail
ingredients: 75 ml Rum; 25 ml Red Wine; 1 teaspoon Simple Syrup; Juice of 1/2 Lime
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled red wine glass.

name: Blood and Sand
ingredients: 20 ml Scotch Whiskey; 20 ml Cherry Brandy; 20 ml Sweet Vermouth; 20 ml Orange Juice; Orange slice
description: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Bloody Pari
ingredients: 45 ml Arak; 90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Pirate
ingredients: 45 ml Dark Rum; 90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Ninja
ingredients: 45 ml Sake; 90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Molly
ingredients: 45 ml Irish Whiskey; 90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Mariyaki
ingredients: 45 ml Vodka;90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Teriyaki Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Teriyaki Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Margaret
ingredients: 45 ml Gin ;90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Mary
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Peppered Vodka; 15 ml Sweet Vermouth; 35 ml Tomato Juice; splash Red Wine; 6 splashes Worcestershire sauce; 10 dashes Tobasco sauce; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 10 dashes Salt; 10 dashes Pepper; 3 Cucumber slices
description: Chill a highball glass with ice. Pour all the ingredients, apart from red wine, into mixing tin and add ice. Roll the mixing tin for 15 seconds. Taste. Add ice to glass and single strain the drink into a glass. Add  a splash of red wine and a dash of pepper. Garnish with 3 cucumber slices.

name: Bloody LeRoy
ingredients: 45 ml Vodka; 90 ml Barbecue Sauce; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Hogger
ingredients: 45 ml Bacon Vodka; 90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Fairy
ingredients: 45 ml Absinthe; 90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Eight
ingredients: 45 ml Vodka; 90 ml V8; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Bishop
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Sherry;  90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco  Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Cab
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25ml Carbernet Sauvignon; 90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Dane
ingredients: 45 ml Akvavit; 90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloody Aztec
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 37 1/2 ml Crème de Cacao; 20 ml Red Food Colouring
description: Pour tequila and crème de cacao into a cocktail shaker, add ice and mix. Pour red food colouring into bottom of a rocks glass. Pour contents of shaker into rocks glass. Do not stir.

name: Bloodless Mary
ingredients: 45 ml Vodka; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco and salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Brandy Sour (Cyprus)
ingredients: 50 ml Cypriot Brandy; 25 ml Cypriot Lemon Squash; 3 drops  Angostura Bitters; dash of Lemonade
description: Add ingredients to a tall glass and stir.Top up glass with lemonade and plenty of ice.

name: Brandy Smash
ingredients: 65 ml Brandy; 25 ml  Soda Water; 4 sprigs Fresh Mint; 1 teaspoon Sugar; Maraschino Cherry
description: Muddle the mint, sugar and soda water in an Old-Fashioned glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the brandy and stir well. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Brandy Manhattan
ingredients: 50 ml Brandy; 20 ml Sweet Red Vermouth; dash Angostura Bitters; Maraschino Cherry
description: Stir ingredients over ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve straight up.

name: Brandy EggNog
ingredients: 25 ml Brandy; 30 ml Milk; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 1 Egg Yolk
description: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Brandy Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Orange Curacao; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters; 2 dashes Peychards Bitters;Lemon Peel
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.

name: Brandy Cobbler
ingredients: 75 ml Brandy; 25 ml Simple Syrup; Soda Water;Lemon slice
description: Build the ingredients in an Old-Fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Stir with a bar spoon and add lemon slices.

name: Bramble Royale
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 5 ml Crème de Mure; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 5 ml Vanilla Sugar Syrup; Top-Up Champagne
description: Add the first 4 ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a Champagne flute and top up with Champagne.

name: Brandy Alexander
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Brandy; 20 ml Crème de Cacao; 50 ml Milk; Grated Nutmeg
description: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass. Fill glass with cubed ice and shake for 10 seconds. Double strain mixture into cocktail glass. Garnish with dusting of nutmeg.

name: Brandy Collins
ingredients: 50 ml Brandy; 25 ml Squeezed Lemon Juice; 15 ml Sugar Syrup; 15 ml Soda Water; Maraschino Cherry; Lemon Slice
description: Mix the brandy, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice. Top up with soda water, garnish with a maraschino cherry and a lemon slice and serve.

name: Bramble
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 10 ml Crème de Mure; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; Blackberry
description: Add all ingredients (except creme de mure) into mixing glass. Fill  mixing glass with cubed ice and fill rocks glass with crushed ice. Shake for 10 seconds. Strain mixture into glass and top up with crushed ice. Pour creme de mure over drink using bar spoon. Garnish with 2 lemon slices and blackberry.

name: Bourbon Lancer
ingredients: 45 ml Bourbon; 80 ml Champagne; 3 dashes Angostura Bitters; Lemon Peel
description: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with twist of lemon peel.

name: Bolo Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Rum;12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 25 ml Orange Juice; 10 ml Sugar Syrup; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Boiler Maker
ingredients: 250 ml Pale Ale; 25 ml Bourbon Whiskey
description: Shot of Bourbon whiskey is dropped into glass of pale ale then drunk.

name: Boston Sour
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Egg-White; Lemon Zest
description: Put all ingredients into Boston shaker with ice. Prep your lemon zest garnish. Shake hard for about 15 seconds. Strain with a Hawthorne strainer into ice-filled Rocks glass. Zest the drink and the glass using the lemon zest.

name: BlueBerry Tea
ingredients: 25 ml Grand Mariner; 25 ml Amaretto; Orange Pekoe Tea; Lemon slice
description: Add both liqueurs to the snifter and then fill with hot tea to taste. Swaddle the brandy snifter in serviettes or a cloth to protect the hands. Add a lemon garnish.

name: Bocce Ball
ingredients: 35 ml Amaretto; Orange Juice; Soda Water
description: Pour the amaretto into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Then fill with orange juice. Top with soda water.

name: Blushing Bride
ingredients: 25 ml Peach Schnapps; 100 ml Champagne; 25 ml Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the peach schnapps and grenadine syrup into a Champagne flute. Top-up with Champagne.

name: Caipisake
ingredients: 50 ml Sake; 1/2 Lime cut into 4 segments; 2 teaspoons Sugar
description: Place lime and sugar into Old-Fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the sake.

name: Caipinheiger
ingredients: 50 ml Steinhager; 1/2 Lime; 2 teaspoons Refined Sugar; Lemon Slice
description: Place lime and sugar into Old-Fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the Steinhager.

name: Caipirinha
ingredients: 50 ml Cachaca; 1/2 Lime; 1 teaspoon Brown Sugar; Lime Wedge
description: Cut 1/2 lime into 1/8 ths and add half of these to Rocks glass. Add teaspoon of brown sugar and muddle the ingredients. Add the rest of the lime and continue to muddle, to dissolve the sugar. Add the Cachaca and then add crushed ice on top. Stir to continue to dissolve the sugar. Add more crushed ice and continue to stir. Top up with crushed ice and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Café Amore
ingredients: 25 ml Cognac; 25 ml Amaretto; Black Coffee; Whipped Cream; Shaved Almonds
description: Pour Cognac and amaretto into an Irish coffee glass. Fill with hot coffee. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with shaved almonds.

name: CaipirItaly
ingredients: 50 ml Campari; 1/2 Lime; 2 teaspoons Refined Sugar; Lemon Slice
description: Place lime and sugar into Old-Fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the Campari.

name: Cadillac Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Premium Tequila; 25 ml Grand Marnier; 20 ml Lime Juice; Salt
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with salt.

name: Caipiblack
ingredients: 50 ml Black Vodka; 1/2 Lime; 2 teaspoons Refined Sugar; Lemon Slice
description: Place lime and sugar into Old-Fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the Black Vodka.

name: Cable Car
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Spiced Rum; 20 ml Orange Curacao; 37 1/2 ml Sour Mix; Orange Peel Spiral; Superfine Sugar
description: Rim a chilled cocktail glass with sugar. Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with an orange peel spiral.

name: Buttery Nipple
ingredients: 75 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 50 ml Butterscotch Schnapps
description: Fill a cocktail glass with ice. Pour Irish cream liqueur into glass. Carefully pour the butterscoth schnapps on top of the Irish cream liqueur. Serve.

name: Bushwacker
ingredients: 25 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; 25 ml Dark Crème de Cacao; 50 ml Coconut Cream; 50 ml Milk
description: Blend all ingredients with one cup of ice in a blender. Strain into a hurricane glass.

name: Burr Pom
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon; 12 1/2 ml Pomegranate Juice; 12 1/2 ml Orange Liqueur; juice of 1/2 Lime; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters;Ginger Ale to fill; Orange Wheel
description: Build the liquors, juices and bitters in a lowball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with orange wheel.

name: Burning Bush
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bushmills Irish Whiskey; 25 ml Honey; 75 ml Hot Water; Lemon Wedge
description: Place lemon wedge in Irish coffee glass. Pour whiskey and honey over lemon. Fill with water.

name: Burnt Oranges
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Rum; 12 1/2 ml Blood Orange Puree; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; top with Stout Beer
description: Pour the rum, puree and lemon juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with stout beer.

name: Bumbo
ingredients: 50 ml Rum; 25 ml Water; 2 Sugar Cubes; sprinkle of Cinnamon; sprinkle of Nutmeg
description: Shake together ingredients in a mixing tin filled with ice. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with nutmeg.

name: Buena Vida
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 40 ml Pink Grapefruit Juice; 20 ml Pineapple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Vanilla Sugar Syrup; 3 dashes Old Fashioned Bitters; Pineapple Slice; Mint Sprig
description: Add all ingredients into mixing tin. Fill with cubed ice and shake hard for 10 seconds. Fill a rocks glass with crushed ice and strain mixture into glass. Garnish with pineapple wedge and mint sprig.

name: Bucks Fizz
ingredients: 50 ml Orange Juice; 100 ml Champagne;
description: Pour 50 ml of orange juice into Champagne flute. Using a bar spoon, float Champagne on top. Lightly stir to combine.

name: Cherry Daiquiri
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Light Rum; 12 1/2 ml Cherry Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Vanilla Sugar Syrup; 8 Cherries
description: Add the cherries to the mixing tin and muddle with the rum. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake well, fine strain into martini glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Cherry Blossom Tini
ingredients: 55 ml Sake; 20 ml Triple Sec; 20 ml Cranberry Juice; 5 ml Lime Juice; 2 dashes Orange Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Cherrute
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka;  20 ml Cherry Brandy; 37 1/2 ml Grapefruit Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a martini glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Chartreuse Soleil
ingredients: 25 ml Yellow Chartreuse; 25 ml Whiskey
description: Pour the whisky and yellow chartreuse into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir.

name: Chateau Cardillo
ingredients: 25 ml Pear Juice; dash of Black Raspberry Liqueur; chilled Champagne
description: Pour the pear juice and black raspberry liqueur into a Champagne flute. Gently top with champagne.

name: Chartreuse Martini
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Green Chartreuse; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Charro Negro
ingredients: 25 ml Blanco Tequila ; juice of 1/2 Lemon; top-up of Cola; Salt
description: Rub rim of glass with lemon juice and dip in salt. Put 4 ice cubes into glass and add tequila and juice of half a lemon. Fill the glass with cola. Stir gently.

name: Charlie Chaplin
ingredients: 25 ml Apricot Brandy; 25 ml Sloe Gin; 25 ml Lime Juice; Lime Peel
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime peel.

name: Charmides
ingredients: 25 ml Absinthe; Seedless Green Grapes; 1 dash Angostura Bitters; 37 1/2 ml Gin; 20 ml  Ginger Syrup;Juice of 1/2 Lime; Soda Water; Candied Ginger
description: Muddle grapes, absinthe and bitters. Add gin, ginger syrup and lime juice. Shake and strain into an ice filled Collins glass, top with soda water. Garnish with candied ginger.

name: Champagne Flamingo
ingredients: 20 ml Vodka; 20 ml Campari; chilled Champagne
description: Pour the Champagne and Campari into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled Champagne flute. Top up with Champagne.

name: Champanska
ingredients: 25 ml Premium Vodka; 1/2 cup Champagne; 25 ml Lime Cordial; Lime Twist
description: In a mixing glass, stir togther the vodka and lime cordial. Gently pour the Champagne into a Champagne flute. Add the vodka and lime mixture to the Champagne. Garnish with the lime twist.

name: Chapel Hill
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 37 1/2 ml Triple Sec; splash of Lemon Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Champagne Fizz
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 1 teaspoon Sugar; chilled Champagne
description: Pour the gin, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktails shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with Champagne.

name: Chalino Special
ingredients: 65 ml Tequila; 5 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a coupette glass. Garnish with lime slice.

name: Champagne Cocktail
ingredients: 100 ml Champagne; 25 ml Brandy; 1 heaped bar spoon Sugar; 4 dashes Angostura Bitters;
description: Add 1 heaped bar spoon of sugar into a champagne glass. Add bitters and brandy. Churn with bar spoon to break down the sugar. Top off with champagne. Careful of the fizz!

name: Caruso
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 25 ml Dry Vermouth; dash of Green Crème de Menthe
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Catalina Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 25 ml  Peach Schnapps; 25 ml Blue Curacao; 12 1/2 ml Sour Mix
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled maragarita glass.

name: Caribou Lou
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml 151 Proof Rum; 25 ml Coconut Rum; 125 ml Pineapple Juice
description: Put all ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake for 10 – 15 seconds. Serve up with ice in a highball glass.

name: Caribbean Sunrise
ingredients: 45 ml Rum; 60 ml Orange Juice; 15 ml Grenadine Syrup; Orange Slice
description: Pour the rum and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine syrup, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish and serve.

name: Comrade Collins
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 25 ml Lemon Juice; drizzle of Sugar Syrup; splash of Soda Water; Lemon Slice
description: Mix the vodka, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice. Top up with soda water, garnish and serve.

name: Communitini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml  Pomegranate Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Pomegranate Juice; 20 ml Simple Syrup; 5 ml Fresh mint; Sugar
description: Rim a chilled cocktail glass with sugar. Muddle the mint and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker. Add ice, vodka and juice. Shake well. Strain into prepared glass and garnish with sprig of mint.

name: Commodore
ingredients: 50 ml Rum; 1 Egg White; 1/2 teaspoon Sugar; dash of Lemon Juice; dash of Grenadine Syrup; dash of Raspberry Syrup
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Colt 45
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 50 ml Jagermeister; 150 ml Energy Drink
description: Build the ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well with a bar spoon and serve.

name: Commander White
ingredients: 45 ml Vodka; 90 ml Pineapple Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Colombia
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 25 ml Blue Curacao; 25 ml Grenadine; Syrup; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 150 ml Orange Juice
description: Shake the vodka and citrus fruits in a mixer then strain into the cocktail glass. Slide the grenadine syrup down one side of the glass, where it will sink to the bottom. Slide the curacao down the other side, to lie between the vodka and grenadine syrup, and serve before the layers have a chance to mix.

name: Colleen Bawn
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Rye Whiskey; 37 1/2 ml Yellow Chartreuse; 37 1/2 ml Benedictine; 1 Egg; 1 teaspoon Simple Syrup; Nutmeg
description: Beat the egg and syrup in a mixing glass. Add the other ingredients and ice. Shake vigorouly to ensure the egg is properly mixed. Strain into 2 well-chilled cocktail glasses. Dust with grated nutmeg.

name: Coco Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Sour Mix; 25 ml Pineapple Juice; 12 1/2 ml  Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Coconut Cream; Pineapple wedge
description: Pour all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake for 10 – 15 seconds and pour into a chilled  margarita glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

name: Coconaut
ingredients: 50 ml Dark Rum; 37 1/2 ml Cream of Coconut; 12 1/2 ml  Lime Juice
description: Add all ingredients into an electric blender with ice and blend for approximately 20 seconds. Fill a rocks glass with crushed ice and strain in the mixture. Garnish with lime shell (optional to flame).

name: Coco Colada
ingredients: 100 ml Pineapple Juice; 50 ml Coconut Cream; Orange slice
description: In a blender add 1 cup of ice, pineapple juice and coconut cream. Blend until slushy. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Club Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Maraschino Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Pineapple Juice; 2 dashes Peychauds bitters; Lemon Peel
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.Garnish with a lemon peel.

name: Cliffhanger
ingredients: 25 ml Brandy; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; 25 ml Cream Liqueur; Cream
description: Stir the ingredients, excluding the cream, with ice and strain into shot glass. Float a thin layer of cream on top.

name: Clover Club
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Caorunn Gin; 37 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 20 ml Sweet Vermouth; 20 ml Raspberry Syrup; 1 Egg White;
description: Pour the ingredients into cocktail shaker and dry shake for 5 seconds. Add ice to the shaker and shake hard for a further 15 seconds. Single strain into a coupe glass and serve.

name: Citrus Caipirinha
ingredients: 50 ml Cachaca; 20 ml Sugar Syrup; 1/4 Lemon; 1/4 Lime; 1/8 Pineapple
description: Build the rocks glass and muddle the fruits with the sugar syrup. Add the cachaca with lots of crushed ice and churn well.

name: Citrus Banshee
ingredients: 25 ml Citrus Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Banana Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml White Crème de Cacao; Cream
description: Pour the vodka, banana liqueur, and crème de cacao into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass. Top with cream.

name: Cinderella
ingredients: 25 ml Lemon Juice; 25 ml  Orange Juice; 25 ml Pineapple Juice; 50 ml Ginger Ale; dash of Grenadine Syrup; Pineapple & Orange Slices
description: Pour the juices into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds.  Strain into a chilled Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with slices of pineapple and orange.

name: Chrysanthemum
ingredients: 10 ml Absinthe; 20 ml Brandy; 50 ml Dry Vermouth; Orange Peel
description: In a cocktail shaker, stir together absinthe, brandy and vermouth. Add ice and stir for one minute, then strain into a martini glass. Squeeze orange peel over drink, making sure oils fall into the glass , then drop peel into drink and serve.

name: Churchill
ingredients: 45 ml Scotch Whiskey; 15 ml Sweet Vermouth; 15 ml Triple Sec; 15 ml Lime Juice
description: Shake ingredients together with ice for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Death in the Afternoon
ingredients: Champagne glass of  Champagne; 1 measure Absinthe
description: Absinthe is added to the glass after the Champagne.

name: Dancing Belly
ingredients: 50 ml Citrus Vodka; 65 ml  White Grape juice; 12 1/2 ml Coconut Rum; juice of 1 Lime Wedge; juice of 1 Lemon Wedge
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Death by Chocolate
ingredients: 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; 25 ml Dark Crème de Cacao; 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Chocolate Syrup; 2 scoops Chocolate Ice Cream; Whipped Cream; Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour all the ingredients with a cup of ice into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass.Top with whipped cream and garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: D.R.F.O
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Dark Rum;  37 1/2 ml Ouzo; 37 1/2 ml Frangelico
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds.  Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass

name: D`Artagnan
ingredients: 1 teaspoon Armagnac; 1 teaspoon Grand Marnier; 3 teaspoon Orange Juice; 1/2 teaspoon Simple Syrup; 75 ml  Champagne ; Orange Peel
description: Pour Armagnac , Grand Marnier, orange juice and simple syrup into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain the chilled mix into a Champagne flute. Top up with Champagne. Garnish with an orange peel dropped into the drink.

name: Dafne Martini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 37 1/2 ml Pear Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; dash of Orange Bitters
description: Pour the gin, pear vodka, blue curacao, and dry vermouth into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a well-chilled cocktail glass. Add a dash of orange bitters.

name: Cuban Rose
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml White Rum; 20 ml Orange Juice; dash of Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Daiquiri
ingredients: 50 ml White Rum; 1 1/2 bar spoons Sugar; 25 ml Lime Juice; Lime slice
description: Chill coupe glass with soda water. Add sugar to mixing tin and then add white rum and lime juice. Add a little cracked ice to the bottom then fill the rest of the tin with ice. Shake for 10 – 15 seconds, taste and then fine strain into coupe glass. Garnish glass with lime slice.

name: Cuban Missile Crisis
ingredients: 50 ml 151 Proof Rum; 100 ml Cola; Lime Wedge
description: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Cuban Manhattan
ingredients: 50 ml Dark Rum; 10 ml Sweet Red Vermouth; 10 ml Dry Vermouth; dash Angostura Bitters; Maraschino Cherry
description: Stir over ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish, and serve straight up.

name: Cuban Breeze
ingredients: 35 ml Amaretto; 35 ml Vodka; Pineapple Juice
description: Pour the amaretto and vodka into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Then fill with pineapple juice.

name: Cuba Light
ingredients: 50 ml White Rum; 100 ml Diet Cola; Lime Wedge
description: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Crouching Tiger
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Lychee Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Silver Tequila
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well for 15 seconds. Strain into a shot glass and serve immediately.

name: Creamsicle
ingredients: 25 ml Vanilla Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; Orange Juice; Half and Half
description: Pour vodka and triple sec into a mixing glass filled with ice. Fill with equal parts of orange juice and half and half. Shake well and then strain into a Collins glass filled with fresh ice.

name: Cuba Libre
ingredients: 50 ml Anejo Rum; 8 Lime wedges; 100 ml Cola; Lime wedge
description: Add rum into rocks glass and squeeze the lime wedges over the top. Give quick churn with bar spoon and top up with ice. Fill to brim with cola and add in lime wedge as garnish.

name: Cricket
ingredients: 25 ml Mint Chocolate Liqueur; 25 ml White Crème de Cacao; 25 ml Cream
description: Combine ingredients in an ice-filled shaker. Shake well. Strain into Old-Fashioned glass and serve.

name: Eddy
ingredients: 20 ml Gin; 20 ml Dry Vermouth; 20 ml Orange Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Easy Bourbon Tea
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Limoncello; 100 ml Ice Tea; Lemon Wedge
description: Add bourbon and limoncello, to a double rocks glass. Add ice. Top with ice tea. Garnish with lemon wedge and serve.

name: Easter Egg Cocktail
ingredients: 25 ml Blue Curacao; 25 ml White Crème de Curacao; Half and Half
description: Pour the blue curacao and crème de cacao over ice cubes in an Old-Fashioned glass. Float the half and half on top to taste.

name: Easter Bunny
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Crème de Cacao; 12 1/2 ml Vodka; 1 teaspoon Chocolate Syrup; 1 teaspoon Cherry Brandy
description: Pour the crème de cacao and vodka into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice cubes. Float chocolate syrup and cherry brandy on top.

name: East Side Press
ingredients: 25 ml Ginger Liqueur; 37 1/2 ml Cognac; 5 ml Lemon Juice; Egg-White; 1 teaspoon Brown Sugar; 5 pieces of fresh Ginger; 2 pieces Candied Ginger
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the pieces of ginger.

name: Earthquake
ingredients: 30 ml Absinthe; 30 ml Cognac
description: Mix all ingredients in a wine goblet and serve.

name: Dusk in Eden
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 25 ml Apple Juice; dash of Simple Syrup; 1 large Slice of Pomegranate; Pomegranate Seeds
description: Muddle together the pomegranate and syrup in a mixing glass. Add vodka and juice and fill with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with pomegranate seeds.

name: Dyevitchka
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 25 ml Triple Sec; 50 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Lime Juice; 20 ml Sugar Syrup; Orange Zest Twist
description: Add all ingredients into mixing tin. Fill with ice and shake for 10 seconds. Strain mixture into a martini glass. Garnish with orange zest.

name: Duncan Macleod
ingredients: 25 ml Sake; 50 ml Scotch Whiskey; 3 tablespoons of Sugar; splash of Cola
description: Mix the sake and Scotch whiskey in a beer glass with sugar. Add cola to fill and mix gently.

name: Dubonnet
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 20 ml Dubonnet Rouge; Lemon twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Dreamy Blues
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml White Crème de Cacao; 37 1/2 ml Blue Curacao
description: Pour the crème de cacao into a well-chilled cocktail glass. Float the blue curacao on top.

name: Dry Manhattan
ingredients: 50 ml Scotch Whiskey; 20 ml Dry Vermouth; dash Angostura Bitters; Maraschino cherry
description: Stir over ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve straight up.

name: Dracula’s Kiss
ingredients: 25 ml Black Cherry Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Grenadine Syrup; Cola; Marschinio Cherries
description: Coat the bottom of a highball glass with grenadine syrup. Add ice and vodka. Fill with cola. Garnish with cherries.

name: Down East Delight
ingredients: 50 ml Cranberry Juice; 50 ml Grapefruit Juice; 1/2 cup Orange Juice; 25 ml Orgeat Syrup; Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Mix well. Strain into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with the maraschino cherry.

name: Double Vision
ingredients: 25 ml Raspberry Vodka; 25 ml Citron Vodka; 25 ml Apple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup; 3 dashes Old Fashioned Bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly for 10 -15 seconds and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Dorflinger
ingredients: 50 ml Plymouth Gin; 25 ml Absinthe; dash of Orange Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add an extra dash of orange bitters to taste.

name: Donald Sutherland
ingredients: 45 ml Rye Whiskey; 25 ml Drambuie
description: First fill a 650 ml glass with crushed ice until it is overflowing. Pour in Drambuie and rye whiskey. Stir gently, as to not bruise the ice. Keep stirring until a thick frost develops on the side of the glass. Garnish with a lemon twist. Serve.

name: Flaming Dr. Pepper
ingredients: 565 ml Beer; 30 ml Amaretto; 10 ml 151 Proof Rum
description: Layer the 2 spirits in a shot glass,with the high proof liquor on top. Light the shot and allow it to burn; then extinguish it by dropping it into the beer glass. Drink immediately.

name: Flirtini
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Triple Sec; 75 ml Champagne; 2 pieces fresh Pineapple; Maraschino Cherry
description: Muddle the pineapple pieces and triple sec in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add the vodka and pineapple juice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.Top with Champagne and garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Flaming Homer
ingredients: 25 ml Brandy; 25 ml Peppermint Schnapps; 25 ml Sloe Gin; 25 ml Blackberry Liqueur; 25 ml Strawberry Juice; Cough Syrup
description: Pour all the ingredients, except the cough syrup, into a highball glass. Stir. Add cough syrup. Ignite and extinguish before drinking.

name: Volcano
ingredients: 125 ml Golden Rum; 25 ml Dark Rum; 10 ml 151 Rum; 6 dashes Absinthe; 6 dashes Angostura Bitters; 50 ml Pink Grapefruit Juice; 50 ml Orange Juice; 50 ml Pineapple Juice; 50 ml Lime Juice; 25 ml Falernum; 50 ml Grenadine Syrup; Cinnamon
description: Add all ingredients (except 151 proof rum) into a large mixing glass filled with ice. Stir with a bar spoon for 15 seconds. Pour into a mixing bowl or a volcano bowl if you have one available. Top with crushed ice. Pout on 151 proof rum and set light. Sprinkle cinnamon over drink to garnish.

name: Fizzy Apple Cocktail
ingredients: 25 ml Apple Vodka; 1/2 cup Apple Juice; 1/2 cup Lemonade; Apple Slice
description: Combine all three ingredients into a chilled cocktail glass and serve with ice and garnish.

name: Fish House Punch
ingredients: 750 ml Jamaican Amber Rum; 600 ml Cognac; 50 ml Peach Brandy; 1 cup Sugar; 3 1/2 cups Water; 1 1/2 cups  Lemon Juice; Lemon Slices
description: Stir together sugar and 3½ cups water in a large bowl or pot until sugar is dissolved. Add lemon juice, rum, Cognac, and peach brandy and chill. Make sure it is covered for at least 3 hours. Put half-gallon ice block in a punch bowl and pour punch over it.

name: Firefly
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 100 ml Grapefruit Juice; 25 ml Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the vodka and grapefruit juice into a mixing glass with ice. Stir well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Add the grenadine syrup. Stir again or allow the grenadine syrup to float up from the bottom.

name: Firecracker
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Goldschlager; 12 1/2 ml Peppermint Scnapps
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into shot glass.

name: Fireball
ingredients: 20 ml  White Rum; 20 ml Cinnamon Schnapps; 2 dashes Tabasco Sauce
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into shot glass.

name: Farnell
ingredients: 25 ml Jack Daniels; 75 ml  Lemonade; 1 Lime Slice ;1 Mint Sprig
description: Pour Jack Daniels into Collins glass filled with ice. Fill to desired level wih lemonade. Stir lightly and garnish with lime and mint.

name: Fancy Whiskey
ingredients: 50 ml Canadian Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Sugar; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; dash of Bitters; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Fabiola
ingredients: 20 ml Sweet Vermouth; 20 ml Brandy; 20 ml Grand Marnier
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Everybody`s Irish
ingredients: 50 ml Irish Whiskey; 1 tablespoon Green Crème de Menthe; 1 tablespoon Green Chartreuse; Cocktail Olive
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail olive.

name: Especial
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Light Rum; 20 ml  Triple Sec; 50 ml Pineapple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with an orange zest twist.

name: Epiphany
ingredients: 45 ml  Bourbon Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Crème de Mure; 50 ml Apple Juice; 3 Blackberries
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin. Add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with 3 blackberries.

name: Envy
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Silver Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao; Pineapple Juice; Maraschinio Cherry
description: Pour the tequila into a glass of your choice. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the pineapple juice. Stir well. Top up with blue curacao and stir lightly again. Garnish with a cherry.

name: English Rose
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Dry Vermouth; 25 ml Apricot Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 1 teaspoon Grenadine Syrup; Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Emma Peel Cocktail
ingredients: 5 ml Cherry Brandy; 25 ml Pineapple Juice; Top-Up Champagne
description: Add the first 2 ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled Champagne flute and top up with Champagne.

name: Enamorada Sunrise
ingredients: 45 ml Tequila; 90 ml Orange Juice;15 ml Campari; Orange Slice
description: Pour the lemonade and orange juice and pineapple juice into a cocktail glass over ice. Add the Campari which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish and serve.

name: Emerson
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Sweet Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Maraschino Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Gibson
ingredients: 60 ml Gin; 10 ml Dry Vermouth ;1 Silverskin Onion
description: Stir well in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with silverskin onion and serve.

name: Gimlet
ingredients: 60 ml Premium Gin; 10 ml Lime Cordial
description: Add gin and lime cordial to a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir to dilute and chill the drink. Strain into a cocktail glass and serve straight up.

name: Ghostbuster
ingredients: 25 ml Peach Schnapps; 25 ml Melon Liqueur; 5 drops of Irish Cream Liqueur
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 -15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: General Sherman
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Southern Comfort; 2 dashes Tabasco Sauce
description: Pour Southern Comfort into a shot glass and add a couple of drops of Tabasco sauce.

name: Garbo
ingredients: 25 ml Brandy; 25 ml Dry Vermouth; 25 ml Orange Juice; 5 ml Grenadine Syrup; dash of White Crème de Menthe
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled highball glass.

name: Fuzzy Navel
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Peach Schnapps; top-up of Orange Juice
description: Pour the peach schnapps into a highball glass filled with ice cubes.Top up with orange juice. Stir well for 15 seconds with a bar spoon.

name: Full Moon Fever
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Spiced Rum; 25 ml  White Rum; 50 ml Coconut Rum; 25 ml Melon Liqueur; 1 dash Sour Mix; top-up of Apple Juice
description: Add the 3 rums and melon liqueur in a highball glass with ice. Add a little sour mix for flavour and fill the rest with apple juice.

name: Full House
ingredients: 20 ml Apple Whiskey; 20 ml Benedictine; 20 ml Yellow Chartreuse; dash of Angostura Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 -15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Frostbite
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml White Crème de Cacao; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao; 12 1/2 ml Cream; Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Frog In a Blender
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 100 ml Cranberry Juice; 2 Lime Wheels
description: Place all the ingredients in a blender (including the lime wheels). Blend for 3-5 seconds (ingredients will not be completely blended). Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.

name: Friar Tuck
ingredients: 25 ml Frangelico; 25 ml Dark Creme de Cacao; 50 ml Cream
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well for 10 -15 seconds. Strain into a V-shaped glass (a slightly over sized cocktail glass works well).

name: Fresca
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Citron Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 25 ml Grapefruit Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; Top-Up Lemonade
description: Add the first 4 ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly for 10 -15 seconds, strain into a chilled martini glass and top up with lemonade.

name: French Pear Martini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Elderflower Liqueur; 37 1/2 ml Pear Vodka; Champagne; Sugar
description: Rim a cocktail glass with superfine sugar. Shake liquors in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into the prepared cocktail glass. Top with Champagne.

name: French Martini
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka / 25 ml Chambord / 75 ml  Pineapple Juice / 3 Raspberries for Garnish
description: Although the French Martini is not actually a Martini (due to the lack of

name: French Kiss
ingredients: 10 ml Amaretto; 10 ml Dark Crème de Cacao; 10 ml Irish Cream Liqueur
description: Layer all the ingredients in a shot glass.

name: Frisky Whiskey
ingredients: 25 ml Irish Whiskey; 25 ml Honey Liqueur; Orange Juice; Simple Syrup; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters
description: In a mixing glass add the first 4 ingredients. Top with ice. Add bitters, top with a Boston shakers tin. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass and serve.

name: Goober
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 37 1/2 ml Melon Liqueur; 25 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Grenadine Syrup; 75 ml Pineapple Juice; 100 ml Orange Juice; Orange slice
description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Gong
ingredients: 60 ml Sake; 20 ml  Pama Pomegranate Liqueur
description: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice and serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

name: GoldenEye
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Amaretto; Lemon Twist
description: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve with a twist of lemon.

name: Golden Green Apple Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Irish Whiskey; 25 ml Sour Apple Schnapps; splash White Cranberry Juice
description: Add all three ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Add ice, shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Golden Raspberry
ingredients: 25 ml Jagermeister; 12 1/2 ml Vodka; 25 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Raspberry Juice; 12 1/2 ml Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the ingredientsinto a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for about 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Golden Dream
ingredients: 20 ml Galliano; 20 ml Triple Sec; 20 ml Orange Juice; 10 ml Cream
description: Shake ingredients together in a cocktail mixer with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Golden Doublet
ingredients: 10 ml Grand Marnier; 30 ml Orange Juice; 10 ml Lime Juice; Top-Up Champagne
description: Shake ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into Champagne Flute and top-up with Champagne.

name: Golden Dawn
ingredients: 20 ml Gin; 20 ml Apricot Brandy; 20 ml Calvados; 20 ml Orange Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Golden Cadillac
ingredients: 20 ml Galliano; 20 ml White Crème de Cacao; 20 ml Cream
description: Pour ingredients into cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15  seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Godmother
ingredients: 35 ml Amaretto; 35 ml Vodka
description: Pour both ingredients directly into Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Godfather
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Scotch Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Amaretto
description: Build the ingredients in an Old-Fashioned glass with ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

name: Godchild
ingredients: 35 ml Amaretto; 35 ml Cream
description: Pour both ingredients directly into Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice cubes.

name: Glitter Bomb
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Goldschlager; 125 ml Energy Drink
description: Pour energy drink into a medium sized glass. Add a shot of Goldschlager and serve.

name: Girl Scout Cookie
ingredients: 10 ml Coffee Liqueur; 10 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 10 ml Peppermint Schnapps
description: Pour the coffee liqueur into a shot glass. Float the Irish cream in top of the coffee liqueur and float the peppermint schnapps on top of the Irish cream liqueur.

name: Gladiator
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Amaretto; 12 1/2 ml Southern Comfort; Lemon-Lime Soda; Orange Juice
description: Pour the two liqueurs into a shot glass. Pour the soda and juice into an Old-Fashioned glass. Drop the shot glass into the other glass and drown the drink.

name: Ginza Mary
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Sake; 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 37 1/2 ml  Tomato Juice; several dashes of Tabasco Sauce; pinch of Ground White Pepper; dash of Soy Sauce
description: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a mixing glass and pour into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Hifi
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 100 ml Carbonated Orange Juice;Orange Slice
description: Mix ingredients in a highball glass with ice. Garnish with orange slice and serve.

name: Hawaiian Sour
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 37 1/2 ml Pineapple Juice; 20 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
ingredients: 50  ml Vodka; 100 ml Fresh Orange Juice; splash of Gailliano
description: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Add a splash of Galliano on top. Garnish and serve.

name: Hemingway Daiquiri
ingredients: 50 ml White Rum; 10 ml Maraschino Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Grapefruit Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Double strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry

name: Harvard Iced Tea
ingredients: 15 ml Gin; 15 ml Vodka; 15 ml Tequila; 15 ml White Rum; 15 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml  Lemon Juice; 30 ml Gomme syrup; splash of Champagne
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir with bar spoon, garnish with a lemon slice and serve in a chilled highball glass.

name: Harrogate Nights
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Peach Schnapps; 12 1/2 ml Coconut Rum; 25 ml Orange Juice; 25 ml Pineapple Juice; dash Cranberry Juice
description: Fill a highball glass with ice then add a dash of cranberry juice. Add the rest of the ingredients to the Boston glass, shake with ice and strain into the highball glass. Garnish and serve.

name: Harrington
ingredients: 4 ml Green Chartreuse; 25 ml  Vodka; 25 ml Blue Curacao; Orange Peel
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with orange peel.

name: Happy New Year
ingredients: 20 ml Brandy; 20 ml Ruby Port; 100 ml Champagne; 20 ml Orange Juice
description: Pour the brandy, port and orange juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a Champagne flute. Top with Champagne.

name: Hangmans Blood
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 50 ml Whiskey; 50 ml Rum; 50 ml Port; 50 ml Brandy; Small Bottle of Stout Beer; Top up of Champagne.
description: Double measures of gin, whiskey, port, rum and brandy are poured into a pint glass. A small bottle of stout beer is added and the whole is topped up with Champagne.

name: Halloween Hpnotist
ingredients: 50 ml Hpnotiq; 25 ml Premium Vodka; splash of Lemon Juice; 1 Glowstick
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lit Glowstick.

name: Halfpipe
ingredients: 25 ml Absinthe; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; 25 ml Cream Liqueur
description: In a rocks glass combine absinthe, coffee liqueur, cream liqueur. Stir with ice for 10 -15 seconds.

name: Hairy Navel
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Peach Schnapps; top-up of Orange Juice
description: Pour the peach schnapps and vodka into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice cubes.Top up with orange juice. Stir well and serve.

name: Halloween Harvest Punch
ingredients: 25 ml Melon Liqueur; 25 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml Light Rum; 50 ml White Cranberry Juice; 25 ml Apple Juice; 25 ml Simple Syrup; Juice of 1 Lemon; Apple Slices; Blueberries and Melon Balls
description: Add the liquid ingredients into a punch ball and mix well. Top with apple slices, blueberries and melon balls. Serve in an Old -Fashioned glass.

name: Grog
ingredients: 50 ml Rum; juice of  1/2 Lemon; 1 Sugar Cube; 2 Cloves; Stick of Cinnamon
description: Put all the ingredients into a heat proof mug and fill with boiling water. If preferred serve in a strong tumbler when the drink has cooled a little (so as not to break the glass).

name: Grinch
ingredients: 50 ml Melon Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml  Lemon Juice; 1 teaspoon Simple Syrup; Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Greentini
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Melon Liqueur; Lime Wedge
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Irish Coffee
ingredients: 25 ml Irish Whiskey; 2 shots Coffee; Hot Water; splash of Fresh Cream; Coffee Bean
description: Begin by placing bar spoon into Irish coffee glass. Add whiskey, 2 shots of hot coffee, hot water and layer with fresh cream. Garnish with coffee bean.

name: In & Out Lemontini
ingredients: 75 ml Vodka; splash of Limoncello; Lemon Peel
description: Pour a splash of Limoncello into a frozen cocktail glass. Swirl the liqueur around in a glass until all surfaces are coated. Shake the vodka in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Throw away any excess Limoncello in the glass. Strain the shaken vodka into the coated cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Irish Canadian
ingredients: 50 ml Canadian Whiskey; 25 ml Irish Mist Liqueur
description: Pour the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir well with a bar spoon. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Irish Buck
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Irish Whiskey; 5 ml Lime Juice; 50 ml Ginger Ale; Lime Wheel
description: Combine Irish whiskey and lime juice over ice in a Collins glass. Top up with ginger ale and garnish with lime wheel.

name: Incredible Hulk
ingredients: 30 ml Cognac; 30 ml Hpnotiq
description: Stir together in a mixing glass with ice. Serve over ice into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Imperial Fizz
ingredients: 50 ml Whiskey; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 1/2 teaspoon Sugar; 100 ml Soda Water
description: Pour the whisky, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with soda. Stir well.

name: Immaculate
ingredients: 50 ml Light Rum; 12 1/2 ml Amaretto; 25 ml Lime Juice; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 1/2 teaspoon Sugar
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Illusion
ingredients: 25 ml Melon Liqueur; 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml White Rum; 25 ml Triple Sec; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao; Pineapple Juice; Lemonade
description: Pour the melon liqueur, vodka, white rum, triple sec, blue curacao and pineapple juice into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Top with lemonade, stir again gently, and serve.

name: Iceberg
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 1 teaspoon Peppermint Schnapps
description: Pour all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Hunters Cocktail
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Cherry Brandy; Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the whiskey and cherry brandy into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice. Stir well. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Hurricane
ingredients: 25 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml White Rum; Passion Fruit Syrup; splash of Lime Juice
description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice, then pour into chilled cocktail glass glass and serve over ice.

name: Huntress Cocktail
ingredients: 25 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 25 ml Cherry Liqueur; 25 ml Cream; dash of Triple  Sec
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Hot Peppermint Patty
ingredients: 25 ml Peppermint Schnapps; 12 1/2 ml Dark Crème de Cacao; 1 teaspoon Crème de Menthe; Hot Chocolate; Whipped Cream; Shaved Chocolate
description: Pour the liqueurs into Irish coffee glass. Fill with hot chocolate. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

name: Hot Baked Apple Toddy
ingredients: 50 ml Apple Whiskey; 1/4 Baked Apple; 1 teaspoon Honey; Hot Water; Cinnamon Stick
description: Place the baked apple into a warm Irish coffee glass. Add whiskey and dissolve sugar in the mix. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Hot Buttered Rum
ingredients: 50 ml Dark Rum; 1 Small Slice Soft Butter; 1 teaspoon Brown Sugar; Ground Cinnamon; Ground Nutmeg; Vanilla Extract; Hot Water
description: Place the butter, sugar and spices at the bottom of an Irish Coffee glass. Muddle ingredients. Pour in the rum and hot water and then stir.

name: Hot Apple Toddy
ingredients: 50 ml Apple Brandy; Hot Apple Cider; 1 teaspoon Sugar; Cinnamon Stick; 2 Cloves; Lemon Wedge; Honey
description: Coat the bottom of a Irisih coffee glass with honey. Add the apple brandy. Fill with hot apple cider. Garnish with lemon, cloves and cinnamon stick.

name: Hot Apple Pie
ingredients: 50 ml Tuaca; Hot Apple Cider; Whipped Cream; Cinnamon Stick
description: Pour the Tuaca in an Irish coffee glass. Fill with hot apple cider. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Hot and Fruity Toddy
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Apple Brandy; 37 1/2 ml Gran Gala; 20 ml Lime Juice; 1 teaspoon Honey; 2 dashes Orange Bitters; Hot Water
description: Pour the liquor, honey and lime into an Irish coffee glass. Top with hot water and add bitters. Stir. Garnish with apple wedge.

name: Horses Neck
ingredients: 25 ml Brandy; 75 ml  Ginger Ale; dash Angostura Bitters
description: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into Old Fashioned glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If required, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

name: Irish Tea Party
ingredients: 80 ml Sweetened Green Tea; 20 ml Irish Whiskey; 10 ml Absinthe; Lime Slice
description: Rinse rocks glass with absinthe. Add ice. Pour whiskey over the ice. Add green tea and garnish with a lime slice.

name: Jager Bomb
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Jagermeister; 100 ml Energy Drink
description: Pour energy drink into a medium sized glass. Add a shot of Jagermeister and serve.

name: Horny Bull
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; Orange Juice
description: Pour the tequila into a highball glass filled with ice.Top with orange juice.

name: Jack Rose
ingredients: 75 ml Applejack; 50 ml Lemon Juice; 2 dashes Grenadine Syrup
description: Add all ingredients into mixing tin filled with ice and shake for 10 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish and serve straight up.

name: Jersey Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Apple Whisky; 2 dashes Simple Syrup; dash of Angostura Bitters
description: Pour the whisky and syrup into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Add the bitters and stir well.
