name: Jellyfish
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Blue Curacao; 37 1/2 ml White Sambuca; 12 1/2 ml Cream
description: Fill a highball glass with ice and add vodka. Float the blue curacao slowly on top. Float the white sambuca on top in the same manner.Float the cream on the very top using the back of a bar spoon. Stir very delicately to get “jellyfish” effect.

name: Jellybean
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Blackberry Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Sambuca; 12 1/2 ml Southern Comfort
description: Pour the brandy into a shot glass. Float the sambuca on top of the first layer .Float the Southern Comfort on top of the second layer.

name: Jell-O Shot
ingredients: 75 ml Gelatin; 150 ml Water; 150 ml Vodka
description: Pour gelatin into a bowl. Add boiling water, stirring until the gelatin has dissolved. Stir in liquor. Refrigerate until cool. Pour into shot glasses. Refrigerate until liquid sets. Serve cold.

name: Japanese Slipper
ingredients: 25 ml Melon Liqueur; 25 ml Triple-Sec; 25 ml  Lemon Juice
description: Start with a cocktail shaker and fill it half full with crushed ice. Add melon liqueur, triple sec, and lemon juice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a single cherry in the bottom of the glass.

name: Jamican Cobbler
ingredients: 75 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; Raspberries
description: Build the ingredients in the order listed in a wine glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the raspberries.

name: Jagertee
ingredients: 1 cup Spiced Rum; 1 cup Red Wine; 1 cup Black Tea; 1 cup Plum Brandy; 1 cup Orange Juice; 2 Sugar Cubes; 1/4 of Cinnamon Stick; 3 Whole Cloves; 2 Lemon Slices
description: Heat your tea, rum, wine, orange juice, brandy, spices, and lemons in a pot and let them come to a gentle simmer for about 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Add sugar to taste and serve.

name: Jamaican Coffee
ingredients: 50 ml Jamaican Dark Rum; 150 ml Jamaican coffee; 1/4 cup Whipped Cream; pinch Ground Coffee
description: Brew coffee a little stronger than you usually take it. Pour coffee into a mug. Add rum and stir well. Spoon whipped cream on top of coffee. Sprinkle ground coffee on top of the cream. Serve with a spoon and straw.

name: Jallu Collins
ingredients: 50 ml Jalovinna; 25 ml Lemon Juice; drizzle of Sugar Syrup; splash of Soda Water
description: Mix the Jalovinna, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water, garnish with maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Jack O`Lantern
ingredients: 25 ml Cognac; 37 1/2 ml Orange Juice; 12 1/2 ml Ginger Ale; Orange Wheel and Lime Twist
description: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake with ice. Strain into a lowball glass with ice. Float an orange wheel with a lime twist poked into the top.

name: Jack Collins
ingredients: 50 ml Applejack; 25 ml Lemon Juice; drizzle of Sugar Syrup; splash of Soda Water
description: Mix the Applejack, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice. Top up with soda water, garnish with maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Ja Mora
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Orange Juice; 12 1/2 ml Apple Juice; Top-Up Champagne
description: Add the first 4 ingredients to the mixing tin and add loads of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled Champagne flute and top up with Champagne.

name: Italian Sunset
ingredients: 50 ml Amaretto; 75 ml Orange Juice; 75 ml Soda Water; 1 dash Grenadine Syrup
description: Fill a tall glass with crushed ice. Pour the Amaretto over the ice then slowly add the orange juice then top up with soda water to form layers. Add a dash of grenadine syrup then garnish with orange slice.

name: Italian Coffee
ingredients: 25 ml Strega Liqueur; Hot Black Coffee; Whipped Cream; Shaved Nutmeg
description: Pour the Strega into an Irish coffee glass. Fill with hot coffee. Top with whipped cream. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: Irish Winter
ingredients: 25ml Coffee Liqueur; 25 ml Irish Whiskey; Freshly Brewed Coffee; Whipped Cream
description: Combine ingredients in an Irish coffee glass. Stir to combine. Top with whipped cream.

name: Irish Russian
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 20 ml Coffee Liqueur; head of Stout
description: Pour the ingredients into an Old-Fashioned glass and stir. Top with stout head.

name: Irish Punch
ingredients: 200 ml Irish Whiskey; 50 ml Drambuie; 100 ml Sour Mix; 50 ml Lemon Juice; 50 ml Simple Syrup; 75 ml Honey; 37 1/2 ml Water; 4 dashes Angostura Bitters
description: Combine all ingredients in a medium pot. Over medium heat, warm the mixture, stirring constantly.Transfer to a large punch bowl and serve in coffee mugs. Garnish with shaved nutmeg.

name: Irish Pride
ingredients: 75 ml Green Creme de Menthe; 75 ml Amaretto; 50 ml Lemon Juice
description: Build the ingredients in a highball glass. Stir well with a bar spoon and serve.

name: Irish Martini
ingredients: 50 ml  Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Irish Whiskey; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the Irish whisky into a chilled cocktail glass. Swirl around the glass in order to coat the inside. Drain the excess whiskey. Pour the vodka and dry vermouth into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Kahlua Colada
ingredients: 30 ml Kahlua; 30 ml Coconut Cream; 90 ml Pineapple Juice; 1 Pineapple Slice
description: Mix ingredients in blender with crushed ice until smooth. Pour into chilled cocktail glass, garnish with pineapple slice and serve.

name: Kremlin Colonel
ingredients: 60 ml  Vodka; 20 ml Lime Juice; 20 ml Simple Syrup; 4 Fresh Mint Sprigs; 1 Mint Leaf
description: Mix all ingredients, except the mint leaf, in a shaker. Strain in a highball glass. Garnish with the mint leaf.

name: Kiwi Martini
ingredients: 75 ml Citrus Vodka; 1/2 teaspoon Sugar Syrup; 1/2 Skinned Kiwi; Kiwi Slice
description: Muddle the skinned kiwi with sugar syrup in a cocktail shaker. Add ice and vodka. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of kiwi.

name: Koala Mojito
ingredients: 50 ml Rum; 25 ml Eucalyptus Syrup; 25 ml Lime Juice; splash of Soda Water; 8 Mint Leaves; Eucalyptus Leaves
description: In a cocktail shaker, muddle mint leaves with the syrup. Add the lime juice and stir. Add rum and crushed ice and stir. Add a splash of soda water. Garnish with eucalyptus leaves.

name: Kool Aid
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Melon Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Amaretto; Cranberry Juice
description: Pour the melon liqueur and amaretto into a shot glass. Fill with cranberry juice and serve.

name: Kiwi Crush
ingredients: 50 ml Citron Vodka; 25 ml Apple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Almond Sugar Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 1 whole peeled Kiwi
description: Peel and quarter the kiwi and muddle with the vodka in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain into chilled martini glass  and garnish with a kiwi slice.

name: Kir Petillant
ingredients: 90 ml Sparkling Wine; 10 ml Crème de Cassis
description: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of a wine glass, then top up with sparkling wine.

name: Kissy Suzuki
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 125 ml Apple Juice; 3 tablespoons Raspberry Puree; 3 tablespoons Cranberry Juice; Lemon-Lime Soda; Fresh Strawberries
description: Pour the vodka, raspberry puree, cranberry juice, and apple juice into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain equally into 2 highball glasses half-filled with ice cubes.Top up with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with strawberries.

name: Kir Peche
ingredients: 90 ml White Wine; 10 ml Peach Liqueur
description: Add the peach liqueur to the bottom of a wine glass, then top up with white wine.

name: Kir Royale
ingredients: 80 ml Champagne; 20 ml Crème de Cassis
description: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of a chilled Champagne flute, then top up with Champagne, using a bar spoon to float the champagne on top. Stir gently to combine.

name: Kir Nomand
ingredients: 90 ml Normandy Cider; 10 ml Crème de Cassis
description: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of a wine glass, then top up with Normandy cider.

name: Kir Breton
ingredients: 90 ml Breton Cider; 10 ml Crème de Cassis
description: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of a wine glass, then top up with Breton cider.

name: Kir
ingredients: 90 ml White Wine; 10 ml Crème de Cassis
description: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of a wine glass, then top up with wine.

name: Kioki Coffee
ingredients: 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Brandy; Coffee; Whipped Cream
description: Brew coffee and pour into Irish coffee glass. Add brandy and coffee liqueur. Add whipped cream to the top.

name: Kentucky Screwdriver
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon whiskey; Orange Juice
description: Pour the Bourbon whiskey into a Collins glass with ice. Top up with orange juice.

name: Key Lime Pie Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Vanilla Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 60 ml Pineapple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Cordial; 1/2 Lime; crushed Graham Crackers
description: Rim a chilled cocktail glass with finely crushed Graham crackers. Pour the vodka, triple sec, pineapple juice and lime cordial into a cocktail shaker with ice. Squeeze the juice from the lime into the shaker. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Kempinsky Fizz
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 5 ml Lemon Juice; Top-Up Ginger Ale; Mixed Berries
description: Add the first 3 ingredeints to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain over lots of ice and top up with ginger ale. Garnish with mixed berries.

name: Kensington Court Special
ingredients: 30 ml Vodka; 10 ml Apricot Brandy; 10 ml Passion Fruit Juice; 10 ml Lime Juice
description: Shake ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Long Beach Iced Tea
ingredients: 15 ml Gin; 15 ml Vodka; 15 ml Tequila; 15 ml White Rum; 15 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 30 ml Gomme syrup; splash of Cranberry Juice
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir, garnish with lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Liquid Cocaine
ingredients: 10 ml Jagermeister; 10 ml Goldschlager; 10 ml Peppermint Schnapps
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Liquid Bourbon Ball
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 25 ml  White Creme de Cacao; 5 ml Hazelnut Liqueur; Chocolate Shavings
description: Pour the bourbon and liqueur over ice in a mixing glass. Stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate shavings.

name: Link-Up
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Southern Comfort; teaspoon Lime Juice
description: Add ingredients into cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake for 10 seconds  and serve on the rocks in a cocktail glass.

name: Lindsay Lohan
ingredients: 50 ml Jagermeister; 50 ml Peach Schnapps; Cranberry Juice; Splash of Cola
description: Combine Jägermeister and schnapps in glass full of ice. Add cranberry juice and splash of coke to fill to top. Stir as necessary.

name: Lime Cola
ingredients: 25 ml m Lime Juice; Cola to fill; Lime Wedge
description: Pour the lime juice into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice.Top with cola. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Light `N` Stormy
ingredients: 60 ml Light Rum; Ginger Beer; Lime Wedge
description: Pour the rum into a glass over ice. Pour the ginger beer over it. Squeeze in the lime wedge and drop it in.

name: Licorice Stick
ingredients: 60 ml Vodka; 20 ml Sambuca Liqueur; Black Licorice Stick
description: Pour the vodka and sambuca into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a short black licorice stick.

name: Lichitini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Lychee Liqueur; dash of Lime Juice; 1 Pitted Lychee
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Drop a lychee in the glass for garnish.

name: Liberal
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Rye Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Sweet Vermouth; 5 ml Amer Torani; 2 dashes of Orange Bitters; Lemon Twist
description: In a mixing glass add all the ingredients except lemon twist. Add ice. Stir with bar spoon and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Lemongrad
ingredients: 50 ml Citron Vodka; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Elderflower Cordial; Top-Up Tonic Water; Pink Grapefruit Wedge
description: Add the first three ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice, shake thoroughly, strain into highball glass over lots of ice and top up with tonic water. Garnish with pink grapefruit wedge.

name: Lemon Drop Martini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka;12 1/2 ml Orange Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 25 ml Lemon Juice; Lemon Twist; Sugar
description: Add all ingredients into a Boston shaker and fill with ice. Shake well then double strain into a chilled martini glass that has been rimmed with sugar. Garnish with the twisted lemon peel.

name: Lemon Drop
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; lemon wedge; sugar
description: Pour vodka into shot glass. Coat a lemon wedge with sugar. Drink the shot of vodka. Follow up immediately with a bite into the sugary lemon.

name: Leite de Onca
ingredients: 40 ml Cachaca; 40 ml Cocoa Liqueur; 40 ml Milk; 40 ml Condensed Milk
description: Mix the condensed milk and the milk until they blend together. Add cachaça and let it rest. Add cocoa liqueur when it’s ready to serve.

name: Lavender Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Lavendar Simple Syrup; 2 dashes Orange Bitters; Lavendar Sprig
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lavendar sprig.

name: Leap Year
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Sweet Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml  Grand Marnier; 5 ml Lemon juice; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Lavender Lemon Drop
ingredients: 50 ml Lemon Vodka; 25 ml Lemon Juice; Lavendar Sprigs; 1 tablespoon Simple Syrup
description: Lightly muddle the lavendar and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker. Add ice and other ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lavendar sprig.

name: Lava Lamp Martini
ingredients: 50 ml  Vodka; 25 ml Raspberry Liqueur; 25 ml Honey
description: Pour the vodka into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Mix the honey and raspberry liqueur well in a shot glass.Use a spoon to slowly drizzle the honey mixture into the vodka.

name: Laura Cocktail
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Campari; 12 1/2 ml Galliano; 25 ml  Sweet Vermouth; 25 ml Dry Vermouth
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Stir for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Latin Manhattan
ingredients: 20 ml White Rum; 20 ml Sweet Red Vermouth; 20 ml Dry Vermouth; splash of Maraschino Cherry juice; Lemon Twist
description: Stir ingredients over ice and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and serve straight up.

name: Mango Sour
ingredients: 75 ml Pisco; 25 ml Simple Syrup; 1 cup Frozen Mango Chunks; 2 tablespoons Key Lime Juice; 1 Egg White
description: Place all of the ingredients in a blender, and mix until they are smooth. Serve in an Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Mango Julius
ingredients: 1 cup Mango Juice; 50 ml Milk; 1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract; 2 tablespoon Sugar; 1 scoop Vanilla Ice Cream
description: Place all the ingredients into a blender with 1/2 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.

name: Margarita Jelly Shot
ingredients: 75 ml White Tequila; 50 ml  Triple Sec; 25 ml Lime Juice; 25 ml  Simple Syrup; 25 ml Water; 5 ml  Unflavoured Gelatin;
description: Pour the lime juice, simple syrup and water into a glass container and add the gelatin. Allow this to sit for one minute. Microwave on high for thrity seconds. Stir thoroughtly, ensuring the gelatin has dissolved. Add the triple sec, tequila and food colouring. Stir thoroughly.Pour into shot glasses.Refrigerate until the liquid sets. Serve cold.

name: Marama
ingredients: 30 ml Light Rum; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 5 ml Dark Rum; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Almond Sugar Syrup; 8 Mint Leaves; 3 dashes of Old Fashioned Bitters; Top-Up Lemonade; Lime Wedge; Mint
description: Add light rum, dark rum, triple sec and 8 mint leaves to mixing tin. Take a bar spoon and mix through the rum for 10 seconds. Then add bitters, almond syrup and lime juice. Fill to the brim with cubed ice and shake hard for 10 seconds. Half fill sling glass with crushed ice, strain the mixture into glass. Garnish with lime and mint.

name: Maracuja Batida
ingredients: 50 ml Cachaca; 20 ml Lemon Juice; 20 ml Sugar Syrup; 2 Passion Fruit
description: Halve and scoop out the Passion Fruit and muddle with the cachaca in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain and then garnish with passion fruit shell.

name: Mango Tonic
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Mango Liqueur; tonic water to fill; 2 dashes Angostura bitters; lime wedge
description: Build all the  ingredients in an ice filled highball glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Mango Spice
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Mango Vodka; 25 ml Mango Nectar; 2 slices Jalapeno;12 1/2 ml Agave Syrup; 20 ml Lime Juice; dash of Orange Bitters
description: Muddle jalapeno, agave syrup and mango nectar in a mixing tin.  Add remaining ingredients. Shake with ice. Fine strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with jalapeno slice.

name: Mango  Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 25 ml Mango Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled margarita glass.

name: Man `O War
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Whiskey; 25 ml Orange Curacao Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Sweet Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Orange Juice
description: Shake all ingredients well with ice in a mixing tin  and pour on the rocks in an Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with slice of orange.

name: Mamie Taylor
ingredients: 50 ml Scotch Whiskey; juice of 1/2 a lime; Ginger Ale to fill; Lime Wedge
description: Pour the whiskey and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Major Bailey
ingredients: 50 ml Rum; 25 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 20 ml Sugar Syrup 2 Lemon Slices; Mint
description: Add all the ingredients to mixing tin and fill to the top with cubed ice. Shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Fill a sling glass with crushed ice and strain mixture into glass. Using a bar spoon swizzle up and down until ice is suspended in the drink. Top up with some crushed ice and garnish with lemon slices and mint.

name: M&M
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Amaretto; 12 1/2 ml Coffee Liqueur
description: Pour the coffee liqueur in the bottom of a shot glass.Top with the amaretto.

name: Mai-Tai
ingredients: 20 ml Dark Rum; 20 ml Light Rum;  splash Demerara 20 ml Triple Sec; 20 ml Lime Juice; 10 ml Orgeat Syrup; Mint sprig; Orange wedge
description: Add all ingredients into mixing tin. Fill mixing tin with cubed ice. Shake very hard for 10 seconds to achieve desired dilution. Fill goblet style glass with crushed ice and strain mixture into glass. Add a short straw, mint and a splash of demerara rum.

name: Mainbrace
ingredients: 30 ml Gin; 30 ml Triple Sec; 30 ml Grapefruit Juice; Orange Zest Twist
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and fill with ice.  Shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass.  Garnish with orange zest twist.

name: Magic Bus
ingredients: 25 ml Tequila; 25 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Orange Juice; 25 ml Cranberry Juice
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and fill with ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Maidens Prayer
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 25 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Orange Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and fill with ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Madroska
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 65 ml Apple Juice; 37 1/2 ml Cranberry Juice; 25 ml Orange Juice
description: Build the cocktail in the Collins glass over lots of ice. Add all the ingredients, stir with bar spoon and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Madras
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 75 ml Cranberry Juice; 25 ml Orange juice;
description: Pour the vodka and cranberry juice into a highball glass. Stir well. Top up with orange juice.

name: Mae West
ingredients: 75 ml Brandy; 1 Egg Yolk; 1 teaspoon Powdered Sugar; Cayenne Pepper
description: Pour the brandy, egg and sugar into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with cayenne pepper.

name: Midnight Smash
ingredients: 25 ml Orange Vodka; 25 ml Averna Liqueur; juice of 1 Meyer Lemon; 6 Blackberries; 50 ml Ginger Beer
description: Muddle blackberries in a cocktail shaker. Add the juice of 1 Meyer lemon, Averna liqueur, and orange flavoured vodka. Shake vigorously over ice. Strain over ice in a highball glass. Add ginger beer. Garnish with an orange wheel.

name: Midnight Martini
ingredients: 80 ml Coffee Vodka; 5 ml Coffee Liqueur; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Stir with a bar spoon. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Michelada
ingredients: 300 ml Beer; juice from 1 Lemon;  2 dashes of Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Soy Sauce; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 1 pinch Black Pepper
description: Mix all ingredients in a tall high glass with lots of ice. Add beer, mix and serve.

name: Miami Iced Tea
ingredients: 12 1/2  ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Light Rum; 12 1/2 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Peach Schnapps; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Sour Mix; 25 ml Cranberry Juice; splash of Lemon-Lime Soda
description: Build ingredients in a Collins glass. Stir and serve.

name: Michigan Iced Tea
ingredients: 15 ml Gin; 15 ml Vodka; 15 ml Tequila; 15 ml White Rum; 15 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 30 ml Gomme syrup; splash of Ginger Ale
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir, garnish with lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Mezcal Passion
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Mezcal; 20 ml  Lime Juice; 20 ml Passion Fruit Puree; 3 Muddled Cucumber Slices; 1 barspoon Agave Nectar; 25 ml Ginger Beer; Cucumber Slice; pinch of Ground Chilli
description: Add the lime, agave nectar and cucumber slices to a mixing glass and then muddle. Add the rest of the ingredients and then ice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of cucumber and a pinch of chilli powder.

name: Mex-tini
ingredients: 25 ml Orange Vodka; 25 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Orange Juice; Orange Slice
description: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and add crushed ice. Let stand for five seconds. Shake vigorously for five seconds. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with an orange slice.

name: Mexican Surfer
ingredients: 25 ml Tequila; 37 1/2 ml  Pineapple Juice; 12 1/ 2 ml Lime Cordial
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a coupette glass and garnish with orange zest twist.

name: Mexican Mojito
ingredients: 40ml Tequila; 30 ml Lime Juice;  3 Mint Leaves ; 5 ml Simple Syrup; Splash of Soda Water
description: Mint sprigs muddled with simple syrup and lime juice. Tequila added and topped with soda water. Garnish with sprig of mint leaves. Serve with a straw.

name: Mexican Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 50 ml Pineapple Juice; 5 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled coupette glass. Garnish with pineapple leaf.

name: Metropolitan
ingredients: 60 ml Brandy;  20 ml Sweet Red Vermouth; dash Angostura Bitters
description: Stir over ice in a mixing glass, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with maraschino cherry and serve straight up.

name: Merry Christmas
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 25 ml Cranberry Juice; 1 teaspoon Lemon Juice; Soda Water; Fresh Cranberries
description: Pour the gin and juice into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir. Top with soda water. Garnish with cranberries.

name: Merry Irishman
ingredients: 40 ml Irish Whiskey; 20 ml Coffee Liqueur; 10 ml Mint Schnapps; Candy Cane
description: Build ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice. Garnish and stir with a candy cane.

name: Melon Splash
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Melon Liqueur; 25 ml Lemon-Lime Soda; Lime slice
description: Mix the bourbon, soda and liqueur in a mixing glass. Pour over ice in an Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with slice of lime.

name: Melon Patch
ingredients: 25 ml Melon Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 50 ml Vodka; 100 ml Soda Water; Orange Slice
description: Pour the first three ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass with ice cubes. Add the soda water. Garnish with the orange slice.

name: Melon Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ML Tequila; 37 1/2 ml Melon Liqueur; 25 ml ml Sour Mix; 25 ml Lime Juice; Lemon Peel
description: Pour all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with slice of lemon peel.

name: Melon Cucumber-tini
ingredients: 50 ml Melon Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; Fresh Cucumber
description: Muddle a few slices of cucumber over ice in a mixing glass. Pour the muddled cucumber, vodka and simple syrup into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cucumber slice.

name: Melon Ball
ingredients: 5 ml Melon Liqueur; 5 ml Pineapple Juice; 10 ml Vodka
description: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir well and strain into a shot glass.

name: Napolean
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Grand Marnier; 12 1/2 ml Dubonnet Rouge
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Mint Julep
ingredients: 50 ml Knob Creek Bourbon; bar spoon Granulated Sugar; 8 Mint leaves; Mint sprigs
description: Add a bar spoon of granulated sugar into glass. Place 8 mint leaves into the glass and add 15 ml of Bourbon. Gently muddle contents of the glass. Add a further 35 ml of bourbon and then fill glass half way with crushed ice. Churn for 15 seconds and taste. Fill the remainder of the glass to the top with crushed ice. Slap mint sprigs to release flavour and add to top of drink. Place straw into drink next to mint sprigs.

name: Naked Lady
ingredients: 35 ml Rum; 35 ml Sweet Vermouth; 5 ml  Apricot Brandy; 5 ml Pomegranate Grenadine Syrup ; 5 ml Lemon Juice; Lemon Zest
description: Put all ingredients into a shaker. Throw in the ice. Shake  until the outside of the shaker gets very cold. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon zest.

name: My Fair Lady
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 25 ml Orange Juice; 25 ml Strawberry Syrup;  1 dash of Egg White
description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker together with ice, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Mudslide
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; 25 ml Irish Cream Liqueur
description: Fill an Old-Fashioned glass with ice. Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into the Old- Fashioned glass.

name: Muddled Rebuttal
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Citrus Vodka; 1 teaspoon Sugar; 5 Raspberries; Freshly Squeezed Lemonade; Lemon Wedge
description: Muddle 5 raspberries with 1 teaspoon sugar. Pour into tall glass over ice. Top with vodka and lemonade. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Mountain Sipper
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 25 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Cranberry Juice; 25 ml Grapefruit Juice; dash of Sugar Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into a rocks glass with loads of ice. Garnish with an orange wedge.

name: Mound Bar
ingredients: 50 ml Coconut Rum; Hot Chocolate; Whipped Cream
description: Pour the coconut rum into an Irish coffee glass. Fill with hot chocolate. Stir well. Top with whipped cream.

name: Moonwalk
ingredients: 50 ml Grand Marnier; 50 ml Grapefruit Juice; 2 dashes Rosewater; Champagne
description: Shake well in a cocktail shaker with ice, strain into wine glass and top up with Champagne.

name: Moscow Mule
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 25 ml Lime juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; splash Ginger Beer
description: Chill highball glass with ice and soda. Add all ingredients apart from ginger beer into mixing tin. Fill tin with ice and shake for about 10 – 15 seconds. Fill glass with fresh ice. Add splash of ginger beer to bottom of glass and strain drink into glass. Add straw and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Monte Carlo
ingredients: 50 ml Rye Whiskey; 20 ml Benedictine; dash Angostura Bitters
description: Stir ingredients over ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve straight up.

name: Momotaro
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 50 ml Peach Puree; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a martini glass.  Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

name: Moloko Plus
ingredients: 25 ml Absinthe; 25 ml Anisette Liqueur; 50 ml Irish Cream Liqueur;  125 ml Milk; 1 tablespoon Sugar
description: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled tall glass.

name: Mojito Royal
ingredients: 40 ml White Rum; 30 ml Lime Juice;  3 Mint Leaves; 2 teaspoons Sugar; Splash of Champagne
description: Muddle mint sprigs in a glass with sugar and lime juice. Add rum and top up with Champagne. Garnish with sprig of mint leaves. Serve with a straw.

name: Mojito
ingredients: 50 ml White Rum; 8 Mint leaves; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 25 ml Lime Juice; 2 Mint sprigs
description: Add the white rum to a highball glass. Add 8 – 10 mint leaves and sugar syrup and lime juice.Muddle with bar spoon. Add crushed ice and a splash of soda. Mix drink down with bar spoon. Taste. Top up with more crushed ice. Slap 2 mint sprigs to release essence and put into drink. Add small splash of soda and straw.

name: Modern English
ingredients: 65 ml Gin; 25 ml Pear Nectar; 12 1/2 ml Maple Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 1 bar spoon Goldschlager; Cinnamon Stick
description: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine all ingredients except for garnish. Shake well and strain into a martini glass. Add cinnamon stick garnish.

name: Mochatini
ingredients: 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Chocolate Liqueur; 25 ml Vanilla Vodka; White Chocolate and Sugar
description: Rim a cocktail glass with white chocolate and sugar. Pour the liqueurs and vodka into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into the chilled cocktail glass.

name: Misty Pear
ingredients: 100 ml Canadian Mist Whiskey; 75 ml Pear Nectar; 25 ml Peach Nectar; 25 ml  Lime juice; Asian Pear
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with Asian pear.

name: Misty Maple Leaf
ingredients: 50 ml Canadian Mist Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Maple Syrup; splash of Soda Water
description: Pour the Canadian Mist and maple syrup into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice. Add a splash of soda water.

name: Northern Lights
ingredients: 50 ml Canadian Whiskey; dash of Peach Schnapps; Orange Juice; Cranberry Juice
description: Pour the Canadian whiskey and peach schnapps into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with equal parts orange juice and cranberry juice. Stir.

name: Old Etonian
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 37 1/2 ml Lillet blanc; 2 dashes Crème de Noyaux; 2 dashes Orange Bitters
description: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled stemmed cocktail glass.

name: Old Cuban
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Light Rum; 12 1/2 ml  Dark Rum; 20 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 8 Mint Leaves; 1 dash Old-Fashioned Bitters; Top-Up Champagne.
description: Muddle the rum with the mint. Add the lime and syrup. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled Champagne flute and top up with Champagne.

name: Oriental
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Rye Whiskey; 20 ml Sweet Vermouth; 20 ml Triple Sec; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; Cherry
description: Add all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with cherry.

name: Orange Oasis
ingredients: 75 ml Orange Juice; 37 1/2 ml Plymouth Gin; 25 ml  Cherry Brandy; Ginger Ale; Orange Slice
description: Pour the gin, brandy and orange juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an ice filled highball glass. Top off the glass with ginger ale. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Orange Tundra
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25ml Coffee Liqueur; 25ml Orange Juice; 25ml Cream Soda
description: Add the ingredients to a highball glass in the following order: vodka, cream soda, coffee liqueur, and finally orange juice. Ice may be added if required. Do not stir before serving.

name: Orange Blossom
ingredients: 20 ml Gin; 20 ml Sweet Vermouth; 20 ml Orange Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well with a bar spoon and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Orange Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; dash of Orange Bitters; Orange Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the orange twist.

name: Orange Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; dash of Lime Juice;scoop of Orange Sherbert; Orange Slice
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with half a cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour contents into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Orange  Julius
ingredients: 1 cup of Orange Juice; 50 ml Milk; 1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract; 2 tablespoons Sugar; 1 scoop Vanilla Ice Cream
description: Place all ingredients in a blender with 1/2 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.

name: One Balled Dictator
ingredients: 100 ml Liebfraumilch; 20 ml Champagne; 1 Cinnamon Ball
description: Briefly but violently shake ingredients in a mixing tin then pour into rocks glass containing one candy cinnamon ball.

name: Old Pal
ingredients: 25 ml Canadian whiskey; 25 ml Dry Vermouth; 25 ml Campari
description: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass. Add ice. Stir for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Obituary Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 5 ml Dry Vermouth; 5 ml Absinthe;
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with cracked ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Oatmeal Cookie
ingredients: 20 ml Butterscotch Schnapps; 20 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; splash Jagermeister; splash Cinnamon Schnapps
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and then strain into a shot glass.

name: Old Lay
ingredients: 30 ml Gold Tequila; 20 ml Triple Sec; splash of Lime Juice; Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the tequila, triple sec and lime juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top with grenadine syrup.

name: October Screwdriver
ingredients: 75 ml Blavod Black vodka; 75 ml Orange Juice
description: Pour the orange juice into a Collins glass filled with ice. Slowly float the Blavod on top.

name: Nutty Irishman
ingredients: 15 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 15 ml  Frangelico
description: Pour equal amounts of the 2 liqueurs into a shot glass.

name: Nutty Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 20 ml Frangelico; 1 teaspoon Sugar Syrup
description: Pour the vodka and Frangelico into a cocktail shaker half-filled with ice. Add the sugar syrup. Shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Nuts and Berries
ingredients: 25 ml Frangelico; 25 ml Chambord; Cream
description: Pour the liqueurs into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir well. Top up with cream.

name: Norina
ingredients: 25 ml Dry Vermouth; 25 ml Peach Liqueur; lemon twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Serve in a chilled martini glass. Add a lemon twist as garnish.

name: Pamoyo
ingredients: 10 ml Gin; 10 ml Lemonade; 10 ml Grape Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Nixon
ingredients: 30 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 30 ml Sloe Gin; 2 dashes peach bitters
description: Stir ingredients and serve on the rocks in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a peach slice.

name: Ninotchka
ingredients: 50 ml Vanilla Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml White Crème de Cacao
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Paloma
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 27 1/2 ml Pink Grapefruit Juice; 20 ml Sugar Syrup; 10 ml Lime Juice; Pink Grapefruit wedge
description: Chill highball glass. Add all ingredients into highball and fill to brim with ice. Stir with bar spoon for 10 seconds. Top up with fresh ice and top up with soda. Add straw and garnish with wedge of pink grapefruit.

name: Nikolaschka
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Cognac; 1 teaspoon powdered coffee; 1 teaspoon powdered sugar; 1 peeled Lemon disk
description: Pour Cognac into brandy snifter, place lemon disk across the top of the glass and top with sugar and coffee.

name: Painkiller
ingredients: 50 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml Coconut Cream; 100 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Orange Juice; Orange Wheel
description: Add all ingredients into a mixing tin and top-up with cubed ice. Shake hard for 10 seconds. Fill a tall glass with crushed ice and strain mixture into glass. Garnish with orange wheel.

name: Panama
ingredients: 50 ml Cognac; 50 ml White Crème de Cacao; 50 ml Cream
description: Shake together ingredients in a  cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with nutmeg if desired.

name: Passion Fruit Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 5 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Water;  2 Passion Fruits
description: Halve and scoop out the Passion Fruit and muddle with the gin in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain and then garnish with passion fruit shell.

name: Pancho Villa
ingredients: 25 ml Light Rum; 25 ml Gin; 25 ml Apricot Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Cherry Brandy; 100 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Mineral Water
description: Add all ingredients to mixing tin and top up with ice. Shake hard for 10 seconds. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with small pineapple slice.

name: Passion Fruit Caipirinha
ingredients: 50 ml Cachaca; 20 ml Sugar Syrup; 1 passion fruit; 1 whole quartered Lime
description: Build in the glass, halve and scoop out the passion fruit, add the quartered lime, and muddle with cachaca. Add all the other ingredients and churn with lots of crushed ice.

name: Passion Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Gold Tequila; 75 ml Cranberry Juice; 25 ml Lime Juice; 50 ml Grand Marnier; Lime Slice
description: Pour the tequila, cranberry juice and lime juice, into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled stemmed glass. Splash with Grand Marnier. Garnish with slice of lime.

name: Passbour Cooler
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 20 ml Cherry Brandy; 75 ml Cranberry Juice; 2 Passion Fruit
description: Halve and scoop out passion fruit and muddle with the bourbon in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain over lots of ice and garnish with orange zest twist.

name: Peach Julius
ingredients: 1 cup Fresh Peach Juice; 50 ml Milk; 1 teaspoon Vanilla Extract; 2 tablespoon Sugar; 1 scoop Vanilla Ice-Cream
description: Place all ingredients into a blender with 1/2 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled hurricane glass.

name: Peach Cosmopolitan
ingredients: 40 ml Citrus Vodka; 15ml Peach Schapps; 15ml  Lime Juice; 30ml Peach Juice; Lime wedge
description: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Peppermint Kiss
ingredients: 25 ml Melon Liqueur; 25 ml Vodka; 75 ml Pineapple Juice; 5 ml  Lemon Juice; 5 ml Peppermint Schnapps; 6 Basil Leaves gently torn; Raspberry
description: Add all of the ingredients to a cocktail shaker. Add ice and shake for 15 seconds, strain into a Collins glass. Garnish with a basil leaf and one raspberry sitting in front of the leaf.

name: Pegu
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 20 ml Triple Sec; dash of Bitters; dash of Orange Bitters; 1 teaspoon Lime Juice; Lime twist
description: Shake ingredients together in a mixing tin with crushed ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass, garnish with lime twist and serve.

name: Pearl Harbour
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 25 ml Melon Liqueur; Pineapple Juice; Maraschino Cherry; Pineapple Chunks
description: Pour the vodka and melon liqueur into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and pineapple chunk on a skewer.

name: Pear and Cardamom Sidecar
ingredients: 25ml Xante; 25ml Triple-Sec; 25ml Lemon Juice; 3 Cardamoms
description: Crush the cardamoms and muddle with the rest of the ingredients in a mixing glass. Shake over ice and double strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Pear and Elderflower Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 50 ml Pear Juice; 5 ml  Elderflower Cordial; 5 ml Sugar Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with pear slice.

name: Peach Mojito
ingredients: 50 ml Light Rum; 20 ml Peach Puree; 20 ml  Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 12 Mint Leaves; Top-Up Soda Water; Mint Sprig
description: Gently muddle the mint and the rum in the glass. Add the other ingredients and lots of crushed ice. Top up with soda water, churn well, garnish and serve.

name: Peach Pomegranate Holiday Martini
ingredients: 25 ml Pomegranate Vodka; 20 ml Peach Schnapps; 25 ml Orange Juice; splash of Lemon Juice; Ground Cinnamon; Granulated Sugar;
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cinnamon and sugar.

name: Peach Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 5 ml Triple Sec; 5 ml Peach Schnapps; 5 ml Lime Juice; 1 Skinned and Pitted Peach
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with 1/2 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour the contents into a chilled margarita glass.

name: Peach Long Island
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Peach Schnapps; 25 ml White Rum; 25 ml Triple Sec; 35 ml Lemon Juice; 50 ml Gomme syrup; splash of Coke
description: Mix all ingredients in glass over ice, stir, garnish with lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Patriot Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle of White Wine; 50 ml Limoncello; 1 cup Blueberries; 1 cup Strawberries; 1/3 cup Sugar; 2 cups Ginger Ale
description: Pour wine in a pitcher. Toss in the fruit and add sugar and Limoncello. Carefully stir until well blended. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale and ice just before serving.

name: Peach Batida
ingredients: 50 ml Cachaca; 50 ml Peach Puree; 20 ml Lime Juice; 25 ml Condensed Milk; Lime Wheel
description: Add all ingredients into an electric blender with crushed ice and blend for about 20 seconds. Pour into a tall glass. Top up with crushed ice, add a straw and garnish with lime wheel.

name: Passion Punch
ingredients: 50 ml Light Rum; 25 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml Orange Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 2 Passion Fruit
description: Halve and scoop out the Passion Fruit and muddle with rum in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain into a rocks glass and then garnish with passion fruit shell.

name: Passion Fruit Vodkatini
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 1 passion fruit
description: Halve and scoop out the Passion Fruit and muddle with rum in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake and fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass and then garnish with passion fruit shell.

name: Passion Fruit Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle Sweet White Wine; 2 cups Passionfruit Juice; 2 cups Pineapple Juice; 1 cup Ginger Ale;1 Lemon; 1 Orange and 1 Lime all cut into wedges
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon, orange and lime into the wine.Toss in the fruit wedges and add passion fruit juice and pineapple juice. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale and thinly sliced kiwi fruit just before serving.

name: Park Avenue Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 20 ml Sweet Vermouth; 20 ml Pineapple Juice; 5 ml Triple Sec
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Parisian Blond
ingredients: 25 ml  Rum; 25 ml Orange Curacao; 25 ml Heavy Cream; Vanilla Extract
description: Pour the rum, curacao and cream into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a drop of vanilla extract on top for garnish.

name: Pamplemousse
ingredients: 90 ml Sparling Wine; 10 ml Red Grapefruit Liqueur
description: Add the red grapefruit liqueur to the bottom of a wine glass and then slowly top up with sparkling wine.

name: Paradise
ingredients: 35 ml Gin; 20 ml  Apricot Brandy; 15 ml Orange Juice
description: Shake ingredients together in a mixing tin over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

name: New Zealander Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle White Wine; 2 cups Ginger Ale; 1/4 cup Sugar; 4 Sliced Kiwis; 1 Lemon and 1 Tangerine Sliced
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon or limes into the wine. Toss in the sliced kiwi, tangerine and lemon and add sugar. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale or club soda just before serving.

name: Polar Bear in Blizzard
ingredients: 25 ml  White Crème de Cacao; 25 ml Peppermint Schnapps; 25 ml Vodka
description: Shake all ingredients with crushed ice in a mixing tin.  Serve in a shot glass with a mint leaf garnish.

name: Polished Princess
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vanilla Vodka; 5 Cranberries; pinch Pumpkin Spice; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 20 ml Simple Syrup; 1 Egg White
description: In the bottom of a mixing glass , muddle the cranberries and spice in the simple syrup and lemon juice. Then add remaining ingredients and dry shake. Then add ice and shake again. Strain into a chilled martini glass and add 3 floating cranberries for garnish.

name: Pomegranate – Pineapple Fireworks
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Pomegranate Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Pineapple Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Pineapple Juice; Champagne
description: Pour the vodkas and juice into a Champagne glass. Top with Champagne.

name: Polar Bear Cooler
ingredients: 50 ml  Dark Rum; 25 ml Red Vermouth; 25 ml Lime Juice; 90 ml Lemon-Lime Soda
description: Add ingredients into cocktail shaker full of ice. Strain into a Collins glass filled with broken ice and add a spiral of lemon. Garnish with an orange wedge . Serve with straw.

name: Poinsettia
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; Champagne; 75 ml Cranberry Juice
description: Chill all the ingredients beforehand. Pour the triple sec and cranberry juice into a chilled Champagne flute. Stir well. Top with Champagne.

name: Playa Del Mar
ingredients: 25 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Cranberry Juice; 20 ml Pineapple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into coupette glass.

name: Pixie Stick
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 37 1/2 ml Melon Liqueur; top-up Lemon-Lime soda
description: Shake gin and melon liqueur in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a Tom Collins  glass with ice. Fill up with lemon and lime soda and garnish with a cherry.

name: Planters Punch
ingredients: 50 ml Dark Rum; 30 ml Lime Juice; 10 ml Grenadine Syrup; 15 ml Sugar Syrup; Splash of Soda Water; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters
description: Pour all ingredients into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into highball with ice. Top up with soda water. Stir gently and add a dash of Angostura Bitters. Garnish with orange slices.

name: Pirates Treasure
ingredients: 20 ml Goldschlager; 20 ml Spiced Rum
description: Pour the goldschlager into a shot glass. Float the rum on top by pouring it slowly over the back of a bar spoon.

name: Pisco Sour
ingredients: 50 ml Pisco; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; 25 ml Lime Juice; splash Egg White; Lime wedge
description: Chill rocks glass with soda and ice. Add all ingredients to mixing tin and dry shake for 10 seconds. Fill mixing tin with ice and then shake vigorously for a further 10 seconds. Add fresh ice to the rocks glass. Single strain into glass over ice and garnish with lime wedge.

name: Pinky Pincher
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 37 1/2 ml Orange Juice; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml  Orgeat Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin. Top up with cubed ice and shake hard for 10 seconds. Half fill rocks glass with crushed ice and strain mixture into glass. Garnish with lemon slice.

name: Pink Squirrel
ingredients: 20 ml  White Crème de Cacao; 20 ml Crème de Noyaux; 37 1/2 ml Cream
description: Pour ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Pink Russian
ingredients: 90 ml Milk; 10 ml Crème de Cassis
description: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of a wine glass, and then top up with milk.

name: Pink Honey Martini
ingredients: 25 ml Honey Liqueur; 25 ml Vodka; splash of Cranberry Juice; dash of Sweet and Sour Mix
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass filled with ice.

name: Pink Grapefruit Margarita
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 25 ml Pink Grapefruit Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup; Lime Wheel
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thorughly, strain into a coupette glass and garnish with lime wheel.

name: Pink Lady
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 20 ml Applejack; 5 ml Lemon Juice; 2 dashes Grenadine Syrup; 1 Egg White; 1 Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with cherry.

name: Pink Elephant
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Amarula Cream; 25 ml Chocolate Liqueur; 75 ml Raspberry Puree; 50 ml Merlot; 75 ml Heavy Cream
description: Combine all ingredients, except cream and sugar, into shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a martini glass. In a separate shaker combine cream and sugar and shake vigorously without ice. Carefully layer the cream on top of the base. Garnish with a raspberry and mint sprig on the rim.

name: Pink Gin
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 3 dashes Angostura Bitters
description: Coat the sides of a chilled martini glass with Angostura bitters, add chilled gin and serve.

name: Pink Campari
ingredients: 25 ml Campari; 25 ml Rye Whisky; 5 Fresh Raspberries; splash of Pear Juice; splash of Cranberry Juice; splash of Sweet and Sour Mix; Lime Twist
description: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, and add all ingredients. Shake well and pour into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with skewered raspberries and lime twist.

name: Pink Flamingo
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Triple Sec; dash of Sloe Gin; Orange Juice
description: Pour the vodka, triple sec and sloe gin into a highball glass filled with ice. Top up with orange juice. Stir well.

name: Pineapple Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle White Wine; 75 ml Coconut Rum; 4 cups of Ginger Ale; 1/4 cup Sugar; 1 Orange and 1 Lemon sliced into wedges; 1 Diced Pineapple
description: Pour wine into a large pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon and orange into the white wine. Toss in the fruit wedges and pineapple then add sugar. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale, rum and ice just before serving.

name: Popper
ingredients: 25 ml Tequila; 25 ml Ginger Ale
description: Pour the ingredients into a shot glass. Cover the glass with a napkin and your hand. Slam the glass on the bar counter. Drink while its still fizzing.

name: Pontberry Martini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Crème de Mure;  50 ml Cranberry Juice; 3 Blackberries
description: Add all the ingredients into the mixing tin. Add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with 3 blackberries.

name: Pomspresso Tini
ingredients: 50 ml Espresso Vodka; 25 ml Pomegranate Juice; splash of Lime Juice; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters
description: Pour the espresso vodka and fruit juices into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a couple of dashes of Bitters.

name: Raspberry Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 25 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Lime Juice; 1/2 cup Raspberries
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with 1 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour the contents into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with fresh raspberries.

name: Raspberry Martini
ingredients: 65 ml  Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 12 Raspberries
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in the mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Raspberry Cosmopolitan
ingredients: 25 ml Citron Vodka; 25 ml Triple Sec; 37 1/2 ml Cranberry Juice; 6 Raspberries
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in a mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Raspberry Daiquiri
ingredients: 50 ml Light Rum; 25 ml Lime Juice; 2 spoons Caster Sugar; 6 Raspberries;
description: Add 5 raspberries and sugar into mixing glass. Muddle down both ingredients into a paste. Add other 2 ingredients and fill the mixing glass with cubed ice. Shake for 10 – 15 seconds. Double strain drink into a coupe glass. Garnish with a raspberry.

name: Raspberry Collins
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; Top-Up Soda Water; 12 Raspberries
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the gin in the mixing tin, add the lemon and sugar and lots of ice, shake, fine strain over ice and top up with soda water. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Raspberry Cobbler
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Cranberry Juice; 12 1/2 ml Vanilla Sugar Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 8 Raspberries
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in a mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. Garnish with lemon zest twist.

name: Raspberry Caipirinha
ingredients: 50 ml Leblon Cachaca; 6 Raspberries; dash of Lime Juice; 2 tablespoon Superfine Sugar
description: Place the raspberries and lime juice into an Old-Fashioned glass and add sugar on top. Muddle well. Fill the glass with ice, then add the cachaca. Stir well. Garnish with a raspberry.

name: Quentao
ingredients: 100 ml Cachaca; 100 ml Water; Sugar to taste; Peel of 2 Oranges and a Lime; Cloves and Cinnamon to taste
description: Caramelize the sugar with the spices and peels, then add the liquids. Boil for a few minutes then serve hot.

name: Raspberry Bellini
ingredients: 50 ml Leblon Cachaca; 6 Raspberries; dash of Lime Juice; 2 teaspoons Superfine Sugar;  top with Champagne
description: Muddle the raspberries, sugar and lime juice in a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice and add cachaca. Shake vigorously. Strain into a Champagne flute. Top with Champagne.

name: Rabo-de-Galo
ingredients: 20 ml Cachaca; 10 ml  Vermouth
description: Mix the 2 ingredients and serve staright up in large shot glass.

name: Ramos Gin Fizz
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Double Cream; 1 Egg White; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 15 ml Lime Juice; 20 ml Sugar Syrup; 4 drops Orange Flower Water; splash of Soda Water; Lemon Zest Twist
description: Add all ingredients into a shaker. Dry shake for 5 seconds. Add ice to the shaker and shake for up to 4 minutes to achieve the consistency desired for this drink. Add a dash of soda water to the bottom of a Collins glass and double strain the contents of the shaker into the glass. Zest the drink with a lemon twist and add into drink.

name: Purple Viking
ingredients: 25 ml Peach Liqueur; 25 ml Blue Curacao Liqueur; 25 ml Blueberry Liqueur; 25 ml Sloe Gin; splash of Lime Juice; splash of Sour Mix; splash of Lemon-Lime Soda
description: Pour the liqueurs, juice and sour mix into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well. Top with a splash of soda water.

name: Purple Hooter
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml  Lime Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir well. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Purple Haze
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; Cranberry Juice.
description: Pour the vodka and black raspberry liqueur into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice.

name: Purple Turtle
ingredients: 10 ml Gin; 10 ml Tequila; 10 ml Blue Curacao
description: Pour equal amounts of the ingredients into a cocktail  shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Pucker Up
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whisky; teaspoon Sugar Syrup; juice of 1 Lime; 2 Ginger Slices; dash Soda Water
description: Muddle the juice of 1 lime with 2 slices of ginger, the Angostura bitters and the sugar syrup. Strain into a lowball glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Fill as required with the soda water and stir before serving.

name: Problem Solver
ingredients: 50 ml Rye Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Cherry Heering; 5 ml Benedictine; Fernet Branca (to rinse glass); Orange Twist
description: In a cocktail mixing glass , add first three ingredients. Add ice, stir vigorously with a bar spoon  for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass which has been rinsed with Fernet Branca. Garnish with an orange twist, making sure to express the orange oil directly onto the surface of the cocktail.

name: Prince of Wales
ingredients: 15 ml Cherry Brandy; 15 ml  Lemon Juice; 1 Strawberry; 1 teaspoon Sugar; top-up of Champagne
description: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Pour into a Champagne glass and fill with Champagne.

name: Presbyterian
ingredients: 50 ml Scotch Whiskey; 50 ml Ginger Ale; 50 ml Soda Water
description: Pour Scotch whisky into a Collins glass, add 2 ice cubes, top up with ginger ale and soda water.

name: Prairie Fire
ingredients: 25 ml Tequila; couple of drops of Tabasco
description: Pour the tequila into a shot glass. Add drops of Tabasco to taste.

name: Rob Burns
ingredients: 50 ml Scotch whiskey; 20 ml Sweet Vermouth; dash of Orange Bitters; dash of Absinthe
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Roasted Toasty
ingredients: 10 ml Cinnamon Schnapps; 10 ml  Amaretto; 10 ml Coffee Liqueur
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Rosemary
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 37 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; Rosemary Sprig
description: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with sprig of rosemary.

name: Rose Royce
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 8 ml  Rose Syrup; 8 ml  Simple Syrup; 15 ml Lime Juice; 1 dash Angostura Bitters; 1/2 glass Champagne; Thyme Sprig
description: Shake ingredients well over ice in a mixing tin and pour into a Champagne flute half-filled with Champagne. Garnish with sprig of thyme.

name: Rose Kennedy Cocktail
ingredients: 30 ml Vodka; 30 ml Soda; 1 splash Cranberry juice; 1 Lemon Wedge
description: Pour vodka, soda water, and splash of the cranberry in rocks glass on ice. Garnish the beverage with lemon wedge.

name: Rose
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Cherry Brandy
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Rosabel
ingredients: 20 ml Sweet Vermouth; 20 ml Crème de Cassis; splash of Prosecco
description: Pour chilled sweet vermouth, and crème de cassis directly into a Champagne flute. Top with a splash of Prosecco.

name: Root Beer Float
ingredients: 25 ml Galliano; 25 ml Vanilla Liqueur; 25 ml Cream; Root Beer to fill; Whipped Cream; Cherry
description: Fill a tall glass with ice and add the liqueurs and cream. Top up with root beer. Garnish with a dollop of whipped cream and a cherry.

name: Ron Collins
ingredients: 50 ml Rum; 25 ml Lemon Juice; drizzle of Sugar Syrup; splash of Soda Water
description: Mix the rum, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water, garnish with maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Rock Lobster
ingredients: 25 ml Coconut Rum; 12 1/2 ml Banana Liqueur; dash of Grenadine Syrup; 1/2 ripe banana; dash of Pineapple Juice; dash of Orange Juice; Dark Rum to top
description: Pour all the ingredients except the dark rum into a blender with a cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled highball glass. Top up with dark rum.

name: Rob Roy
ingredients: 50 ml Scotch Whisky; 20 ml Sweet Red Vermouth; dash Angostura Bitters
description: Stir ingredients over ice in a mixing glass and fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.  Garnish with maraschino cherry and serve straight up.

name: Roasted Toasted Almond
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; 25 ml Amaretto; Cream
description: Build the vodka and liqueurs into an old fashioned glass filled with ice. Fill with cream. Shake by placing a mixing tin over the glass and giving it one or two good shakes.

name: Ripley
ingredients: 25 ml Citron Vodka; 25 ml Triple Sec; 12 1/2 ml  Lemon Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup; 12 Raspberries
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in the mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. Garnish with raspberry.

name: Rimbauds Left Hand
ingredients: 20 ml  Absinthe; 20 ml Benedictine; 20 ml Orange Liqueur; 20 ml Lemon juice; 20 ml Pineapple Juice; 1 Egg White; Rose Water
description: Combine all the  ingredients in a mixing glass, dry shake first without ice. Shake with ice and strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with drops of rose water in the center.

name: Reverb Crash
ingredients: 25 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml Light Rum; 100 ml Pink Grapefruit Juice; 20 ml ml Passion Fruit Syrup; 25 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Orgeat Syrup; Mint Leaves
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and fill with cubed ice. Shake hard for 10 seconds. Fill collins glass with crushed ice and strain mixture into glass. Garnish with fresh mint.

name: Rhett Butler
ingredients: 50 ml Southern Comfort; 12 1/2 ml Orange Curacao; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Reno
ingredients: 50 ml Grapefruit Juice; 25 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Grenadine Syrup; 1 teaspoon Sugar
description: Pour all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Resolution Martini
ingredients: 75 ml Gin; 25 ml Apricot Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Lemon juice
description: Pour the all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve.

name: Royal Bermuda
ingredients: 50 ml Gold Barbados Rum; 5 ml Triple Sec; 20 ml Falernum; 25 ml Lime Juice
description: Mix all the ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into the cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Sake Bomb
ingredients: 565 ml Beer; 25 ml Sake
description: The shot of sake is dropped into the beer, causing it to fizz violently. Drink should be consumed immediately.

name: Saigon Cooler
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 75 ml Cranberry Juice; 20 ml Lime Juice; 8 Raspberries
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the gin in the mixing tin, add the other ingredeints and lots of ice, shake and fine strain over lots of ice. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Sabai Sabai
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Mekhong; 37 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 20 ml Simple Syrup; pinch of  Sweet Thai Basil; Soda Water
description: Pour the Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients, except soda water, into a mixing glass. Add ice and shake vigorously for 7-8 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Top off with soda water.

name: Rusty Nail
ingredients: 50 ml Scotch Whisky; 25 ml Whiskey Liqueur
description: Add whiskey and drambuie to rocks glass. Half fill with ice and give a quick stir. Add a couple more ice cubes. Serve.

name: Russian Spring Punch
ingredients: 25 ml  Vodka; 5 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup; Top-Up Champagne; Mixed Berries
description: Add the first four ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice, shake thoroughly, strain and top up with Champagne.

name: Russian Sunrise
ingredients: 45 ml Vodka; 90 ml Orange Juice; 15 ml Grenadine Syrup; Orange Slice
description: Pour the vodka and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine syrup, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish and serve.

name: Russian Quaalude
ingredients: 25 ml Hazelnut Liqueur; 25 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 25 ml Vodka
description: Pour the hazelnut liqueur into a shot glass. Float the Irish cream liqueur on top of the first layer. Float the vodka on top of the second layer.

name: Russell Collins
ingredients: 30 ml Jagermeister; 15 ml Lemon Juice; drizzle of Sugar Syrup; splash of Soda Water
description: Mix the Jagermeister, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice. Top up with soda water, garnish and serve.

name: Rum Swizzle
ingredients: 100 ml Goslings Black Seal Rum; 50 ml Goslings Barbados Rum; juice of 2 Lemons;  125 ml pineapple juice; 125 ml orange juice;  50 ml Bermuda  falernum ; 6 dashes Angostura Bitters
description: Mix in pitcher with crushed ice, shake vigorously until a frothing head appears. Strain into cocktail glasses. Garnish with a slice of orange . Serves 6.

name: Rum Punch
ingredients: 2 shots Light Rum;3 shots Orange Juice;1 shot Lime Juice; 1/2 shot Sugar Syrup; Top-Up Lemonade
description: Add the first 4 ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain over lots of ice and top-up with lemonade. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Rum Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Light Rum; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Grenadine Syrup; dash of Sugar Syrup
description: Add all of the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into chilled martini glass.

name: Rum Runner
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Aged Rum; 20 ml White Rum; 12 1/2 ml Creme de Banane; 12 1/2 ml Creme de Mure; 15 ml Pineapple Juice; 15 ml Orange Juice; Orange slice
description: Chill down rocks glass with ice and soda. Add all ingredients into mixing tin. Add ice to mixing tin and shake hard for 10 seconds. Add fresh ice into rocks glass and strain the drink into the glass. Garnish with orange slice.

name: Ruby Martini
ingredients: 1 shot Citron Vodka; 1 shot Triple Sec; 1 1/2 shots Pink Grapefruit Juice; 1/4 shot Sugar Syrup ; Lemon Wheel
description: Add all the ingredeints to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with lemon wheel.

name: Ruby Negroni
ingredients: 25 ml  Gin; 12 1/2 ml Campari; 12 1/2 ml Tawny Port; 5 ml Raspberry Syrup; 75 ml Prosecco; Raspberry
description: Stir in a mixing glass and strain into a flute. Top with Prosecco and garnish with a raspberry.

name: Ruby Manhattan
ingredients: 50 ml Rye Whiskey ; 20 ml Port; dash Angostura Bitters
description: Stir  over ice in a mixing glass and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Rubus
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 37 1/2 ml Orange Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 2 dashes Orange Bitters; 7 Raspberries
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in the mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Royal Widow
ingredients: 30 ml Crown Royal whiskey; 30 ml  Amaretto
description: Pour both ingredients over ice into a chilled cocktail glass and serve.

name: Royal Smash
ingredients: 50 ml Royal Combier; 4 chunks Fresh Lemon; 6 Mint Leaves
description: Muddle mint leaves and lemon wedges in a mixing glass. Add Royal Combier and ice and shake hard. Strain over ice in a rocks glass and garnish with a fresh mint sprig.

name: Royal Manhattan
ingredients: 50 ml Crown Royal Canadian Whiskey; 20 ml Sweet Red Vermouth; dash Angostura Bitters
description: Stir over ice in a mixing glass and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry and served straight up.

name: Shirley Temple
ingredients: 100 ml Ginger Ale; 50 ml Orange Juice; splash Grenadine Syrup; Maraschino Cherry
description: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well for 10 -1 5 seconds and strain into cocktail glass. Serve with ice.

name: Sherry Cobbler
ingredients: 100 ml Sherry; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; 3 Orange Slices; 6 Blueberries
description: Place the sherry, orange and syrup into a cocktail shaker filled with crushed ice. Shake well. Pour unstrained into a tall glass. Garnish with pile of fresh blueberries and serve with straw.

name: Sherron Collins
ingredients: 30 ml Gin; 15 ml Lemon Juice; drizzle of Sugar Syrup; splash of Soda Water; large splash Orange Juice
description: Mix the gin, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water and a large splash of orange juice, garnish and serve.

name: Shamrocked
ingredients: 50 ml Melon Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Irish Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml  Irish Cream Liqueur
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Shamrock Smoothie
ingredients: 50 ml Melon Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; splash of Orange Curacao; juice of 2 Limes
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake until frothy. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Sex on the Beach
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka / 25 ml Peach Schnapps / 40 ml Orange Juice / 20 ml Cranberry Juice / Orange Slice for Garnish
description: The Sex on the Beach cocktail is a very popular mixed drink which is the epitome of easy drinking. This fruity highball is a mix of vodka, peach schnapps, orange juice and cranberry juice and tends to be very popular on hot summer evenings on the beach. There is another version of the Sex on the Beach cocktail which is made with vodka, Chambord, Melon liqueur, pineapple juice and cranberry juice. Although this drink is predominantly served as a highball, some bars will also serve it as a shooter. One popular variation of the Sex on the Beach is a

name: Shady Grove Cooler
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup; Top-Up Ginger Ale; Lime Wheel
description: Add the first 3 ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain over lots of ice and top-up with ginger ale. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Seven and Seven
ingredients: 25 ml Seagrams Seven Crown Whisky; 150 ml 7-Up Soda
description: Pour whisky into Collins glass filled with ice. Fill to desired level with 7-Up soda. Stir lightly.

name: Seasonal Breeze
ingredients: 2 shots Vodka; 3 shots Cranberry Juice; 2 shots Apple Juice
description: Add all the ingredients  over lots of ice in a Collins glass, stir with bar spoon and garnish with a freshly cut apple slice.

name: Sea Breeze
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 50 ml Cranberry Juice; 37 1/2 ml Grapefruit Juice; Lime Slice
description: Pour cranberry into glass first filled with ice. Dry shake the vodka with grapefruit and layer on top of the cranberry. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Screw-Up
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 100 ml Orange Juice; splash of Lemon - Lime Soda
description: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Add a splash of lemon-lime soda on top. Garnish and serve.

name: Screwdriver
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 100 ml freshly squeezed Orange Juice; Lime wedge
description: Add vodka into highball glass and fill up to the top with ice. Squeeze a lime wedge into drink and rim glass. Top up with freshly squeezed orange juice. Add straw and serve.

name: Screaming Viking
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 25 ml Dry Vermouth; 25 ml Lime Juice; Celery Stalk; Cucumber Spear
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a celery stalk and cucumber spear.

name: Screaming Orgasm
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Coffee Liqueur
description: Pour first vodka, then Irish cream, then coffee liqueur into a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Stir and serve.

name: Scotch Whiskey Skin
ingredients: 50 ml Scotch Whisky; 1 piece of Lemon Peel; boiling water
description: In a coffee cup add Scotch whiskey. Fill 1/2 way with water. Garnish with lemon peel.

name: Scorpion
ingredients: 20 ml Brandy; 20 ml Light Rum; 20 ml Dark Rum; 5 ml Triple Sec; 37 1/2 ml Orange Juice; juice of half a Lime; Lime wedge
description: Squeeze the lime juice into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Add all the other ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass with ice cubes. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Scarlet O`Hara
ingredients: 50 ml Southern Comfort; dash of Lime Juice; Cranberry Juice; Lime Wedge
description: Pour the Southern Comfort and lime juice into a Collins glass filled with ice. Fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Silver Bullet
ingredients: 30 ml Gin; 20 ml Scotch Whiskey; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass. Squeeze the lemon twist over the shot then hang it on the rim as a garnish.

name: Scooby Snack
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Coconut Rum; 12 1/2 ml Crème de Banane; 12 1/2 ml Melon Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Pineapple Juice; 37 1/2 ml Whipped Cream
description: Pour rum, crème de banane, melon liqueur and pineapple juice into a stainless steel shaker over ice. Add whipped cream, and shake, until well mixed and sufficiently chilled. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass and serve.

name: Smith and Wesson
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; 50 ml Half and Half; fill-up of Soda Water
description: Pour the coffee liqueur , vodka and half-and-half into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with soda water.

name: Spiders Kiss
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Melon Liqueur; 37 1/2 ml Vodka; Juice from 1/2 a Lemon; Chocolate Syrup; Grenadine Syrup; Chocolate Dipped Orange Slice
description: Draw a chocolate web into a martini glass. Place in freezer and chill. Shake all ingredients and strain into a glass. For a blood effect drizzle grenadine syrup down the side of the glass. Garnish with a chocolate dipped orange slice.

name: Spicy Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle Red Wine; 50 ml Rum; 2 cups Citrus Cola; 1 Lime; 1 Lemon; 1 Orange; 1 Mango cut into wedges; 2 teaspoons Cholula Hot Sauce; 1 Chilli Pepper
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lime, lemon and orange into the wine. Toss in the fruit wedges and add diced mango, honey , rum and hot sauce to the mix. Chill overnight. Add citrus soda just before serving.

name: Spiced Pear Caiprini
ingredients: 50 ml Leblon Cachaca; 50 ml Pear Nectar; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; slice of Ginger; pinch of Nutmeg; pinch of Cinnamon
description: Muddle the ginger in a cocktail shaker. Fill the shaker with ice and add cachaca, nectar and lemon juice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a pinch of nutmeg and cinnamon.

name: Sparkling Wine Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle of Sparkling Wine; 50 ml Triple Sec; 2 cups of Raspberries; 1/4 cup Sugar
description: Combine all four ingredients in a pitcher and then serve immediately, so that you don’t lose your bubbles in your sparkling wine.

name: Southern Sunrise
ingredients: 45 ml Southern Comfort; 90 ml Orange Juice; 15 ml Grenadine Syrup; Orange Slice
description: Pour the Southern Comfort and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine syrup, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish and serve.

name: Spanish Coffee
ingredients: 20 ml Brandy;  5 ml Coffee Liqueur; Coffee; Whipped Cream
description: Brew coffee and then add brandy and coffee liqueur. Top up the coffee with whipped cream.

name: Southern Bride
ingredients: 70 ml Gin; 25 ml Grapefruit Juice; dash of Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry. Serve.

name: Soul Trip Tipple
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Guava Nectar; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 2 dashes Bitters; 3 Fresh Raspberries
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a well chilled white wine glass with raspberries dropped in the bottom.

name: Sour Witch
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Absinthe; 20 ml  Almond Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 4 Pitted Sour Cherries; Champagne; Grated Nutmeg
description: In the bottom of a mixing glass muddle the sour cherries in the lime juice and the almond syrup. Add the absinthe with ice and shake very well. Strain into a chilled Champagne flute. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Soul Manhattan
ingredients: 50 ml Rye Whiskey; 20 ml Absinthe; dash Angostura Bitters
description: Stir over ice in a mixing glass, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish, and serve straight up.

name: Soul Kiss
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Whiskey; 25 ml Dry Vermouth; 20 ml Orange Juice; 20 ml Dubonnet
description: Stir all the ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Something Blue
ingredients: 50 ml Hpnotiq; 50 ml  White Wine; 25 ml Ginger Ale
description: Build all the ingredients in a Champagne flute.

name: Sombrero
ingredients: 50 ml Coffee Liqueur; Cream
description: Pour the coffee liqueur into an ice filled Old- Fashioned glass.  Slowly stir the ice and liqueur for about 15 seconds and then carefully float the cream by pouring it over the back of a bar spoon and into the drink. Serve immediately.

name: Soda Shop Cola
ingredients: 200 ml Cola; 1/4 teaspoon Vanilla Extract; 1/2 teaspoon Cherry Juice; Lemon Wedge
description: Fill a highball with ice. Add cherry juice and vanilla extract. Top off with cola. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Snowshoe
ingredients: 20 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 20 ml Peppermint Schnapps;
description: Pour all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Snowball
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Advocaat; top-up of Lemonade; Lemon Slice
description: Place one ice cube in the glass and add Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

name: Snickertini
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 37 1/2 ml Caramel Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Chocolate Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Amaretto; splash of Cream; Caramel Sauce; Chocolate Sauce
