description: Drizzle a thin line of both the chocolate and caramel sauce on the inside of a rocks glass and place in a refrigerator to chill. Combine all ingredients into a shaker and shake over ice. Pour entire contents of shaker into glass and add straw.

name: Sneaky Pete
ingredients: 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; 25 ml Rye Whiskey; 100 ml Milk
description: Pour the coffee liqueur into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice cubes. Add the milk and rye whiskey. Stir well.

name: Sweet Sunrise
ingredients: 100 ml Orange Juice; dash Grenadine Syrup; Orange Slice
description: Fill a highball glass with ice and orange juice. Slowly pour grenadine syrup over the juice , it will sink to the bottom and slowly rise to the top of the drink. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Tennessee Cowboy
ingredients: 25 ml Tennesse Whiskey; 70 ml Energy Drink; dash of Lemonade
description: Build the drink over ice, stir with barspoon and serve in a highball glass.

name: Tequila Slammer
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 50 ml Lemon- Lime Soda
description: Mix drink in a rocks glass and serve straight up.  For fun leave about a fifth of the glass empty to allow the drink to fizz, then hold a hand over the top of the glass and slam it onto a hard surface to mix it. The slamming action releases gas bubbles from the mixed drink causing it to foam vigorously. It will then quickly escape the glass if not drunk immediately.

name: Teachers Pet
ingredients: 25 ml Scotch Whiskey; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; Milk
description: Pour the Scotch whiskey and coffee liqueur into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Shake by placing a mixing tin over the glass and giving it one or two good shakes.

name: Tartini
ingredients: 50 ml Raspberry Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 37 1/2 ml Cranberry Juice; 12 Raspberries
description: Begin by gently muddliung the strawberries with the raspberry vodka in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Tangerine Margarita
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 25 ml Orange Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Tangerine Juice; Salt
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with salt.

name: T`n`T
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila;  100 ml Tonic Water
description: Mix ingredients in a highball glass with wedge of lime and ice.

name: Tall Black Russian
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 20 ml Coffee Liqueur and splash of Cola
description: Pour the ingredients into the Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently and add splash of cola.

name: Tamagozake
ingredients: 3/4 cup Sake; drizzle of Honey; 1 raw Egg Yolk
description: Whisk the raw egg yolk and honey into 3/4 cup of hot sake.

name: Sweet City
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 25 ml Vermouth; 25 ml Apricot Brandy; Orange Zest
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a strip of orange zest.

name: Super Sleigh
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Xante; Lime Juice; Lemon-Lime Soda; Lime Wedge
description: Pour Xante over ice in highball glass. Fill with lemon-lime soda. Squeeze lime wedge and drop into glass.

name: Super Fruity Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle of White Wine; 50 ml Apricot Brandy; 2 cups Ginger Ale; 1/2 cup Lemonade; 1/2 cup Sugar; Lemon; Orange; Lime; Peach all cut into slices and 1 cup of Sliced Strawberries
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon, orange and lime into the wine. Toss in the fruit wedges and add sliced peaches, strawberries limeade/lemonade, sugar and brandy. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale and ice just before serving.

name: Sundowner
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Coconut Rum; 125 ml Pineapple Juice; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters
description: Shake all ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Sunburst
ingredients: 30 ml Vodka; dash of Triple Sec; Grapefruit Juice
description: Mix vodka and grapefruit juice in a rocks glass over ice and add dash of triple sec.

name: Strawmerry
ingredients: 1 shot Vodka; 1 shot Triple Sec; 1 shot Orange Juice; 1/2 shot Lemon Juice; 1/4 shot Sugar Syrup; 8 Strawberries
description: Gently muddle the strawberries with the vodka in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake, fine strain and garnish with a strawberry.

name: Strawberry Margarita
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup; 8 Strawberries
description: Gently muddle the strawberries with the tequila in the mixing tin. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake, fine strain and garnish with a strawberry.

name: Strawberry Daiquiri
ingredients: 37 `1/2 ml Bacardi Rum; 12 1/2 ml Strawberry Liqueur; 25 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 1 Strawberry
description: Add all ingredients into a Boston Shaker and fill with ice. Shake for about 15 seconds and then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Strawberry Flapper
ingredients: Chilled Champagne; 4 dashes of Crème de Cassis; 8 Fresh Strawberries hulled
description: Briefly blend the strawberries in a blender. Add the crème de cassis and 10 ice cubes and blend until smooth. Fill two Champagne flutes halfway with the strawberry blend. Top off with Champagne.

name: Strawberry  Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle Rose Wine; 1/2 cup White Sugar; 1 1/2 cups Strawberry Lemonade; 1 cup Sliced Strawberries; 2 cups Ginger Ale
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and add sliced strawberries. Next add sugar, strawberry lemonade and stir gently. Add ginger ale and ice just before serving.

name: Stoplight
ingredients: 75 ml Vodka; dash of Melon Liqueur; dash of Cranberry Juice; dash of Orange Juice
description: Place three shot glasses on the bar. Pour one shot of vodka in each. Add a splash of cranberry to the first shot glass. A shot of orange to the next and a splash of melon liqueur to the third. Serve.

name: There Will Be Rum
ingredients: 1 ounce Cocont Rum; 1 ounce Ruby Red Grapefruit Juice; dash of Grenadine Syrup; Chilled Champagne; Strawberry Slice
description: Shake the rum, grapefruit juice and grenadine syrup in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a Champagne glass. Fill up with Champagne.Garnish with strawberry slice on the rim.

name: Tootsie Roll
ingredients: 17 1/2 ml Chocolate Vodka; 7 1/2 ml ounces Amaretto; Chocolate Syrup
description: Pour the ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Tomate
ingredients: 25 ml Pastis; 10 ml Grenadine Syrup
description: Mix ingredients in an Old-Fashioned glass and serve.

name: Tom & Jerry
ingredients: 1 dash Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Rum; 1 whole Egg White; 1 whole Egg Yolk; 1 teaspoon Sugar
description: Beat the sugar into the egg yolk, add the rum and incorporate the egg white. Transfer into a coffee mug and fill with boiling water. Add the brandy and garnish with grated nutmeg.

name: Tom Collins
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; splash Soda Water
description: Chill highball glass with soda. Add the three ingredients into a mixing tin and fill tin up with ice. Shake for 10 -15 seconds. Taste. Fill highball with ice. Single strain into highball glass. Top up with soda and add straw. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Toasted Almond
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Amaretto; 37 1/2 ml Coffee Liqueur; 25 ml Cream
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into ice filled Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Tiki Bar Margarita
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 25 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml  Almond Sugar Syrup; Pineapple Wedge
description: Add all the ingredients into a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into rocks glass over lots of crushed ice and churn. Garnish with pineapple slice.

name: Tijuana Manhattan
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 20 ml Sweet Red Vermouth; dash Angostura Bitters
description: Stir over ice in a mixing glass, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with maraschino cherry, and serve straight up.

name: Tiger Tail
ingredients: 10 ml Coffee Liqueur; 10 ml Orange Liqueur; 10 ml Peppermint Schnapps
description: Layer the ingredients in order in a shots glass.

name: Three Wise Men
ingredients: 10 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 10 ml Scotch Whiskey; 10 ml Tennesse Whiskey
description: Mix the three spirits together in a shot glass and down immediately.

name: The Spy Who Loved Me
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Absinthe; 37 1/2 ml Vodka; Red Bull
description: Pour absinthe and vodka into a Collins glass filled with ice and stir.Top with energy drink.

name: Ti Punch
ingredients: 40 ml Rhum Agricole; 10 ml Cane Syrup; 1/2 Lime quartered
description: Squeeze the lime well into the glass and drop in the remaining lime shells . Barely cover the lime with cane sugar. Add the rum and mix it with a bar spoon.

name: The Snow Honey
ingredients: 25 ml Brandy; 100 ml Hot Milk; teaspoon Clover Honey; grated Nutmeg
description: Combine all the ingredients and serve hot in a mug with grated nutmeg.

name: The Rickey
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 1/2 Lime; dash of  Sparkling Mineral Water
description: Combine the gin, lime and shell in a highball glass. Add ice, stir and then add sparkling mineral water.

name: The Raven
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Rum; 25 ml Blue Curacao; 12 1/2 ml Chambord
description: Pour the vodka, rum and blue curacao into a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Slowly pour the Chambord over the back of a barspoon so it floats on top.

name: The Phlump
ingredients: 50 ml Jameson Irish Whisky; splash of Ginger Ale
description: Pour whiskey into Collins glass filled with ice. Fill to desired level with ginger ale. Stir lightly.

name: The Monkey Gland
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 37 1/2 ml Orange Juice; dash Absinthe; dash Grenadine Syrup
description: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: The Modernista
ingredients: 50 ml Scotch Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml  Dark Jamican Rum; 1 teaspoon Absinthe; 12 1/2 ml Swedish Punsch; 12 1/2 ml Fresh Lemon juice; 2 dashes of Orange Bitters.
description: Add ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice and shake. Strain into cocktail glass. Add twist of lemon.

name: The Hyp Fairy
ingredients: 20 ml Absinthe; 12 1/2 ml Hpnotiq; splash Sour Mix
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Union Square
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 2 1/2 Strawberries; Basil sprigs; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 25 ml Agave Nectar;
description: Muddle the strawberries with the basil until fully mashed in a cocktail shaker. Add all other ingredients. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with 1/2 strawberry.

name: Victorias Secret
ingredients: 50 ml Crème de Fraises; 25 ml Citrus Vodka; 25 ml Lemon Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Ward 8
ingredients: 45 ml Bourbon Whisky; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 15 ml Orange Juice; 15 ml Grenadine Syrup
description: Shake all ingredients in mixer  with ice. Strain into ice-filled Old-Fashioned glass to serve on the rocks.

name: Voodoo
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Tia Maria; dash of Rum Cream; 12 1/2 ml 151 Rum
description: Pour the Tia Maria into a shot glass. Float the rum cream on top of the Tia Maria. Pour the 151 proof rum on top of the rum cream.

name: Wahine
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Light Rum; 25 ml Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; Mint Sprig
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly for 10 seconds. Strain into rocks glass and garnish with fresh mint sprig.

name: Vodka McGovern
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 50 ml Soda Water; 50 ml Orange Juice
description: Combine the ingredients in a highball glass. Pour over the crushed ice with a squeeze of lime on top.

name: Virgin Miami Vice
ingredients: 25 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Coconut Cream; 25 ml Half and Half;  37 1/2 ml  Strawberry Puree; 37 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Simple Syrup; Strawberry
description: Place the pineapple juice, coconut cream, half & half and half cup of ice in blender. Blend the mixture until smooth. Pour the mixture into a highball glass. Place the strawberry puree, lime juice, simple syrup, and the remaining half cup of ice into a blender. Blend the mixture until smooth. Slowly pour the strawberry-lime mix over the back of a barspoon on top of the coconut-pineapple mixture. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Vieux Carre Cocktail
ingredients: 25 ml Rye Whiskey; 25 ml Cognac; 25 ml Sweet Vermouth; dash Peychauds; Bitters; dash of Angostura Bitters; 12 1/2 ml Benedictine; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the whiskey, Cognac and vermouth into an Old-Fashioned glass half – filled with ice. Add the bitters. Add the Benedictine then stir four times with a bar spoon. Squeeze the lemon over the drink then drop it into the glass.

name: Vienna Soother
ingredients: 100 ml Coffee; 50 ml Cream; 5 ml Chocolate Syrup; 1/4 teaspoon Cinnamon
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass. Top with whipped cream and shaved chocolate.

name: Virgin Mary
ingredients: 90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashs Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into glasses with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk .

name: Vesper Martini
ingredients: 60 ml Gin; 20 ml 100 Proof Vodka; 10 ml Kina Lillet
description: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet and garnish with a thin slice of lemon peel.

name: Very Berry Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle Red Wine; 50 ml Blackberry Liqueur; 300 ml Ginger Ale; 1/2 cup Sugar; 1/2 cup each of Raspberries; Blackberries; Blueberries and Strawberries
description: Toss the wine, the berries, the blackberry liqueur and the sugar in a pitcher, cover and place in the refrigerator overnight. Pour in a bottle of chilled ginger ale just prior to serving. Add ice in either the pitcher or individual glasses.

name: Vertigo
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 50 ml Averna Liquer; Ginger Ale; Lime Wedge
description: Stir lemon juice and ginger ale over ice in a highball glass. Float Averna on top. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Vermouth Cassis
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 20 ml Crème de Cassis; Soda Water
description: Pour the creme de cassis and vermouth into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir. Fill the glass with soda water and stir again.

name: Velvet Hammer
ingredients: 50 ml Triple Sec; 50 ml Coffee Liqueur; 50 ml Half and Half
description: Pour the liqueurs into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir. Gently top with half and half.

name: Valkyrie
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 25 ml Vanilla Sugar Syrup
description: Add all ingredients into mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into glass over lots of ice. Garnish with lemon slice.

name: Valencian Water
ingredients: 700 ml Cava; 50 ml Gin; 50 ml Vodka; 200 ml Orange Juice; pinch Sugar
description: Squeeze a glass of orange juice into a pitcher. Add a bottle of semi-dry cava. Add vodka and gin. Add sugar according to taste and put in refrigerator to chill.

name: Va Va Voom
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 20 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; top up Champagne
description: Add the first three ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain and then top up with Champagne. Garnish.

name: Un-Goa
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml White Rum; dash of Lime Juice
description: Pour the tequila into the shot glass, then the rum and finally the lime juice.

name: Yellow Fairy
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Limoncello;  5 ml Absinthe; dash of Aromatic Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Yellow Bird
ingredients: 25 ml Light Rum; 25 ml Dark Rum; 5 ml Galliano; juice of 1/2 Lime; 30 ml Orange Juice; Maraschino Cherry
description: Squeeze the lime juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Add all of the remaining ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a Collins glass with crushed ice. Garnish with the cherry.

name: Yashmak
ingredients: 50 ml Whiskey; 20 ml Dry Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Pernod; several dashes of Angostura Bitters; Sugar Syrup to taste
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled highball glass filled with ice.

name: Yale Cocktail
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Gin; 1 teaspoon Blue Curacao; 1 dash Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Xalapa Punch
ingredients: 2 cups Hot Black Tea; 1 cup Honey; 1000 ml Amber Rum; 1000 ml Apple Brandy; 1000 ml Dry Red Wine; Oranges; Lemons
description: In a sauce pan over low heat, combine the hot black tea and rind of two oranges (grate with carrot peeler or cheese grater). Heat for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool. Add the honey and stir until dissolved. Pour into a punch bowl with ice. Add the amber rum, apple brandy and dry red wine. Garnish with diced oranges and lemons.

name: WooWoo
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Peach Schnapps; 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 90 ml Cranberry Juice
description: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir with bar spoon for 15 seconds and serve.

name: Wolf Bite
ingredients: 50 ml Absinthe; 50 ml Melon Liqueur; 50 ml Lemon-Lime Soda; 37 1/2 ml Pineapple Juice; drizzle of Grenadine Syrup
description: In a cocktail shaker add absinthe, melon liqueur, pineapple juice and ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a 50 ml shot glass. Splash lemon-lime soda on top and a drizzle of grenadine syrup.

name: Witch Hunt
ingredients: 50 ml Scotch Whisky; 25 ml Dry Vermouth; 10 ml Strega Liquer; 50 ml Lemonade
description: Build in an Old- Fashioned glass 3/4 full of ice. Stir.

name: Witch Doctor
ingredients: 50 ml Dark Rum; 100 ml Dr.Pepper; Lime Wedge
description: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Winter Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Rum; juice of 1/2 Lime; 1 teaspoon Sugar; 1 teaspoon Ginger Liqueur; 1 teaspoon Pimento Dram; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters
description: Pour the rum, juice, sugar and liqueurs into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Add dashes of bitters on top.

name: Widows Cork
ingredients: 50 ml Jameson Irish Whiskey; 25 ml Amaretto
description: Fill an Old-Fashioned glass part way with ice. Add ingredients to the glass and stir gently with bar spoon.

name: White Wine Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle of White Wine; 50 ml Brandy; 2/3 cup White Sugar; 3 Sliced Oranges; 1 Lemon and 1 Lime both Sliced; 500 ml Ginger Ale
description: Pour wine into the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the orange,lemon and lime into the wine, add brandy if desired. Toss in the fruit wedges and add sugar. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale or club soda just before serving.

name: White Lightning Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle White Wine; 1/2 cup Vodka; 1/2 cup White Grape Juice; 1/2 cup Sugar; 1/2 cup Sliced Grapes; 1 Green Apple Sliced; 1/2 Pineapple Sliced;  2 cups Ginger Ale
description: Pour wine and vodka in the pitcher and add sliced grapes, tangerine and pineapple. Next add sugar and stir gently. Chill mixture for at least one hour. Add ginger ale just before serving.

name: White Christmas Dream
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Amaretto; 25 ml Heavy Cream; Nutmeg
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a grated nutmeg on top.

name: White Lady
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Triple Sec; 25ml Lemon Juice; Lemon Rind
description: Mix the ingredients in a shaker which is half full of ice. Strain and serve in a sugar-rimmed glass. Garnish with a strip of lemon rind.

name: White Carnation
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Peach Schnapps; 50 ml Orange Juice; Soda Water; splash of Cream; Orange Slice
description: Pour the vodka, schnapps and orange juice into a mixing glass filled with ice. Top with soda water and a splash of cream. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: White Christmas
ingredients: 100 ml Egg Nog; 12 1/2 ml White Chocolate Liqueur; 25 ml Southern Comfort; Chocolate Flakes
description: Build the ingredients into a snifter glass and stir lightly. Sprinkle chocolate flakes over drink to garnish.

name: White Canadian
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 20 ml Coffee Liqueur; 30 ml Goats Milk
description: Pour coffee liqueur and vodka into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Float goats milk on top and stir slowly.

name: Whispers of the Frost
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Whiskey; 37 1/2 ml Port; 37 1/2 ml Sherry; 1 teaspoon Sugar; 5 Blueberries; 2 Strawberries
description: Pour the drinks in a wine goblet filled with ice. Add sugar to taste. Stir. Garnish with blueberries and strawberries both in the drink and on the rim.

name: Southside
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Lime Juice; 35 ml Soda Water; 2 dashes Grapefruit Bitters; 2 Bar Spoons Superfine Sugar; 6 Mint Leaves
description: Add ingredients to a tall glass and stir to begin dissolving the sugar. Add crushed ice and muddle with a bar spoon. Top up with crushed ice, add 2 straws and garnish with mint.

name: Seve Ballesteros “Al Rojo Vivo”
ingredients: 150 ml Rioja Crianza; 15 ml PX Sherry; 15 ml Apple Brandy ; 2 bar spoons Seville Orange Marmalade; 3 dashes Spanish Bitters
description: Add all ingredients into a Boston Shaker and fill with cubed ice. Shake well for about 10 seconds and then strain into a red wine goblet. Fill with cubed and then crushed ice and garnish lavishly with orange, red apple and mint.

name: Arathusa
ingredients: 50 ml White Rum; 20 ml Manzanilla Sherry; 20 ml Lime Juice; 20 ml Pineapple Syrup; Maraschino Cherry
description: Add all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake for 10 seconds. Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Alaska Cocktail
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 20 ml Yellow Chartreuse; 3 drops Orange Bitters; Orange Zest Twist
description: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir with a bar spoon to dilute and chill the drink. Pour into a cocktail glass and zest the drink and the glass using an orange zest twist. Serve straight up.

name: “Blue Dog” Zombie
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Plantation Overproof Rum;12 1/2 ml Goslings Bermudan Dark Rum;12 1/2 ml Chairman's Reserve Spiced Rum;12 1/2 ml Chairmans Reserve White Rum;12 1/2 ml Gabriel Boudier Apricot Brandy;12 1/2 ml Gomme Syrup; 25 ml Lime Juice; 25 ml Orange Juice; 25 Pineapple Juice; 1 Passion Fruit
description: Quarter the passion fruit and scoop out 3 quarters into a mixing tin. Add gomme syrup and lime juice and muddle together with the passion fruit pulp. Add all other ingredients and fill with ice. Shake for 10 seconds and then strain into a hurricane glass half filled with cubed ice. Top up with crushed ice and the garnish with a quarter of passion fruit.

name: Deep Purple
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Beetroot Syrup; 5 ml Orgeat Syrup; Beetroot Slices; Rosemary Sprig
description: Add Tequila, Lemon Juice, Orgeat, Beetroot Syrup into Boston shaker and full with ice. Shake for about 10 seconds. Single strain into a martini glass. Garnish with couple of slices of beetroot, sprig of rosemary and add a straw.

name: Toblerone Martini
ingredients: 25 ml Baileys Irish Cream; 12 1/2  ml Kahlua; 12 1/2 ml Frangelica; Dash of Honey; 25 ml Cream; 25 ml Milk; Chocolate Powder
description: Chill martini glass with ice and soda water. Add all ingredients into a Boston shaker and fill with ice. Shake for about 10 seconds and strain into the martini glass. Cover the drink with chocolate powder.

name: Blue Grass Sour
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Woodford Reserve Bourbon; 15 ml Bitter Truth Apricot Brandy Liqueur; 20 ml of freshly squeezed Lemon Juice; Quartered Orange; glug of Egg White; Orange Wheel
description: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Quarter the orange and squeeze the juice into the shaker. Fill the shaker with ice and shake hard for 30 seconds to ensure the egg white is well mixed. Double strain the drink into a small barrel tumbler and garnish with an orange wagon wheel.

name: Ultra Violet
ingredients: 25 ml Tanqueray Gin; 12 1/2 ml Suave Pomegranate Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Lejay Parfait Amour; 5 ml Elderflower Cordial; 25 ml Lemon Juice; Dash of Gomme Syrup; 6 muddled Rosemary Leaves; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the gin, pomegranate liqueur and parfait amour into boston shaker, then add the elderflower cordial, lemon juice and a dash of gomme. Pick 6 leaves from a sprig of rosemary and add to other ingredients. Fill shaker with ice and shake well. Double strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Watermelon Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Gomme Syrup; 4 chunks Watermelon; Watermelon wedge
description: Peel 4 chunks of watermelon and then muddle in a mixing glass. Add remaining ingredients into mixing glass. Fill the mixing glass to the top with cubed ice and then shake for 10 seconds. Double strain into martini glass. Garnish with watermelon wedge.

name: Guinness Daiquiri
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gold Rum; 12 1/2 ml Orange Liqueur; 25 ml Lime Juice; 25 ml Sugar Syrup; 25 ml Guinness
description: Add rum, orange liqueur, lime juice and sugar syrup into Boston shaker and fill with ice. Shake for about 10 seconds. Double strain into a chilled martini glass. Fill a full measure with Guinness and, using a bar spoon, gently layer the Guinness on to the drink.

name: Rum Bongo
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Rum; 12 1/2 ml Apricot Brandy; 50 ml Guava Juice; 50 ml Mango Juice; 50 ml Orange Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Passion Fruit Syrup; Orange Slice; Cherry
description: Add all ingredients into mixing tin and top-up with cubed ice. Shake hard for 10 seconds. Fill hurricane glass with cubed ice and pout in the mixture. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

name: Tommy`s Margarita
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 25 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml; Lemon Slices; Blackberry
description: Add all 3 ingredients to a mixing tin. Add ice to mixing tin and rocks glass. Shake for 10 – 15 seconds and then strain into rocks glass. Garnish with 2 lemon slices and blackberry.

name: Tequila Sazerac
ingredients: 45 ml Tequila; 15 ml Rye Whiskey; 15 ml Absinthe; 2 drops Angostura Bitters; 3 drops Orange Bitters; Grapefruit Peel
description: Begin by adding ice, soda water and absinthe to rocks glass. Then add bar spoon of sugar to mixing glass and add bitters. Muddle ingredients into a paste. Add tequila and rye whiskey. Stir with a bar spoon for 20 seconds to dilute the drink. Taste. Discard the absinthe, ice and water from the rocks glass and strain the drink straight up into the glass. Zest the drink and the rim of the glass with some grapefruit rind.

name: Silver Ghost
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Rum; 12 1/2 ml  Velvet Falernum; 25 ml Lime Juice; 25 ml Apple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Rock Candy Syrup; 2 Cardamom Pods; dash Egg-White; Lime Wheel
description: Crush 2 cardamom pods in the bottom of Boston shaker. Add all remaining ingredients to shaker and dry shake for 5 – 10 seconds. Fill shaker with ice and then shake again for 10 seconds. Fine strain into glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

name: Zorbatini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Ouzo; Greek Olive
description: Pour the vodka and ouzo into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a Greek olive.

name: Zurracapote
ingredients: 1 Bottle Red Wine ; 1 Cinnamon Stick ; 1 cup Brown Sugar; 1 Lemon Peel; 4 ounces Dried Plums; 4 ounces Raisins; 10 ounces Dried Peaches
description: In the medium saucepan, combine brown sugar, wine, lemon peel and cinnamon. Bring this mixture to boil, and reduce heat, and simmer for five minutes, stirring continuously. Drain fruit & carefully add to your wine mixture. Cover the saucepan with lid & simmer for fifteen minutes on the low heat. Remove from the heat and let it sit for 2 to 3 hours prior to serving and Zurracapote can also be served cold or hot, like desired.

name: Blackberry & Apple Crumble Bramble
ingredients: 37.5 ml Gin; 5 ml Crème de Cassis; 75 ml Cloudy Apple Juice; 12.5 ml Lemon Juice; 2 dashes Vanilla Syrup; 12 Blackberries
description: Muddle the blackberries in a jug until they are a fine pulp. Add the gin, apple juice, lemon juice and vanilla syrup in a cocktail shaker along with a couple of ice cubes. Sieve the blackberries into the shaker too. Shake all the ingredients for about 15 seconds in cocktail shaker. Blend the sugar and cinnamon together on a small plate. Coat the rim of the Collins glass with lemon juice to moisten it and then roll it in the sugar so it coats the rim. Pour the cocktail into the glass, and top up with a teaspoon of creme de cassis.

name: Plum & Vanilla Fizz
ingredients: 37.5 ml Gin; 25 ml Double Cream; 25 ml Plum and Vanilla Purée; 12.5 ml Lemon Juice; Full Egg White; Dash of Soda
description: Add all ingredients, except soda, into Boston tin. Shake ingredients hard and fast for 15 seconds without ice to emulsify the egg white. Add ice and shake hard for another 15-20 seconds. Add a dash of soda to a chilled Collins glass. Pour cocktail over the soda so that it “fizz’s” up through the drink. To garnish, dip a straw or stirrer in red food colouring (unflavoured) and stir a ring around the centre of the glass going out.

name: Passion Fruit Daiquiri
ingredients: 25 ml Bacardi Rum; 25 ml Passoa; 25 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 1 Passion Fruit
description: Add all ingredients into Boston shaker with lots of ice and shake for about 15 seconds. Shake and fine strain into a chilled martini glass and then garnish with passion fruit shell.

name: Orange Chocolate Dream
ingredients: 45 ml White Chocolate Liqueur; 30 ml Baileys Irish Cream; 20 ml Orange Liqueur; 2 Teaspoons Cocoa Powder; 1 Teaspoon Bar Sugar; 1 Orange Twist
description: Mix the cocoa powder and sugar on a small plate. Dampen the rim of a martini glass and swirl in the powder mixture to rim. Add the chocolate liqueur and Baileys to a cocktail shaker filled most of the way with ice and shake for about 20 seconds. Strain the mixture into a martini glass and float the orange liqueur on top. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Manhattan
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon; 10 ml Sweet Vermouth; 10 ml Dry Vermouth; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters; Orange peel
description: Chill cocktail glass with ice and soda. Fill a mixing glass with ice and then add all ingredients. Using a bar spoon, stir the drink for approximately 20 seconds. When stirring, always ensure the glass is topped up with ice.Taste and then strain into the chilled cocktail glass, serving straight up. Zest the drink and glass with the orange peel and then twist and place in glass.

name: Chocolate-covered Cherry
ingredients: 30 ml Baileys Cream Liqueur; 30 ml Coffee Liqueur; 1 Tablespoon Grenadine Syrup
description: Pre-measure your ingredients into separate shot glasses. Pour the grenadine into a rocks glass first.

name: Raspberry Mojito
ingredients: 50 ml White Rum; 15 ml Raspberry Liqueur; 25 ml Lime Juice; 35 ml Soda Water; 2 Bar Spoons Superfine Sugar; 5 Raspberries; 8 Mint Leaves
description: Add all your ingredients into a tall glass with crushed ice and churn, to dissolve the sugar and chill the drink. Top up with crushed ice. Add straw and garnish with raspberry.

name: Old Fashioned
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters; 1 dash Orange Bitters; 1 bar spoon Sugar; Orange peel
description: Begin by chilling rocks glass with ice and soda water. Add 1 bar spoon of sugar into mixing glass. Add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters and 1 dash of orange bitters. Muddle to break down the sugar into a paste. Add the bourbon into a mixing glass and fill the rest of the mixing glass with ice. Stir with bar spoon for at least 20 seconds. Top up with ice and taste. Put ice into rocks glass and strain the drink into the glass. Zest the glass with orange peel and add twist into drink.

name: Espresso Martini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vanilla Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Kahlúa; Double Espresso; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 3 Coffee Beans
description: Add all ingredients into a Boston cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake hard for up to 30 seconds to achieve the desired consistency of the drink. Double strain the contents of the shaker into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with 3 coffee beans.

name: White Russian
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; 15 ml Cream; 15 ml Milk; Chocolate Powder; Coffee Bean
description: For the perfect White Russian recipe add coffee liqueur to an old-fashioned glass. Add other ingredients to mixing tin and fill to brim with ice. Shake for 10 -15 seconds. Single strain the ingredients over the ice and coffee liqueur. Sprinkle with chocolate powder and garnish with coffee bean.

name: Raspberry Ripple
ingredients: 25 ml Raspberry Vodka; 25 ml Vanilla Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 50 ml Half & Half; 6 Raspberries
description: Add all ingredients into Boston mixing glass and fill with ice. Shake hard for about 15 seconds. Using sugar syrup as a glue, dip the edge of a martini glass into hundreds of thousands. Double strain the liquid into the rimmed glass.

name: Zipperhead
ingredients: 30 ml Vodka; 30 ml Chambord; 30 ml Lemon-Lime Soda
description: Build the ingredients in a chilled Old Fashioned glass with ice.

name: The Nirvana
ingredients: 10 ml Vanilla Syrup; 15 ml Coconut Syrup; 50 ml Strawberry Puree; 50 ml Single Cream; Raspberry
description: Fill a large glass or beer mug with crushed ice. Add all the ingredients one by one and stir until well mixed. Garnish with a raspberry and serve with a straw.

name: Zipper
ingredients: 10ml Grand Marnier; 10 ml ounce Tequila; 10 ml Irish Cream Liqueur
description: Pour the Grand Marnier into a shot glass. Float the tequila on top of the Grand Marnier.Top with the Irish cream liqueur.

name: Zombie
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gold Rum; 25 ml White Rum; 25 ml Dark Rum; splash of 151 proof Rum; 12 1/2 ml Apricot Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; 37 1/2 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Lime Juice; Mint sprig and Orange wedge
description: Mix all ingredients, other than the 151 rum, in a shaker with ice. Pour into glass and top with the high-proof rum. Garnish with mint sprig and orange wedge.

name: Zen Latte
ingredients: 15 ml Green Tea Liqueur; 60 ml Steamed Milk; Matcha Powder for garnish
description: Pour the green tea liqueur into an ice coffee glass. Top with steamed milk. Stir well. Garnish with matcha powder.

name: Zanzibar
ingredients: 60 ml Dry Vermouth; 30 ml Plymouth Gin; several dashes of Orange Bitters; 20 ml Lemon Juice ; 1 teaspoon Simple Syrup; Lemon Peel
description: Pour the ingredients into a shaker with cracked ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass.Twist the lemon peel over the top of the drink and drop it in the glass.

name: Zambodian
ingredients: 10 ml Vodka; 10 ml Blackberry Brandy; 10 ml Pineapple Juice
description: Pour equal amounts of the ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Zambeer
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Sambuca; 375 ml Root Beer
description: Pour the sambuca into a highball glass with ice. Top with root beer.

name: Z-28
ingredients: 10 ml Green Crème de Menthe; 10 ml Banana Liqueur; 10 ml Tequila
description: Pour the crème de menthe into a shot glass. Float the banana liqueur on top. Top with tequila.

name: Z Street Slammer
ingredients: 30 ml Rum; 20 ml Banana Liqueur; 20 ml Pineapple Juice;  5 ml Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the rum, banana liqueur, pineapple juice and grenadine syrup into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Yule Mule
ingredients: 50 ml Light Rum; 70 ml Cranberry Juice; Top-Up Ginger Beer; Mixed Berries
description: Build the cocktail in a glass over lots of ice. Add all the ingredients and stir. Garnish with mixed berries.

name: Yorsch
ingredients: 250 ml Beer; 25 ml Vodka
description: Mix ingredients thoroughly and drink quickly.

name: Yellow Submarine
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml White Rum; 12 1/2 ml Banana Liqueur; Banana Slice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a banana slice.

name: Whiskey Smash
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 25 ml Simple Syrup; 1/4 Lemon cut into 3 pieces; 4 Spearmint Sprigs;
description: In a mixing glass add mint and lemon. Muddle thoroughly to release juice and oils. Add simple syrup and whisky. Add ice. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Whiskey Sour
ingredients: 45 ml Bourbon Whisky; 30 ml Lemon Juice; 15 ml Gomme Syrup
description: Shake with ice. Strain into ice-filled Old-Fashioned glass to serve on the rocks.

name: Whiskey Cobbler
ingredients: 75 ml Whiskey; 25 ml Simple Syrup; Soda Water; Lemon Slice; Cherry
description: Build the ingredients in an Old-Fashioned glass filled with crushed ice. Stir. Add cherry and lemon slice.

name: Watermelon Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 25 ml Triple Sec; 12 1/2 Lime Juice; 1/2 cup Seeded Watermelon; Watermelon Wedge
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour contents into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with a watermelon wedge.

name: Wedding Cake
ingredients: 20 ml Gin; 20 ml Amaretto; 5 ml Orange Juice; 5 ml Pineapple Juice; 5 ml Cream
description: Pour the gin, amaretto, orange juice, pineapple juice and cream in a blender with ice. Blend well. Pour into a hurricane glass.

name: Warm Old-Fashioned
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whisky; Angostura Bitters; Soda Water; Hot Water; Sugar Cube; Maraschino Cherry; Orange Slice
description: Place one sugar cube into the bottom of an Old-Fashioned glass and add 3 dashes of Angostura bitters directly to the sugar cube as much as possible. Add one orange slice, one cherry and a splash of soda water and muddle thoroughly. Remove the fruit remanants. Add 2 ounces of bourbon, ice and top off with warm water. Garnish with fresh orange slice and cherry.

name: Weep No More
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Dubonnet Rouge; 37 1/2 ml Brandy; 1/4 teaspoon Maraschino Liqueur; juice of 1/2 a lime
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktails shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Wedding Belle
ingredients: 20 ml Gin; 20ml Dubonnet Rouge; 12 1/2 ml Cherry Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Orange Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Watermelon Wave
ingredients: 100 ml Tequila; 75 ml Orange Liqueur; 75 ml Maraschino Liqueur;  500 ml Watermelon Juice; 50 ml Pomegranate Juice; 50 ml Lemon Juice; Watermelon wedges.
description: Pour the ingredients into a pitcher. Stir well. Strain the mixture into goblets over ice. Garnish with cubes of watermelon.

name: Washington Apple
ingredients: 25 ml Canadian Whiskey; 25 ml Sour Apple Schnapps; 25 ml Cranberry Juice; Apple Slice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with apple slice.

name: U-Boot
ingredients: 565 ml Beer; 25 ml Vodka
description: The shot of vodka is dropped into the pint of beer then consumed quickly.

name: Twilight Dove
ingredients: 25 ml Cranberry Juice; 75 ml Grape Juice; 1 teaspoon Agave Nectar; Lavendar Soda
description: Pour the juices and nectar into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Top with lavendar soda.

name: Tropical Cooler
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Pomegranate Liqueur; 25 ml Melon Liqueur; spoonful of Coconut Milk; splash of Pineapple Juice;
description: Combine all ingredients in a blender with cup of ice. Blend well. Pour into a well-chilled margarita glass.

name: Tropical Colada
ingredients: 1/4 cup Coconut Milk; 1 tablespoon Lime Juice; 1 can of Diet Lemon-Lime Soda
description: In a large glass, add coconut milk, lime juice, and ice. Fill the rest of the glass with the soda.

name: Trojan Horse
ingredients: 250 ml Stout Beer; 250 ml Cola
description: Pour the stout beer into a pint glass. Top with the cola.

name: Torpes
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 50 ml Cranberry Juice; 20 ml Lime Juice
description: Add all ingredients to mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain. Garnish with mixed berries.

name: Toronha
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 50 ml Grapefruit Juice; 1 tablespoon Grenadine Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with ice. Blend well. Strain into a chilled sour glass.

name: Tornado
ingredients: 25 ml Whiskey; 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Rum; 25 ml Tequila; Cola; 1 teaspoon Sugar
description: Stir the liquors with ice. Strain into a Collins glass. Add sugar and stir again. Add ice then cola. Stir three times and serve with a straw.

name: Toro Rojo
ingredients: 25 ml White Rum; 1 can Red Bull; 3 teaspoons of Turbinado Sugar; 8 Mint Leaves; 1 Lime
description: Muddle the mint and sugar together in a tall glass, and then squeeze the lime in. Mix gently and then top glass with ice. Add in rum and then top glass with energy drink.

name: The French Pearl
ingredients: 50 ml Plymouth Gin; 5 ml Absinthe; 20 ml Lime juice; 20 ml Rock Candy Syrup; Mint Sprig
description: Muddle mint with the rest of the ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: The Flirt
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 20 ml Apricot Brandy; 25 ml Cranberry Juice; 20 ml Lime Juice
description: Add all the ingredients into the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain.

name: The Communist
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Cherry Brandy; 25 ml Orange Juice; 20 ml Lemon Juice
description: Add all the ingredients into a mixing tin and fill with ice. Shake thoroughly, strain and garnish with a cherry.

name: The Coutesan
ingredients: 10 ml Absinthe; 10 ml Southern Comfort; 10 ml Lime Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail  shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: The Blenheim
ingredients: 30 ml Brandy; 20 ml Yellow Chartreuse; 10 ml Lillet; 10 ml Dubonnet; 10 ml Orange Juice
description: Shake ingredients together with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: The Adjustable Rate
ingredients: 20 ml Tequila; 20 ml  Blackberry Rum; 10 ml Pineapple Coconut Liqueur; 45 ml Pineapple Juice; splash of Orange Juice; Pineapple
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with pineapple.

name: Texas Prairie Fire
ingredients: 20 ml Tequila; Lime Juice; splash Tabasco Sauce; splash Lime Juice
description: Pour tequila in a shot glass, top off with lime juice and then add a splash of Tabasco sauce.

name: Tequila Sunrise Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 37 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 12 1/2 ml Grenadine Syrup; 25 ml Orange Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sour Mix; Lime Wheel; Salt
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with one cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour contents into a chilled margarita glass rimmed with salt. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Tequila Sunset
ingredients: 45 ml Tequila; 90 ml Orange Juice; 15 ml Blackberry Brandy; Orange Slice
description: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the blackberry brandy, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish with orange slice and serve.

name: Tequila Sunrise
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 80 ml Orange Juice; dash Grenadine Syrup; Lime wedge; Orange slice
description: Add tequila into highball glass. Top up with ice. Add freshly squeezed orange juice , squeeze of lime and dash of grenadine syrup.

name: Stone Fence Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters; Apple Cider to top
description: In a double rocks glass add the bourbon and bitters and fill with ice. Top with apple cider. Stir once with a spoon to incorporate the ingredients and serve.

name: Stone Wall
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; Soda Water to top
description: In a highball glass add bourbon and ice. Add simple syrup, stir briefly. Top up with soda water and serve.

name: Stone Sour
ingredients: 15 ml Apricot Brandy; 15 ml Orange Juice; 15ml Sweet and Sour Mix
description: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled sour glass.

name: Stinger
ingredients: 45 ml Brandy; 20 ml White Crème de Menthe
description: Pour the ingredients into an Old-Fashioned glass with crushed ice. Stir well.

name: Staten Island Ferry
ingredients: 50 ml Coconut Rum; 50 ml Pineapple Juice
description: Stir ingredients together with bar spoon and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Star Cocktail
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Apple Brandy; 37 1/2 ml ounces Sweet Vermouth; 3 dashes Angostura Bitters; 2 dashes Gum Syrup; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Starry Lime
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Apple Vodka; 25 ml Cranberry Juice; 5 Basil leaves torn; Juice of 1/2 a Lime
description: Add apple vodka, cranberry juice, basil and lime juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a fresh basil leaf.

name: St. Paddys Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle White Wine; 50 ml Irish Whisky; 2 cups Ginger Ale; 1/2 cup Sugar; 2 Green Apples cut into wedges; 1 Orange and 1 Lemon cut into wedges
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon and orange into the wine. Toss in the wedges of orange, lemon and apple (leaving out seeds if possible) and add sugar, lime juice and whiskey. Chill overnight. Add club soda or ginger ale just before serving.

name: Springbok
ingredients: 30 ml Green Crème de Menthe; 5 ml Amarula Cream; dash of Cream
description: Layer the Amarula gently on to the crème de menthe and then add a thin layer of cream.

name: Spring Fever
ingredients: 20 ml Lemon Juice; 20 ml Mango Syrup; 37 1/2 ml  Apple Juice; 50 ml Blood Orange Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a Collins glass half filled with crushed ice.

name: Smith and Kearns
ingredients: 50 ml Coffee Liqueur; 50 ml Cream; top-up Soda Water
description: Pour the coffee liqueur and cream into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with soda water.

name: Slippery Nipple
ingredients: 15 ml Sambuca; 15 ml Cream Liqueur
description: Pour the sambuca into a shot glass, then pour the Irish cream liqueur on top so that the two liquids do not mix.

name: Slammer Royale
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 50 ml Champagne;
description: Mix all ingredients in a rocks glass and serve straight up.

name: Skyscraper Manhattan
ingredients: 70 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Sweet Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 1 dash Old Fashioned Bitters; Top-Up Ginger Ale
description: Add the first 3 ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain over lots of ice and top-up with ginger beer. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Skittle Bomb
ingredients: 25 ml Triple Sec; 250 ml Red Bull
description: The triple sec is poured into a shot glass, and the shot glass is then dropped into the energy drink.

name: Ski Lift
ingredients: 25 ml Peach Schnapps; 25 ml Coconut Rum; Hot Chocolate; Whipped Cream; Shaved Coconut
description: Pour the schnapps and rum into an Irish coffee glass. Fill the glass with hot chocolate. Top with whipped cream. Sprinkle coconut flakes on top of cream.

name: Singapore Sling
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Cherry Heering; 12 1/2 ml Benedictine; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 2 dashes Orange Bitters; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters; dash Soda Water; Lemon slice
description: Chill highball glass with soda water. Add all ingredients into mixing tin and fill with ice. Shake hard for 10 seconds. Taste. Top up the highball glass with ice and single strain the drink into glass. Top up with soda water, add straw and garnish with lemon slice.

name: Silk Stocking
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Chambord; 12 1/2 ml Crème de Cacao; 12 1/2 ml Cream
description: Pour the ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Savoy Corpse Reviver
ingredients: 25 ml Brandy; 25 ml Fernet Branca; 25 ml white Crème de Menthe
description: Shake all ingredients together with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: SideCar
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Cognac; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 20 ml Lemon Juice; dash Egg White; 5 ml Sugar Syrup; Orange peel
description: Chill a coupe glass with soda water. Add all the ingredients to a mixing tin and dry shake for 10 seconds. Add ice to the tin and shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Taste. Fine strain ingredients into chilled coupe glass. Zest orange peel into the drink and place orange twist into glass.

name: Sazerac
ingredients: 50 ml Rye Whiskey; 5 ml Absinthe; 3 dashes of  Peychauds Bitters; Sugar Cube; Lemon Peel
description: One rocks glass is packed with ice and water to chill the glass. In a second rocks glass, muddle the sugar cube with the bitters. Add the rye to this mixture. Stir to combine. Empty the ice from the first glass. Pour the absinthe into the glass and swirl to coat the sides of the glass. Any excess absinthe is discarded. Pour the rye/sugar/bitters mixture into the coated glass. Twist a lemon peel over the glass and rub the rim of the glass with the peel. The peel can be discarded or placed in the cocktail.

name: Satans Whiskers
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Grand Marnier; 25 ml Dry Vermouth; 25 ml Sweet Vermouth; 25 ml Orange Juice; 2 dashes Orange Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Savoy Affair
ingredients: 25 ml  Peach Brandy; 25 ml Fraise de Bois Liqueur; 25 ml Lime Juice; 25 ml Passion Fruit Juice; Top-Up Champagne
description: Shake ingredients together with ice, and strain into a cocktail glass, and fill with Champagne and garnish.

name: Saturn
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 5 ml Passion Fruit Syrup; 5 ml Falernum; 5 ml Orgeat Syrup; 15 ml Lemon Juice; Lemon Wheel; Mint
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin with a scoop of crushed ice. Transfer into blender and blend on high speed for 3 – 4 seconds. Fill sling glass with cubed ice and pour drink straight in and top up with crushed ice. Garnish with lemon wheel and some fresh mint.

name: Saratoga Brace Up
ingredients: 50 ml Brandy; 2 dashes Absinthe; 4 dashes Lemon Juice; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters; 1 teaspoon Simple Syrup; 1  Egg; Soda Water
description: Pour all the ingredients , except the soda water, into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a highball glass. Top with soda water.

name: Santa Shot
ingredients: 20 ml Green Crème de Menthe; 20 ml Peppermint Schnapps; 20 ml Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the grenadine syrup in a shot glass. Float the green crème de menthe on top and then float the peppermint schnapps on top of this. Make sure to pour the drinks slowly for the desired effect and use a bar spoon to help with layering if necessary

name: Saketini
ingredients: 70 ml Gin; 5 ml Sake; Olive
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive. Serve.

name: Salty Dog
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 20 ml Dry Sherry; 37 1/2 ml Grapefruit Juice; 15 ml Sugar Syrup; Salt; Grapefruit Zest
description: Prep a margarita glass by dipping half the rim in salt. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker and shake with ice for about 10 seconds. Double strain into the salted glass. Zest the top of the drink with some grapefruit.

name: Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle of Red Wine; 25 ml Brandy; 2 cups Ginger Ale; 2 tablespoons Sugar; 1 Lemon cut into wedges; 1 Orange cut into wedges
description: Pour wine in the pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon and orange into the wine. Toss in the fruit wedges and add sugar and brandy. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale or club soda just before serving.

name: Sake Screwdriver
ingredients: 50 ml Sake; 150 ml  Orange Juice
description: Mix the two ingredients in a mixing tin with ice and pour into a highball glass with 3 ice cubes. Serev chilled.

name: Royal Hawaiian
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 25 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 5 ml Orgeat Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; Lemon Slice; Mint Leaves
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and fill with cubed ice. Shake thoroughly for 10 seconds. Fill rocks glass half full with crushed ice and strain ingredients into glass. Garnish with lemon slice and fresh mint.

name: Royal Duchess
ingredients: 100 ml Champagne; 50 ml Pomegranate Juice
description: Add the pomegranate juice to Champagne flute and top up with Champagne.

name: Royal Arrival
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Creme de Noyaux; 12 1/2 ml Kummel; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; dash of Egg White; dash of Vegetable Extract
description: Shake ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve.

name: Roy Rogers
ingredients: 150 ml cola; 5 ml Grenadine Syrup; Maraschinio Cherry;
description: Pour the ingredients into a Collins glass filled with ice. Stir well. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Rosy Rum Cosmo
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Limon Rum; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 1 Tablespoon Lime Juice; 1/2 tablespoon Cranbery Juice; Fresh Mint Leaves
description: Pour the rum, triple sec, lime juice and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the mint leaf.

name: Rourou
ingredients: 25 ml Pastis; 10 ml Strawberry Syrup
description: Mix ingredients and serve in Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Rosy Dawn
ingredients: 20 ml Gin; 20 ml Cherry Brandy; 20 ml Triple Sec; 20 ml Lime Juice; Cherry
description: Add all the ingredients to a mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a cherry.

name: Rossini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Strawberry Puree; Top-Up Champagne
description: Add the strawberry puree to the Champagne flute. Top up with Champagne and gently stir.

name: Rosemary Mac
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Scotch Whiskey; 37 1/2  ml Sweet Red Vermouth;  Rosemary Sprig
description: Pour ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes and stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with sprig of rosemary.

name: RedHeaded Slut
ingredients: 50 ml Jagermeister; 50 ml Peach Schnapps; Cranberry Juice
description: Combine Jägermeister and schnapps in glass full of ice. Add cranberry juice to fill to top. Stir as necessary and serve iced cold.

name: Red Sea Sunrise
ingredients: 45 ml Lemonade; 45 ml Orange Juice; 45 ml Pineapple Juice; 15 ml Grenadine Syrup; Orange Slice
description: Pour the lemonade, orange juice and pineapple juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine syrup, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish and serve.

name: REDRUM
ingredients: 60 ml Mekhong; 1/2 cap Rose Syrup; 6 Brandy Cherries; 25 ml Egg Whites; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; Sprinkle Nutmeg; Rose Petal
description: Coat martini glass with rose syrup. Muddle brandy cherries and add egg whites, fresh lime juice, simple syrup, and dry shake (no ice). Add ice and Mekhong and shake again. Pour into martini glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top and garnish with rose petal.

name: Red Corvette
ingredients: 30 ml Melon Liqueur; 30 ml Hazelnut Liqueur; 4 Strawberries
description: Blend all ingredients in a blender with a cup of ice and then pour into a hurricane glass.

name: Red Lotus
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml  Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Lychee Liqueur; 25 ml Cranberry juice
description: Pour the vodka, lichido and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice.

name: Red Beer
ingredients: 350 ml Beer; 50 ml Tomato Juice; Salt to taste
description: Pour the tomato juice into a beer mug. Fill with beer. Add salt to taste.

name: Rasputin
ingredients: 50 ml Raspberry Vodka; 70 ml Cranberry Juice; 37 1/2 ml Grapefruit Juice
description: Build the cocktail in Collins glass over lots of ice. Stir for 10 seconds with bar spoon and serve.

name: Red Cloud
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 20 ml Apricot Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 5 ml Grenadine Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients into the mixing tin with lots of ice.  Shake thoroughly and fine strain into a martini glass. Garnish with lemon zest twist.

name: Raspberry Press
ingredients: 50 ml Red Raspberry Vodka; splash of Soda Water; spash of Lemon-Lime Soda; Lime Wedge
description: Pour the ingredients into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice. Pour the contents into a cocktail shaker. Pour back into the glass. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Porto Flip
ingredients: 15 ml Brandy; 40 ml Port; 10 ml Egg Yolk
description: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into chilled cocktail glass, garnish and serve.

name: Very Berry Mule
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 25 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; Top-Up Ginger Beer; 12 Raspberries
description: Gently muddle the raspberries with the vodka in the mixing tin, add the other ingredients and lots of ice, shake and fine strain into the glass over lots of ice and top up with ginger beer. Garnish with raspberries.

name: Pompanski Martini
ingredients: 45 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 37 1/2 ml Grapefruit Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup; dash Dry Vermouth
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with orange zest twist.

name: Pomegranate Poinsettia
ingredients: 25 ml Pomegranate Liqueur; 25 ml Orange-Flavoured Liqueur; 25 ml Orange Juice; 75 ml Champagne
description: Mix the first three ingredients in a tumbler glass with ice. Slowly add the Champagne, stirring gently.

name: Raspberry Truffle
ingredients: 25 ml Premium Vodka; 20 ml Coffee Liqueur;  20 ml Chambord; Fresh Whipped Cream
description: Pour the vodka, coffee liqueur and chambord into a cocktail shaker with ice.  Shake well. Strain into a chilled tall wine glass. Top with a pile of fresh whipped cream.

name: Porch Crawler
ingredients: 400 ml Vodka; 400 ml Rum; 10 cans Light-Tasting Beer; 1 can Frozen Lemonade Concentrate
description: Combine all ingredients in a water cooler with ice. Adjust beer quantity to taste. Serve in plastic cups.

name: Pomegranate Gin Fizz
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Pomegranate Liqueur; juice from 1/2 Lime; 1 bar spoon Lavendar Simple Syrup; 1 Egg White; Soda Water
description: Pour the spirits, juice, syrup, and egg white into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously to ensure egg white is mixed thoroughly with the other ingredients. Strain into a chilled highball glass with ice cubes. Top off with soda water.

name: PornStar
ingredients: 15 ml Blue Curacao; 15 ml Raspberry Liqueur
description: Pour both ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass and serve.

name: Pineapple Mojito
ingredients: 75 ml Rum; 25 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Pineapple Juice; 2 slices Pineapple; 4 Lime Wedges; 6 Mint Leaves; Mint Sprig
description: Muddle the pineapple, lime and mint in the bottom of a cocktail shaker. Fill the shaker with ice and add the other ingredients. Shake for 10 seconds and strain all ingredients into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Pineapple Punch
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Light Rum; 12 1/2 ml Dark Rum; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 5 ml Almond Sugar Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 75 ml Pineapple Juice
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a Collins glass. Garnish with pineapple slice.

name: Pina Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 45 ml Pineapple Juice; 5 ml  Lime Juice; dash Sugar Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass.  Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Phil Collins
ingredients: 100 ml Lemon-Lime Soda; 50 ml Freshly Squeezed Lemon Juice; drizzle of Sugar Syrup; splash of Soda Water
description: Mix the lemon-lime soda, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water, garnish with maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Pina Colada
ingredients: 50 ml White Rum; 100 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Coconut Cream; 25 ml Cream; Pineapple Slice; pinch of Salt
description: Chill highball glass. Add all ingredients to mixing tin and fill with ice. Shake vigorously for 10 – 15 seconds. Fill highball glass with fresh ice and strain drink into glass. Garnish with pineapple slice, add straw and serve.

name: Perroquet
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Pastis; 1 dash Mint Liqueur; Water
description: Pour pastis and mint liqueur over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with cold water. Stir well and serve.

name: Perfect Manhattan
ingredients: 50 ml Rye Whiskey; 10 ml Sweet Red Vermouth; 10 ml Dry Vermouth; dash Angostura Bitters
description: Stir over ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a maraschino cherry. Serve straight up.

name: Perfect Storm
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Grand Marnier; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 75 ml Ginger Beer; 3 drops Angostura Bitters; Lime Wedge
description: Combine Grand Marnier, lime juice, and bitters in a mixing glass. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain over fresh ice into a highball glass. Top with ginger beer and swirl. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: New York Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Canadian Whiskey; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 1 teaspoon Sugar; 1/2 teaspoon Grenadine Syrup ; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.

name: New Orleans Fizz
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 30 ml Simple Syrup; 50 ml Half and Half; 1 Egg White; 2 dashes Orange Flower Water; Soda Water
description: Place all the ingredients except the soda water into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with soda water.

name: Nevada Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Light Rum; 50 ml Grapefruit Juice; 25 ml Lime Juice; 2 teaspoons Superfine Sugar; dash of Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Negroni
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 25 ml Sweet Red Vermouth; 25 ml Campari; Orange Peel
description: Chill rocks glass with ice and soda water.Fill mixing tin to rim with ice and add in all ingredients. Stir with bar spoon for 20 seconds. Taste. Add fresh ice to rocks glass and strain the drink into glass. Zest glass with orange peel, twist and place in drink.

name: Navy Grog
ingredients: 50 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml Light Rum; 20 ml Lime Juice; 50 ml Pink Grapefruit Juice; 12 1/2 ml Runny Honey; Top-Up Soda
description: Add all ingredients in mixing tin and top-up with ice. Shake hard for 10 seconds. Fill glass with crushed ice and pout in mixture. Garnish with a cherry.

name: Mistletoe Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 50 ml Orange Juice; 75 ml Chilled Cranberry Tea; 20 ml Lemon Juice; 3 teaspoons Sugar
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into two chilled cocktail glasses.

name: Missouri Mule
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 50 ml  Applejack; 25 ml Campari; 25 ml Triple Sec; 50 ml Lemon Juice
description: Shake all ingredients together with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Minnehaha
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 20 ml Sweet Vermouth; 20 ml Dry Vermouth;5 ml Orange Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Mint and Honey Daiquiri
ingredients: 50 ml Light Rum; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 2 spoons of Runny Honey; 3 Mint Leaves
description: Stir the honey into the rum and lime juice in a mixing tin until it has dissolved. Add the mint and muddle gently , shake with lots of ice and fine strain into chilled martini glass.

name: Mind Eraser
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur; Soda Water; Lime Wedge
description: Fill the Old-Fashioned glass with ice. Pour the vodka and coffee liqueur over ice. Fill with soda water. Garnish with a lime wedge and serve with a straw.

name: Mimosa
ingredients: 75 ml Champagne; 75 ml Orange Juice
description: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, and then mix together in a Champagne flute.  Add the sparkling wine first, and then top with orange juice. This way, the cocktail mixes together on its own and won’t make a sticky mess at the top of the glass. No need to stir as this will cause the wine to become flat.  Serve cold.

name: Millenium
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml  Cherry Brandy; 37 1/2 ml  Orange Juice; Ginger Ale
description: Pour the gin, cherry brandy and orange juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a splash of ginger ale.

name: Milk and Honey
ingredients: 50 ml Benedictine; Milk
description: Pour Benedictine into a mug, add ice and top up with cold milk. Garnish with cinnamon.

name: Midori Sour
ingredients: 25 ml Melon Liqueur; 25 ml Sweet and Sour mix; 50 ml Lemon and Lime Soda;
description: Fill a tumbler with ice. Add the melon liqueur, sour mix, and lemon and lime soda, give a quick stir.

name: Midnight Snowstorm
ingredients: 50 ml White Crème de Menthe; 12 1/2 ml Green Crème de Menthe; Hot Chocolate; Whipped Cream
description: Pour white crème de menthe and hot chocolate into an Irish coffee glass. Top with whipped cream. Drizzle the green crème de menthe on top.

name: Melancia Sour
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Cachaca; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Grass Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 37 1/2 ml Water Melon Juice
description: Stir and strain into a chilled sour glass. Add pinch of sea salt and lemongrass stalk as garnish.

name: Maya Magic
ingredients: 25 ml Pineapple Vodka; 25 ml Vanilla Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Triple-Sec; 12 1/2 ml  Cranberry Juice; Pineaqpple Slice
description: Pour ingredients into cocktail shaker and add crushed ice. Let stand for five seconds then shake vigorously for five seconds. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

name: May Day
ingredients: 25 ml Rum; 2  Pitted and Chopped Peaches; 4 Strawberries Cubed; 2 Passionfruit Flesh and Seeds; 100 ml Cloudy Apple Juice; 1 tablespoon Sugar;  2 teaspoons Grated Fresh Ginger; Apple Fan
description: Blend all the ingredients together with crushed ice. Pour the mix equally into two highball glasses. Garnish with an apple fan.

name: Matador
ingredients: 25 ml Blanco Tequila; 50 ml Pineapple Juice; juice of 1/2 a Lime
description: Mix all the ingredients in a shaker half full of ice and shake for 10 seconds. Strain and serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Massey
ingredients: 25 ml Irish Whiskey; 25 ml Gin; 20 ml  Sweet Vermouth; 5 ml Green Chartreuse; 3 ml Campari; Orange Twist
description: In a mixing glass, add all ingredients except orange twist. Add ice, stir vigorously for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: MasterMix
ingredients: 30 ml Jagermeister; 20 ml Dry Vermouth; dash of Angostura Bitters; Cherry
description: Combine all ingredients with ice in a mixing glass and stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add cherry to garnish.

name: Mauresque
ingredients: 30 ml  Pastis; 10 ml Orgeat Syrup
description: Mix ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice for 10 seconds. Strain and serve in Old-Fashioned glass.

name: Martinez
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 20 ml Sweet Vermouth; 5 ml Maraschino Liqueur; 1 dash Angostura Bitters; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist the lemon peel over the glass and drop it into the glass.

name: Mary Pickford
ingredients: 50 ml Light Rum; 50 ml Pineapple Juice; 1 teaspoon Grenadine Syrup; 1 teaspoon Maraschino Cherry Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Marquee
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 37 1/2 ml Cranberry Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass.  Garnish with a flamed lemon zest.

name: Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 10 ml Dry Vermouth; Lemon twist
description: Chill martini glass with soda water and ice. Fill mixing glass to top with ice. Add the dry vermouth to the mixing glass, giving a small stir to coat the ice with the vermouth. Drain out glass, leaving just the coating on the ice. Add the gin to the mixing glass. Stir for 15 seconds, always making sure that the glass is full to the brim with ice. Taste. Fine strain into chilled martini glass. Zest with lemon peel and add twist unto drink.

name: Madison Avenue
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Rum; 20 ml Triple Sec; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; dash Orange Bitters; Mint Leaves; Mint Sprig
description: Add the liquids and a few mint leaves to cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass with ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Mad Monk
ingredients: 25 ml Hazelnut Liqueur; 25 ml Peppermint Schnapps; Hot Chocolate; Hot Coffee; Whipped Cream
description: Pour the liqueur into an Irish coffee glass. Fill with equal parts of hot chocolate and hot coffee. Stir well. Top with whipped cream.

name: Macbeth
ingredients: 50 ml Scotch Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao; 12 1/2 ml  Amaretto; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 1 teaspoon Sugar
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Lynchburg Lemonade
ingredients: 25 ml Tennessee Whiskey; 25 ml Triple -Sec; 25 ml Sour Mix; 100 ml Lemon-Lime Soda
description: Build over ice, stir with a bar spoon and serve in a Collins glass.

name: Lucky Lindy
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 2 spoons Runny Honey; Top -Up Lemonade
description: Add the Bourbon whiskey and honey to the mixing tin, stir until the honey resolves, add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake well, strain over lots of ice and top up with lemonade. Garnish with lemon wheel.

name: Lucid Garden
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Absinthe; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; Soda Water; Cucumber wheels
description: Muddle two cucumber wheels and two peeled kiwi wheels with the simple syrup into a double rocks glass. Fill with ice and add the absinthe.Top up with soda water. Garnish with an unpeeled kiwi wheel on rim of the glass.

name: Love Potion#9
ingredients: 25 ml  Vanilla Vodka; 12 1/2 ml White Creme de Cacao; 1/2 cup Strawberries; scoop of Vanilla Ice Cream; Strawberry Garnish
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

name: Lounge Lizard
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Dark Rum; 12 1/2 ml Amaretto; Cola
description: Pour the dark rum and amaretto into a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with cola. Stir well.

name: Lorraine
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Lillet; 25 ml Grand Marnier
description: Stir all the ingredients with ice and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Lanesborough
ingredients: 20 ml Grand Marnier; 20 ml Cranberry Juice; 20 ml Passion fruit Juice; 60 ml  Champagne; Orange Spiral Twist
description: In a mixing glass add Grand Marnier, cranberry juice and passionfruit juice. Add ice, shake vigorously and strain into a chilled Champagne flute. Top with Champagne and garnish with an orange spiral twist.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
ingredients: 15 ml Gin; 15 ml Vodka; 15 ml Tequila; 15 ml White Rum; 15 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 30 ml Gomme syrup; splash of  Cola
description: Begin by chilling highball glass with soda water and ice. Add all ingredients (except the cola) into a mixing tin. Add ice to tin and shake for 10 seconds. Add fresh ice to highball glass and add splash of cola. Strain the ingredients into glass. Add lemon slice and straw.

name: LadyBoy
ingredients: 35 ml Irish Cream liqueur; 35 ml Brandy; Cinnamon Stick
description: Build ingredients into a short tumbler glass with ice. Stir lightly and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: La Vie En Rouge
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Grand Marnier; 37 1/2 ml Cranberry Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; Fresh Rosemary Needles
description: In a tall mixing glass, muddle 10-12 rosemary needles lightly with simple syrup. Add remaining ingredients then add ice and shake vigorously. Strain over fresh ice into a rocks glass with ice. Garnish with a rosemary sprig.

name: La Pomme
ingredients: 20 ml Melon Liqueur; 30 ml Brandy; splash Lemon Juice; top-up of Cider; Apple Slice
description: Pour all  ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and gently stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with apple slice.

name: La Coloniale
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 37 1/2 ml Ginger Liqueur; cucumber  slice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cucumber slice.

name: La Cranne Creuse
ingredients: 50 ml Calvados; 12 1/2 ml Absinthe; 12 1/2 ml Punt e Mes; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters; Orange Twist
description: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir until well chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with an orange twist.

name: La Habanna
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 25 ml  Apricot Brandy; juice of 1/2 a Lime; Lime Wedge
description: Pour the gin and apricot brandy into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Add a few drops of lime juice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: La Boheme
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml  Black Raspberry Liqueur; 37 1/2 ml Cranberry Juice;
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Kyoto Sour
ingredients: 60 ml Sake; 2 slices Fresh Grapefruit; 10 ml Lemon Juice; 15 ml Agave Nectar; 2 dashes Green Tabasco; Mint Sprig
description: Muddle grapefruit and Tabasco in a cocktail shaker. Add sake, lemon juice and agave nectar. Shake vigorously. Strain into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice and garnish with a mint sprig.

name: Katinka
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml  Apricot Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; Mint Sprig
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with mint sprig.

name: Kamikaze
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Lemon Juice
description: Shake all ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lime slice.

name: Just Peachy Sangria
ingredients: 1 Bottle White Wine; 1/2 cup Peach Schnapps; 1/2 cup Sugar; 2 Sliced Peaches; 1 Sliced Orange; 1/2 Mango Sliced
description: Pour wine and schnapps in the pitcher and add sliced peach, orange, and mango. Next add sugar and stir gently. Chill mixture for at least one hour. Add ginger ale or club soda just before serving.

name: Joker
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 50 ml Triple Sec; 50 ml Advocaat; 150 ml Fizzy Orange Juice; top-up of Lemonade
description: Mix all ingredients with lots of ice in a mixing glass and stir for 20 seconds. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Jump Up and Kiss Me
ingredients: 25 ml Galliano; 25 ml Rum; 5 ml Apricot Brandy; 25 ml Pineapple Juice; 5 ml Lemon Juice; 1 Egg White
description: Shake all ingredients with ice in cocktail shaker. Fill tall glass with ice, pour and serve.

name: Juan Collins
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 25 ml  Freshley Squeezed Lemon Juice; drizzle of Sugar Syrup; splash of Soda Water
description: Mix the tequila, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water. Garnish with maraschino cherry and serve in a Collins glass.

name: Johnny Weissmuller
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 25 ml Light Rum; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 1 tablespoon Powdered Sugar; dash of Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Jock Collins
ingredients: 50 ml Scotch Whiskey; 25 ml Lemon Juice; drizzle of Sugar Syrup; splash of Soda Water; maraschino cherry
description: Mix the Scotch whisky, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice, top up with soda water. Garnish with maraschino cherry and serve in a tall glass.

name: Jersey Tea
ingredients: 15 ml Gin; 15 ml Vodka; 15 ml Tequila; 15 ml White Rum; 15 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml  Lemon Juice; 30 ml Gomme syrup; 25 ml Jagermeister
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir with bar spoon for 20 seconds, garnish with lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: John Collins
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; splash of Soda Water; Maraschino Cherry
description: Mix the Bourbon, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a Boston shaker with ice. Single strain into a high ball glass filled with ice. Top up with soda water. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Jersey Flashlight
ingredients: 50 ml Apple Whisky; dash of Angostura Bitters; 2 tablespoons Sugar; Lemon Peel; Hot Water to fill
description: Pour the ingredients into a heat resistant mug and fill with water. Ignite the mixture with a match and stir while flaming. Extinguish by covering the cup with another heat resistant mug. Garnish with a lemon peel.

name: Irish Ice
ingredients: 25 ml Mint Chocolate Irish Cream Liqueur; 25 ml Iced Coffee; 1 tablespoon Coffee; 2 scoops Coffee Ice Cream; Whipped Cream; Mint Sprig
description: Add Irish cream liqueur, iced coffee and coffee ice cream to a blender. Blend on high with chipped ice until smooth. Top with espresso, a mint sprig and whipped cream.

name: Irish Gold
ingredients: 50 ml Irish Whiskey;  50 ml Ginger Ale; 12 1/2 ml Peach Schnapps; splash of Orange Juice; Lime Wheel
description: Build the whiskey, schnapps and juice in a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Irish Hammer
ingredients: 10 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 10 ml Jagermeister; 10 ml Irish Cream Liqueur
description: Pour the ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass.

name: Irish Frog
ingredients: 20 ml Melon Liqueur; 20 ml Irish Cream Liqueur
description: Pour the melon liqueur into a shot glass. Slowly float the Irish cream liqueur on top.

name: Irish Flag
ingredients: 10 ml Green Crème de Menthe; 10 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 10 ml Grand Marnier
