description: Pour the crème de menthe into shot glass. Float the Irish cream liqueur on top of the crème de menthe. Float the Grand Marnier on top of the Irish cream liqueur.

name: Irish Eyes
ingredients: 25 ml Irish Whiskey; 5 ml Green Creme de Menthe; 50 ml Cream; Maraschino Cherry
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry.

name: Irish Coffee Drop
ingredients: 25 ml Espresso Vodka; 25 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; Stout Beer
description: Pour the Irish cream liqueur into a shot glass. Pour the vodka on top. Pour the stout into a pint glass 3/4 full and let settle. Drop the shot glass into the stout and chug.

name: Honolulu
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Pineapple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Orange Juice; 5 ml Lemon Juice; 5 ml Simple Syrup; dash of Angostura Bitters; Lemon Spiral; Sugar
description: Rim a cocktail glass with sugar. Pour the ingredients into a chilled cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Honeymoon Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Applejack; 12 1/2 ml Benedictine; 12 1/2 ml Orange Curacao; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; Lemon Peel
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel.

name: Honey Deuce
ingredients: 30 ml Premium Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Chambord; Freshly Squeezed Lemonade; Honeydew Melon Balls
description: Fill chilled highball glass with crushed ice and add premium vodka.Top with lemonade to just below the rim and then add Cambord. Garnish with honeydew melon balls.

name: Honey Dew Me
ingredients: 20 ml Honey Liqueur; 10 ml Lemon Liqueur; Orange Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 -1 5 seconds. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Hollywood
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; Pineapple Juice; Pineapple Chunk
description: Pour the vodka and black raspberry liqueur into a Collins glass filled with ice. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple chunk.

name: Holiday Hopper
ingredients: 25 ml Melon Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Green Creme de Menthe; 12 1/2 ml White Creme de Cacao; 50 ml Half and Half; Mint Leaves; Raspberry
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with mint leaves and raspberry.

name: Highland Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml  Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Grand Marnier; 12 1/2 ml Drambuie; 5 ml Sweet and Sour Mix; Lime Wedge; Salt
description: Pour all ingredients in a cocktail  shaker with ice. Shake for 10 seconds and strain into a margarita glass rimmed with salt. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Hi-Ho
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml White Port; 4 dashes Orange Bitters; Lemon Peel
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: High Voltage
ingredients: 30 ml Tequila; 15 ml Peach Liqueur; 5 ml Lime Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled highball glass.

name: Green Vesper
ingredients: 75 ml Gin; 25 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml  Absinthe; 1/8 teaspoon of Quinnine Powder
description: Shake the gin, vodka, absinthe and quinine powder in a mixing tin with plenty of cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and twist a large swatch of thin cut lemon peel over the top.

name: Green Lemonade
ingredients: 100 ml Lemonade; 50 ml Limeade; 20 ml Simple Syrup; 4 peeled Kiwi slices; Lime Slice
description: Muddle the kiwi and simple syrup in a mixing glass. Add ice, lemonade and limeade. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Green Grape Glacier
ingredients: 100 ml White Grape Juice; 100 ml Cold Sparkling Water; 12 Seedless Green Grapes
description: Freeze the grapes until hard. Combine 10 frozen grapes and grape juice in a blender and process for about 20 seconds or until smooth and thick. Pour the grape mix into a highball glass. Add the sparkling water. Stir gently. Garnish with the remaining 2 frozen grapes.

name: Green Iguana Margarita
ingredients: 25 ml Midori Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Tequila; 50 ml Sweet-and-Sour Mix; Lime Wheel
description: Mix all ingredients with ice in a shaker or blender. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Green Hornet
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Brandy; 37 1/2 ml Crème de Menthe
description: Start with a rocks glass and fill it with ice. Add brandy and green creme de menthe. Stir and serve in the original glass or strain into a chilled glass without ice.

name: Green Ghoul
ingredients: 25 ml Melon Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Yellow Chartreuse; 12 1/2 ml Ginger Liqueur; Ginger Beer; 5 Black Liquorice Strands
description: Add the first three ingredients into a mixing tin and fill with ice. Shake well. Line the inside of a wine glass with strands of black liquorice. Strain into Collins glass and fill with ginger beer.

name: Green Eyes
ingredients: 25 ml Premium Vodka; 25 ml Blue Curacao; 50 ml Orange Juice; Apple Slice
description: Fill a chilled cocktail glass with ice, layer the premium vodka and orange juice, stir slightly, and float the blue curacao on top. Garnish with apple slice.

name: Green Carnation
ingredients: 50 ml  Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Melon Liqueur; splash of Benedictine; splash of Lime Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for about 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Grasshopper
ingredients: 20 ml Crème de Menthe; 20 ml Crème de Cacao; 20 ml Cream
description: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Grateful Dead
ingredients: 15 ml Gin; 15 ml Vodka; 15 ml Tequila; 15 ml White Rum; 15 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 30 ml Gomme syrup; splash of Chambord
description: Mix all ingredients in glass over ice and stir for 15 seconds with bar spoon. Garnish with lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Good Luck Charm
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon; 20 ml Limoncello; 50 ml Lemon Sour; 5 Spearmint Leaves
description: Shake all ingredients with ice in a mixing tin until well blended. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass with a sugared rim. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Grand Orange Collins
ingredients: 50 ml Grand Marnier; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 25 ml Orange Juice; drizzle of Sugar Syrup; splash of Soda Water
description: Mix the Grand Marnier, lemon juice, orange juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice. Top up with soda water, garnish with maraschino cherry and serve.

name: Grapefruit Daiquiri
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Light Rum; 12 1/2 ml Dark Rum; 37 1/2 ml Grapefruit Juice; 20 ml  Sugar Syrup; Cherry
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with cherry.

name: Ginger Tea
ingredients: 25 ml VSOP Cognac; 50 ml Brewed Green Tea (chilled); 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; 3 Mint Leaves; 3 pieces of Ginger; Mint Leaf
description: In a mixing glass, add ginger, mint and simple syrup and muddle. Pour the Cognac and fresh tea over top and muddle a little more. Strain into an ice filled cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.

name: GingerBread Martini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Citrus Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Gingerbread Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 5 ml Simple Syrup; Lime Wedge
description: Rub the lime wedge on the rim of a frozen cocktail glass and leave the lime there for a garnish. Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into the glass.

name: Ginger Rogers
ingredients: 25 ml Dry Gin; 25 ml Dry Vermouth; 25 ml Apricot Brandy; 4 dashes of Lemon Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Ginger Lime Long-Tail
ingredients: 50 ml Mekhong; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; Ginger Beer; dash of Angostura Bitters; 3 Lime Wheels
description: Pour Mekhong and lime juice into a Collins glass. Add ice and lime wheels. Cover with a shaker tin and shake briefly.Top off with ginger beer and add bitters. Serve with a straw.

name: Ginger Martini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 37 1/2 ml Ginger Liqueur; squeeze of Lemon Juice; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Ginger Bush
ingredients: 60 ml Bourbon; Ginger Beer; Wedge of Lime
description: Pour the rum into a glass over ice. Pour the ginger beer over it. Squeeze in the lime wedge and drop it in.

name: Gin Sling
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 25 ml  Sweet Vermouth; 20 ml Lemon Juice; 25 ml Simple Syrup ; dash Angostura Bitters; Soda Water; Lemon Spiral
description: Pour the ingredients (except soda) into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake into a chilled Collins glass. Top up with soda. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: Gin Sour
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; Splash Egg-White
description: Begin by chilling glass with ice and soda water. Add the gin, simple syrup, lemon juice and egg white to a mixing tin and dry shake for 10 seconds. Add ice to the mixing tin and shake for a further 10 seconds. Give a quick taste. Fill glass with ice and strain drink into glass. Squeeze some lemon zest over drink and add lemon twist into glass.

name: Gin Berry
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 37 1/2 ml Cranberry Juice; 12 1/2 ml  Lime Juice
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, and fill with ice. Shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Gin Fizz
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; Top-Up Soda Water; Lemon Wedge
description: Mix ingredients with ice in cocktail shaker. Strain into a highball glass and top up with soda water. Garnish with lemon wedge.

name: Gin Rickey
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; Soda Water; Lime wedge
description: Add all ingredients into Boston mixing tin, except the soda water. Fill the tin with ice and shake for about 10 seconds. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice and top up with soda water. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: French Connection
ingredients: 25 ml Cognac; 25 ml Amaretto
description: Pour ingredients into a snifter glass with ice cubes. Stir gently with a bar spoon.

name: Gin &  Sin
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 25 ml Orange Juice; dash of Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Add a dash of grenadine syrup. Shake well for 10 -15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Gin & Tonic
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; Tonic Water; 2 Lime wedges
description: Add gin into highball glass and top up with ice. Squeeze and add in 2 lime wedges. Top up with tonic water.

name: French 75
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Caorunn Gin; splash Champagne; 10 ml Sugar Syrup; 15 ml Lemon Juice
description: Chill Champagne flute with soda water. Add sugar syrup, gin and lemon juice into a mixing tin. Top up with ice and then shake for 10 seconds. Fine strain contents of mixing tin into Champagne flute and top up with Champagne.

name: Freddy Fudpucker
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Galliano; 50 ml Tequila; 100 ml Orange Juice
description: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a teaspoon, float the Galliano on top of the drink.

name: Fourth of July
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao;12 1/2 ml Grenadine Syrup
description: Pour the grenadine syrup into a shot glass. Float vodka on top of the grenadine syrup. Float blue curacao on top of the vodka.

name: Four Men in a Boat
ingredients: 5 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 5 ml Scotch Whiskey; 5 ml Tennessee Whiskey; 5 ml Irish Whiskey; 1 part Grand Mariner
description: Mix the five spirits together in a shot glass and down immediately.

name: Four Horsemen Go Hunting
ingredients: 5 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 5 ml Scotch Whiskey; 5 ml Tennessee Whiskey; 5 ml Irish Whiskey; 5 ml Wild Turkey
description: Mix the five spirits together in a shot glass and down immediately.

name: Four Horsemen and Hell Follows
ingredients: 5 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 5 ml Scotch Whiskey; 5 ml Tennessee Whiskey; 5 ml Irish Whiskey; 5 ml Everclear
description: Mix the five spirits together in a shot glass and down immediately.

name: Four Horsemen
ingredients: 10 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 10 ml Scotch Whiskey; 10 ml Tennessee Whiskey; 10 ml Irish Whiskey
description: Mix the four spirits together in a shot glass and down immediately.

name: Foghorn
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; Ginger Ale; Lime wedge
description: Pour the gin and lime juice into an ice filled Old-Fashioned glass. Stir well.Top with ginger ale. Stir gently. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Flossy Aussie
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; 50 ml Kiwi Juice; 50 ml Bitter Lemon Soda; 3 Kumquats halved ; 1/4 Kiwi diced with skin on; Skewer of Kiwi and Kumquats
description: Muddle kumquats, kiwi, lime juice and simple syrup in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add kiwi juice and shake with ice.Strain into a martini glass and top with bitter lemon soda. Garnish with a fruit skewer on the rim of the glass.

name: Floridita Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 37 1/2 ml Grapefruit Juice; 37 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Cranberry Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 5 ml Lime Cordial; Lime Wedge
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thorughly, strain into a chilled coupette glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Florida Sunrise
ingredients: 45 ml Tequila; 45 ml Orange Juice; 45 ml Pineapple Juice; 15 ml Grenadine Syrup; Orange Slice
description: Pour the tequila and orange juice and pineapple juice into cocktail glass over ice. Add the grenadine syrup, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish with orange slice and serve.

name: Floradora
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 25 ml Framboise Liqueur; 25 ml Lime Juice;  Ginger Ale; Lime Wedge
description: Pour the gin, framboise liqueur and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Emerald Isle
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 1 teaspoon Crème de Menthe; 2 dashes Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Electric Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao; 12 1/2 ml Sweet-And- Sour Mix
description: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with cracked ice. Shake vigourously and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Embassy
ingredients: 20 ml Brandy; 20 ml Rum; 20 ml Triple Sec; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; dash Angostgura Bitters; Lime Wedge
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Electric Iced Tea
ingredients: 15 ml Gin; 15 ml Vodka; 15 ml Tequila; 15 ml White Rum; 15 ml Blue Curacao; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 30 ml Gomme syrup; splash of Lemon-Lime Soda
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir, garnish with lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Elderflower Martini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Apple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 5 ml Elderflower Cordial
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon zest twist.

name: Elderflower Cocktail
ingredients: 75 ml Champagne; 50 ml Elderflower Liqueur; Soda Water; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the liqueur and Champagne over ice in a chilled Collins glass. Top up with soda water. Stir well. Garnish with lemon twist.

name: El Diablo
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Crème de Cassis; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; Ginger Beer
description: Pour the tequila, cassis, and lime juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with ginger beer.

name: Eden
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Triple Sec; 5 ml Elderflower Cordial; 37 1/2 ml Apple Juice; Top-Up Tonic Water
description: Add the first 4 ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly and strain over lots of ice. Top up with tonic water.

name: El Presidente
ingredients: 50 ml Aged Rum; 12 1/2 ml Orange Liqueur; 10 ml Dry Vermouth; splash Grenadine; Orange Peel
description: Begin by chilling coupe glass with ice and soda. Add ice to mixing glass and add all ingredients. Stir sown the drink for 20 seconds, using a bar spoon. When mixing ensure the glass is kept full to the brim with ice. Strain the drink into the chilled coupe glass and serve straight up. Garnish with orange peel twist.

name: Don Pedro
ingredients: 25 ml Whiskey; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur;1 cup Vanilla Ice Cream; Cream
description: Combine all ingredients together in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and serve.

name: Dolomint
ingredients: 25 ml Gin; 25 ml Galliano; 25 ml Lime Juice; top-up Ginger Ale; fresh Mint Leaves; Mint Sprig
description: Pour the gin, Galliano and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale. Rub a mint leaf around the rim of the glass. Garnish with sprig of fresh mint.

name: Distracted
ingredients: 2 ounces Bourbon Whiskey; 20 ml Chambord; 12 1/2 ml Cranberry Juice; dash of lemon bitters
description: Build the ingredients in a cocktail glass over 2 ice cubes. Add a few dashes of lemon bitters and serve.

name: Dirty Martini
ingredients: 65 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; Olive Brine to taste; Olive garnish
description: Pour the gin and dry vermouth into a mixing glass. Slowly add the olive brine. Stir. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with the olive.

name: Dirty Mother
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Brandy; 12 /2 ml Coffee Liqueur
description: Fill the rocks glass with ice. Add the brandy and the coffee liqueur and gently stir. Serve.

name: Diamond Fizz
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 1 teaspoon Sugar; chilled Champagne
description: Pour the gin, lemon juice and sugar into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with Champagne.

name: Devil Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Brandy; 12 1/2 ml White Crème de Menthe; pinch of Cayenne Pepper
description: Pour the brandy and white crème de menthe into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a pinch of Cayenne pepper on top.

name: Detropolitan
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 5 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 37 1/2 ml  Cranberry Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with flamed orange zest.

name: Devil`s Punch
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 25 ml Orange Liqueur; 25 ml Limoncello; 25 ml  Sour Mix; dash of Orange Juice
description: Pour all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 20 seconds. Strain into a highball glass.

name: Desert Cooler
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 20 ml Cherry Brandy; 37 1/2 ml Orange Juice; Top-Up Ginger Beer
description: Add the first 3 ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain over lots of ice and top-up with ginger beer. Garnish with a orange slice.

name: Derby Daiquiri
ingredients: 50 ml Light Rum; 20 ml Orange Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 5 ml Sugar Syrup
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Delilah
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 20 ml Triple Sec; 20 ml Lemon Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Crantini
ingredients: 80 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Cranberry Liqueur; Fresh Cranberries
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.Garnish by dropping cranberries in the glass.

name: Cranberry Spritzer
ingredients: 50 ml Canadian Whiskey; 25 ml Cranberry Juice; top-up of Soda Water; Lime Wedge
description: Add whiskey and cranberry juice in a Collins glass. Add ice, fill with soda water and garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Cossack
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml  Brandy; 1/2 cup of Simple Syrup; Lime Juice;
description: Mix ingredients gently in a shaker with ice for 10 – 15 seconds. Pour into a chilled martini glass.

name: Cran Daddy Shandy
ingredients: 50 ml Fresh Lemonade; 25 ml White Cranberry Juice; 25 ml Ginger Beer
description: Pour fresh squeezed lemonade and white cranberry juice into an ice-filled, tall glass. Top with ginger beer.

name: Country Breeze
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 100 ml  Apple Juice; Berries
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly for 10 – 15 seconds and strain into a Collins glass. Garnish with mixed berries.

name: Cosmocello
ingredients: 40 ml Vodka Citron; 15ml Triple Sec; 15ml Limoncello; 30ml Cranberry Juice; Lime Wedge
description: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Corzo La Futura
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Silver Tequila; 20 ml Ginger Liqueur; 20 ml Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Lime juice; 12 1/2 ml  Agave Nectar; Crystalized Ginger; Lemon Peel
description: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with slice of crystalized ginger and lemon peel.

name: Cosmopolitan
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Citrus Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 30 ml Cranberry Juice; 1/2 squeezed lemon; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup
description: Chill coupe glass with soda water. Add all ingredients to mixing tin with ice. Shake for 10 to 15 seconds. Fine strain into the chilled coupe glass. Flame an orange peel and place in drink as garnish.

name: Corpse Reviver #2
ingredients: 20 ml  Gin; 20 ml Triple Sec; 20 ml Lillet Blanc; 1 dash Absinthe; 20 ml Lemon Juice
description: Shake ingredients together with ice in a mixing tin for 10 -15 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Corpse Reviver
ingredients: 50 ml Cognac; 25 ml Calvados; 25 ml Sweet Vermouth
description: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

name: Coronation
ingredients: 20 ml Dry Vermouth; 20 ml Sweet Vermouth; 20 ml  Apple Brandy; Apricot Brandy
description: Pour the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well with a bar spoon. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Corn N `Oil
ingredients: 10 ml Cruzan Blackstrap Rum; 10 ml Falernum; Lime Wedge
description: Pour the rum and falernum into a glass over ice and stir well. Squeeze in the lime wedge and drop it in.

name: Coppertone
ingredients: 50 ml Coconut Rum; 100ml Cherry Cola; Lime Wedge
description: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Cool Colada
ingredients: 25 ml Pineapple Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Coconut Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Pineapple Juice
description: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and pour into a 50 ml shot glass.

name: Christmas Jones
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 125 ml Pineapple Juice; Lemon-Lime Soda; 4 Strawberries; Mint Sprigs
description: In a blender, whizz the vodka, strawberries, sugar and pineapple juice together .Pour the mix equally into 2 highball glasses. Top up with lemon-lime soda and garnish with mint sprig.

name: Choking Hazard
ingredients: 75 ml Whiskey; splash Olive Juice; dash Dry Vermouth; 3 Cheese & Almond Stuffed Olives
description: In the cocktail shaker, combine; whiskey, olive juice and dry vermouth. Fill shaker with some ice and shake for one minute. Strain in a chilled martini glass and garnish with the olive skewers.

name: Chocolate Martini
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 37 1/2 ml White Crème de Cacao; Hershey Hug; Powdered Cocoa
description: Pour the ingredients into a shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with cocoa.

name: Chocolate Kiss
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Peppermint Schnapps; 12 1/2 ml Coffee Liqueur; Hot Chocolate; Whipped Cream
description: Pour the liqueurs into an Irish coffee glass. Fill with hot chocolate. Stir well. Top with whipped cream.

name: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: 20 ml Citrus Vodka; 20 ml Hazelnut Liqueur; Sugar Coated Lemon
description: Fill a mixing glass with ice and add the liquors. Cover the glass with another and shake. Strain into a shot glass. Serve with a sugar coated lemon.

name: Chocolate and Orange Martini
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml White Crème de Cacao; dash of Triple Sec; Chocolate Chunks
description: Dip rim of cocktail glass into melted chocolate and allow to set. Shake the ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into the prepared cocktail glass.

name: Chicago Fizz
ingredients: 25 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml Ruby Port; 25 ml Lemon juice; 1/2 teaspoon Sugar; Soda Water
description: Pour all ingredients , except the soda water, into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled Collins glass. Top up with soda water.

name: Chi-Chi
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao; 12 1/2 ml Coconut Cream; 1/2 cup fresh Pineapple; scoop of Vanilla Ice-Cream; Pineapple Chunk
description: Pour all ingredients into blender with 1/2 cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into chilled margarita glass and garnish with pineapple.

name: Chicago Cocktail
ingredients: 25 ml  Brandy; 25 ml Triple-Sec; 1 dash Angostura Bitters; dash of Champagne; Caster Sugar; Egg-White
description: Prepare a frosted rim glass with egg white and sugar. Shake the rest of the ingredients (except the Champagne) with ice until frosted. Strain into prepared glass and top up with Champagne.

name: Cherubs Cup
ingredients: 25 ml Elderflower Liqueur; 50 ml Vodka; 20 ml Lemon Juice; 5 ml Simple Syrup; 5 ml Muddled Strawberry; top-up Brut Rose Sparkling Wine; Strawberry
description: Shake and strain over ice in a Collins glass. Top up with Brut rose sparkling wine. Garnish with strawberry.

name: Cherry Hooker
ingredients: 50 ml Cherry Brandy; Orange Juice; Lime Wedge
description: Pour the cherry brandy into an ice- filled highball glass. Top up with orange juice. Stir with bar spoon. Garnish with the lime wedge.

name: Cape Cod
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 50 ml Cranberry Juice; Lime Wedge
description: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Cardinal Cocktail
ingredients: 25 ml Crème de Cassis; Red Wine
description: Pour the crème de cassis into a wine glass filled with ice. Fill with red wine.

name: Cantarito
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Orange Juice; 12 1/2 ml  Lemon Juice; 10 ml Grapefruit Soda; Lemon; Lime & Orange wedges; Salt
description: Rim a Collins glass with salt. Fill the glass with ice and add the tequila and juices.Top it off with grapefruit soda. Garnish with fruit wedges.

name: Candy Corn
ingredients: 10 ml Galliano; 10 ml Orange Curacao; 10 ml Cream
description: Pour the Galliano into a shot glass, float the orange curacao on top, float the cream on top.

name: Campari Cocktail
ingredients: 25 ml Campari; 20 ml Vodka; 1 dash Angostura Bitters; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Campari Cosmo
ingredients: 50 ml Citrus Vodka; 25 ml Campari; 25 ml Orange Juice; splash of Triple Sec; Orange Peel
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Calimocho
ingredients: 50 ml  Red Wine; 50 ml Cola
description: Stir ingredients together over plenty of ice in a highball glass.

name: California Iced Tea
ingredients: 15 ml Gin; 15 ml Vodka; 15 ml Tequila; 15 ml  White Rum; 15 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 30 ml Gomme syrup; splash of Orange Juice
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir, garnish with lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Caju  Amigo
ingredients: 15 ml Cachaca; 15 ml Cashew Juice
description: Both ingredients are mixed in a shot glass and served straight.

name: Caipivodka
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 1/2 Lime; 2 teaspoons Refined Sugar; Lemon Slice
description: Place lime and sugar into Old-Fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with crushed ice and add the vodka.

name: Brown University
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 37 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 2 dashes Orange Bitters
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Brown Mary
ingredients: 45 ml Whiskey; 90 ml Tomato Juice;15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco  Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Brown Derby
ingredients: 50 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 25 ml Grapefruit Juice; 5 ml Runny Honey; Grapefruit Zest
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly, strain into a martini glass and garnish with grapefruit zest.

name: Brown Russian
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 20 ml Coffee Liqueur; splash of Ginger Ale
description: Pour the ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently and top up with ginger ale.

name: Brotherly Love
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gin; 20 ml Licor 43; 20 ml Simple Syrup; 100 ml Steamed Milk; Nutmeg
description: Pour the gin, Licor 43 and simple syrup into an Irish coffee glass. Stir well. Add steamed milk. Garnish with nutmeg.

name: Broad Stripes and Bright Stars
ingredients: 5 ml Absinthe; 25 ml  Blueberry Vodka; 5 ml Simple Syrup; splash of Lemon Juice; drizzle of Raspberry Liqueur; Ginger Beer; Blueberries
description: Muddle fresh blueberries and add syrup, absinthe, juice and vodka. Add ice and shake and pour into highball glass. Drizzle liqueur and top with ginger beer. Garnish with one sugar cube.

name: Broken Heart Martini
ingredients: 65 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Crème de Cacao; 1 tablespoon Cocoa Powder; 1 teaspoon Sugar; Orange Slice
description: Rim a cocktail glass with cocoa powder. Stir together the vodka, sugar, and crème de cacao with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into the prepared cocktail glass and garnish with orange slice.

name: Bronx
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Sweet Red Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 25 ml Fresh Orange Juice; Orange Zest Twist; Maraschino Cherry
description: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir with a bar spoon to chill and dilute the drink. Strain into a cocktail glass. Zest the drink and glass with an orange twist and drop in the glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Breath of Fresh Air
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 50 ml Peppermint Liqueur; Mint Leaf
description: Place the mint leaf at the bottom of the glass. Add the vodka and then the liqueur.

name: Breakfast Martini
ingredients: 45 ml Gin; 20 ml Triple Sec; 20 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 1 heaped spoon of Orange Marmalade; flamed lemon zest
description: Add the marmalade and the gin to the mixing tin. Stir until the marmalade dissolves, add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake well and fine strain over ice into a martini glass. Garnish with a flamed lemon zest.

name: Brazilian Sangria
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml  Absinthe; 30 ml Cachaca; 12 1/2 ml Spainish Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Orange Liqueur; 25 ml Red Wine; Strawberry; Lime; Orange ; Kiwi ; Passionfruit
description: In a cocktail shaker thoroughly muddle the fruit with absinthe, cachaca, brandy, and orange liqueur . Pour into a wine glass. Float red wine on top of cocktail. Stir and serve.

name: Brass Monkey
ingredients: 25 ml Dark Rum; 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Orange Juice
description: Stir ingredients together and serve over ice in a highball glass.

name: Brave Bull
ingredients: 50 ml Blanco Tequila; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur
description: Pour tequila into Old-Fashioned glass with ice cubes. Add Kahlua. Swirl the glass gently a few times to lightly mix the ingredients before serving.

name: Blueberry Collins
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Vanilla Sugar Syrup; 19 Blueberries; Top-Up Soda water
description: Add the blueberries to the mixing tin and muddle with gin. Add the lemon juice, sugar syrup and lots of ice. Shake well, fine strain over ice and top up with Soda Water. Garnish with 3 blueberries.

name: Blue Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 25 ml Blue Curacao; 25 ml Lime Juice; Salt
description: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime juice. Dip rim in coarse salt. Shake tequila, blue curacao, and lime juice with ice in a cocktail shaker, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

name: Blue Lagoon Margarita
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Tequila; 20 ml Blue Curacao; 12 1/2 ml Pineapple Juice; splash of Lemon-Lime Soda; splash of Lime Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled maragarita glass.

name: Blue Lagoon
ingredients: 25 ml Vodka; 25 ml Blue Curacao; 75 ml Lemonade; Lemon Slice
description: Pour all ingredents in a shaker with ice, shake well & strain into ice-filled highball glass, garnish with lemon slice and serve.

name: Blue Hawaiian
ingredients: 20 ml Light Rum; 20 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao; 75 ml Unsweetened Pineapple Juice; 25 ml Sweet and Sour Mix
description: Combine all ingredients with ice, stir or shake, then pour into a hurricane glass with the ice. For garnish score pineapple slice with a knife and insert onto rim of glass.

name: Blue Eyed Blonde
ingredients: 10 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 10 ml White Crème de Cacao; 10 ml Blue Curacao
description: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain straight into shooter glass.

name: Blue Cosmopolitan
ingredients: 40 ml Citron Vodka; 15 ml Blue Curacao; 15 ml Lime Juice; 30 ml White Cranberry Juice; Lime Wedge
description: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Blue Carnation
ingredients: 12 1/2 ml White Crème de Cacao; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao; 50 ml Cream
description: Shake the ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Blue Blazer
ingredients: 50 ml Whiskey; 50 ml Hot Water; 2 teaspoons Demerara Sugar; Lemon Zest
description: Fill 2 metal pint mugs with boiling water and allow to stand until well warm. Discard the hot water.Pour 50 ml of whisky into one of the metal pint mugs. Into the second metal mug pour 50 ml of boiling water. Add 2 teaspoons of demerara sugar. The warmth of the mug will result in the whisky giving off alcoholic fumes. Using a lighter or match, carefully ignite the whisky. Pour the flaming whisky from one mug into the other.Immediately pour the water and whisky back into the empty mug. Repreat this process 5-6 times until sugar, whisky and water are all well mixed. Garnish with a twist of lemon zest.

name: Blue Bayou
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Blue Curacao; 1/2 cup fresh Pineapple; 50 ml Grapefruit Juice;Pineapple Slice
description: Pour the ingredients into a blender with a cup of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with the pineapple.

name: Blowjob
ingredients: 7 1/2 ml Irish Cream Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Amaretto; Whipped Cream
description: Pour the amaretto into your shot glass.  Top the amaretto with the coffee liqueur, allowing the liqueurs to combine.  Top the shot with whipped cream.

name: Bloody Scotsman
ingredients: 45 ml Scotch Whiskey; 90 ml Tomato Juice; 15 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Tabasco Sauce; 2 dashes Worcestershire Sauce; 1 dash Salt; 1 dash Pepper; Celery Stalk
description: Add dashes of Worcestershire Sauce, Tabasco, salt and pepper into highball glass, then pour all ingredients into highball with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with celery stalk.

name: Bloodhound
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Dry Vermouth; 25 ml Sweet Vermouth; Strawberry Coulis; Strawberry
description: Shake the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Serve over crushed ice in a cocktail glass with strawberry coulis and strawberries garnish.

name: Blood Orange Sazerac
ingredients: 75 ml Rye Whiskey; 20 ml Simple Syrup; 4 dashes Orange Bitters; Blood Orange Liqueur; Orange Twist
description: Chill an Old-Fashioned glass by filling with ice and letting it sit whilst preparing the rest of the drink. In a separate mixing glass, muddle the simple syrup and orange bitters together. Add the rye whiskey to the bitters mixture and stir. Discard the ice in the chilled glass and rinse it with blood orange liqueur by pouring a small amount into the glass , swirling it around and discarding the liquid. Strain the whisky mixture from the mixing glass into the Old-Fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Blood Martini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Citrus Vodka; 25 ml Ginger Liqueur; 25 ml Dark Grape Juice; 12 1/2 ml Blackberry Syrup; Blackberries; Raspberries
description: Combine citrus vodka, ginger liqueur, dark grape juice, and blackberry syrup in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously for 10 – 15 seconds and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with blackberry and raspberry.

name: Blind Russian
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 20 ml Coffee Liqueur; 30 ml Irish Cream Liqueur
description: Pour coffee liqueur and vodka into an Old-Fashioned glass filled with ice. Float Irish cream liqueur on top and stir slowly.

name: Blind Pilot
ingredients: 25 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 25 ml Sweet Vermouth; 25 ml Galliano
description: In a mixing glass add all the ingredients. Add ice. Stir vigorously for 30 seconds.Strain into a stemmed cocktail glass.

name: Black Widow
ingredients: 50 ml Blavod Black Vodka; 75 ml Cranberry Juice
description: Pour the cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Float the Blavod black vodka on top.

name: Blackberry Mule
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 20 ml Crème de Mure; 25 ml Lime Juice; Top-Up Ginger Beer; 6 Blackberries; Aromatic Bitters
description: Add 5 blackberries and lime juice into mixing glass. Using a muddler press down the blackberries. Add vodka, creme de mure and dash of aromatic bitters. Add cubed ice and stir with a bar spoon, making sure to get to bottom of glass. Top up with ginger beer and give another stir. Top up with cubed ice, add a straw and garnish with blackberry.

name: Black Stripe
ingredients: 50 ml Dark Rum; 1 teaspoon Honey; Hot Water; Lemon Twist; Cinnamon Stick
description: Pour the dark rum and honey into an Irish coffee glass. Twist a lemon twist over the glass and drop it into the glass. Fill the glass with hot water. Garnish with cinnamon stick.

name: Black Samurai
ingredients: 15 ml Sake; 15 ml Soy Sauce
description: Mix ingredients in a shot glass and serve.

name: Black Velvet
ingredients: 1/2 Champagne Flute with Stout Beer; 1/2 Champagne Flute with Champagne
description: Fill a tall Champagne flute halfway with chilled stout beer and float the Champagne on top of the stout. The effect is best achieved by pouring over a spoon turned upside down over the top of the glass, so that the liquid runs gently down the sides rather than splashing into the lower layer and mixing with it.

name: Biltmore
ingredients: 50 ml  Gin; 25 ml Sweet Vermouth; dash of Maraschino Liqueur; 1 piece of Pineapple; Hazelnut soaked in Maraschino Liqueur
description: Soak a hazelnut in maraschino liqueuer for at least 2 hours. Muddle the pineapple in a mixing glass. Add the gin, vermouth and maraschino and fill with ice. Sir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Strain the hazelnut from the liqueur and drop in glass for a garnish.

name: Black Rose
ingredients: 20 ml Tequila Rose; 20 ml Blavod Black Vodka
description: Pour the tequila rose into a shot glass. Float the vodka on top.

name: Bijou
ingredients: 45 ml Gin; 15 ml Green Chartreuse; 15 ml Sweet Vermouth; 1 dash Orange Bitters;
description: Stir ingredients in mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Black Russian
ingredients: 45 ml Vodka; 25 ml Coffee Liqueur
description: Add vodka and coffee liqueur to rocks glass. Fill glass with ice. Stir for 5 seconds with bar spoon. Top up with ice and serve.

name: Big Brew
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; Slice of Fresh Ginger; Ginger Beer; Mint Leaf
description: Shake the gin, lime juice and ginger with ice. Pour into a pint glass, add extra ice. Top up with ginger beer. Garnish with a mint leaf.

name: Big Bamboo
ingredients: 50 ml 151 Proof Rum; 25 ml Dark Rum; 5 ml Triple Sec; 50 ml Orange Juice;50 ml Pineapple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; dash of Bitters
description: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well for 10 -1 5 seconds and strain into shot glasses.

name: Between the Sheets
ingredients: 20 ml Brandy; 20 ml Light Rum; 20 ml Triple Sec; 12 1/2 ml  Lemon Juice; Lemon Twist
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Beverley Hills Iced Tea
ingredients: 15 ml Gin; 15 ml Vodka; 15 ml Tequila; 15 ml White Rum; 15 ml Triple Sec; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 30 ml Gomme Syrup; splash of Champagne
description: Mix ingredients in glass over ice, stir with a bar spoon, garnish with a lemon slice and serve in highball glass.

name: Best Party Sangria
ingredients: 1 bottle of Red Wine; 50 ml Gin; 4 cups Ginger Ale; splash Orange Juice; 1 can of Sliced Pineapples; 1 cup of Raspberries; 2 tablespoon of Sugar; Orange; Lime all cut into wedges.
description: Pour wine into a large pitcher and squeeze the juice wedges from the lemon, orange and lime into the wine. Toss in the fruit wedges and pineapple then add sugar, orange juice and gin. Chill overnight. Add ginger ale, berries and ice just before serving.

name: Besame
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Agavero; Passionfruit Juice; dash of Chambord; 2 Lime wedges; 6 Raspberries
description: Muddle limes and raspberries in a highball glass. Add Agavero. Top off with passion fruit juice. Add splash of Chambord. Pour this mix into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain back into the highball glass.

name: Berry Nice
ingredients: 50 ml Raspberry Vodka; 5 ml Black Raspberry Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 8 Blackberries; Top-Up Ginger Beer
description: Add the blackberries and vodka to the mixing tin and muddle well. Add the liqueur and lemon juice and lots of ice and shake well. Fine strain into Collins glass over ice and top up with ginger beer.

name: Berry Caipirinha
ingredients: 50 ml Cachaca; 20 ml Sugar Syrup; 2 quarters of lime; 4 blackberries; 4 raspberries
description: Build in the rocks glass , muddle the quartered lime with the blackberries, raspberries and sugar syrup. Add the cachaca and lots of crushed ice and churn well.

name: Berry Bliss
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Melon Liqueur; 25 ml  Vanilla Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Raspberry Vodka; splash of Pineapple Juice; splash of Soda Water; Strawberry Slices
description: Fill a punch bowl half way with ice. Add all ingredients, stir and garnish with strawberry slices.

name: Belmont Breeze
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Dry Sherry; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; 37 1/2 ml Orange Juice; splash Cranberry Juice; 5 Mint leaves; 1 Mint Sprig
description: Shake all ingredients with ice for 10 – 15 seconds in a cocktail shaker.Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh mint sprig.

name: Banana Split Martini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 20 ml Crème de Banana; 20 ml Crème de Cacao; Banana slice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well for 10 – 15 seconds. Strain into a well-chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a banana slice.

name: Bellini
ingredients: 100 ml Prosecco; 50 ml Peach puree; 4 dashes Peach Bitters
description: Add 4 dashes of peach bitters into chilled champagne flute. Add peach puree and top up with Prosecco.

name: Bananarita
ingredients: 25 ml Tequila; 37 1/2 ml Banana Liqueur; 75 ml Margarita Mix
description: Fill a highball glass halfway with ice. Pour the tequila to the rim of the ice. Add the banana liqueur as well as the margarita mix; finish by adding the garnish of a lime slice.

name: Batida
ingredients: 50 ml Cachaca; 25 ml Fruit Juice; 1 teaspoon Sugar
description: Mix ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker for 10 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Basil-ica
ingredients: 50 ml Plymouth Gin; 12 1/2 ml Elderflower Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; 4 large Basil leaves; dash of Orange Bitters; dash of Peychards Bitters; Orange twist
description: Muddle basil with the lemon juice and simple syrup at the bottom of a mixing glass. Add gin, elderflower liqueur and the bitters. Add ice and cap the mixing glass with a Boston shaker. Shake for 10 seconds then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. To garnish, roll up the basil leaf and wrap the orange twist around and place inside the glass.

name: Barnum Cocktail
ingredients: 50 ml Gin; 25 ml Apricot Brandy; 12 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 2 dashes Old Fashioned Bitters
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin, add lots of ice, shake thoroughly and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with lemon zest twist.

name: Baby Guinness
ingredients: 75 ml Coffee Liqueur; 25 ml Irish Cream Liqueur
description: Float Irish cream on top of coffee liqueur in a shot glass.

name: Banshee
ingredients: 25 ml  White Crème de Cacao; 25 ml Crème de Banane; 25 ml Cream
description: Take your cocktail shaker and fill it half way with ice. Add white creme de cacao, creme de banane, and cream. Shake it up and strain it into a chilled cocktail glass. For a finishing touch, garnish with a slice of banana before serving.

name: Bahama Mama
ingredients: 5 ml Coffee Liqueur; 12 1/2 ml Dark Rum; 12 1/2 ml Coconut Liqueur; 5 ml 151 proof Rum; Juice of 1/2 Lemon; 100 ml Pineapple juice; Strawberry
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into a Collins glass with cracked ice. Garnish with strawberry.

name: Baja Gold
ingredients: 50 ml Tequila; 12 1/2 ml Triple Sec; 50 ml Pineapple Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; Lime Wedge
description: Chill a martini glass with ice and soda water. Add all ingredients into a mixing glass. Fill up mixing glass with cubed ice. Shake hard for 10 seconds. Double strain mixture into chilled martini glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Bajan Passion
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Gold Rum; 12 1/2 ml Apricot Brandy; 25 ml Lime Juice; 12 1/2 ml Vanilla Sugar Syrup; 12 1/2 ml Sugar Syrup; 1 Passion Fruit
description: Add all ingredients into mixing tin. Use a bar spoon to scoop out all the seeds and pulp from the passion fruit. Fill mixing tin with cubed ice and shake for 10 seconds. Fill martini glass with crushed ice. Strain the mixture into the glass. Garnish with passion fruit shell.

name: Bamboo
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 37 1/2 ml Sherry; 2 dashes Orange Bitters; 2 dashes Angostura Bitters; Olive
description: Pour the vermouth and sherry into a mixing glass filled with ice. Add the bitters. Stir well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.Twist a lemon peel over the drink to release its essence. Garnish with an olive.

name: Baltic Breeze
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Raspberry Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Apricot Brandy; 50 ml Apple Juice; 50 ml  Cranberry Juice; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice
description: Add all the ingredients to the mixing tin and add lots of ice. Shake thoroughly for 10 -1 5 seconds and strain into a Collins glass. Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Appletini
ingredients: 40 ml Vodka; 15 ml Apple Schapps; 15 ml Triple Sec; Apple Slice
description: Mix in a shaker and then pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with apple slice and serve.

name: Apricot Champagne Sangria
ingredients: 1 Bottle Champagne; 25 ml Apricot Brandy; 2 diced Apricots; 1/4 cup Sugar
description: Combine all ingredients in a pitcher and serve immediately, to prevent the Champagne bubbles from going flat. You can also serve over ice if desired.

name: Apricot Fizz
ingredients: 25 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 25 ml Apricot Brandy; 37 1/2 ml Lemon Juice; 3 dashes Old Fashioned Bitters; Top-Up Lemonade
description: Add the first 4 ingredients to the mixing tin with lots of ice. Shake thoroughly and strain over lots of ice. Top up with lemonade and garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Arizona Breeze
ingredients: 65 ml Gin; 75 ml Cranberry Juice; 50 ml Grapefruit Juice
description: Build the cocktail in a glass over lots of ice, add all of the ingredients and stir.

name: April Shower
ingredients: 25 ml Brandy; 5 ml Yellow Chartreuse; 25 ml Orange Juice
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well for 10 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: April Rain
ingredients: 50 ml Vodka; 12 1/2 ml Dry Vermouth; 12 1/2 ml Lime Juice; Lime Peel
description: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with lime peel.

name: Apricot Sour
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Bourbon Whiskey; 12 1/2 ml Apricot Brandy; 25 ml Apple Juice; 20 ml  Lemon Juice; 2 spoons Apricot Jam
description: Add the jam and the bourbon to the mixing tray and stir until the jam dissolves. Add the other ingredients and lots of ice. Shake well and strain over ice. Garnish with lemon zest twist.

name: Amaretto Sunrise
ingredients: 45 ml Amaretto; 90 ml Orange Juice; 15 ml Grenadine Syrup; Orange Slice
description: Pour the amaretto and orange juice into glass over ice. Add the grenadine syrup, which will sink to the bottom. Do not stir. Garnish and serve.

name: Apricot Martini
ingredients: 37 1/2 ml Vodka; 20ml Apricot Brandy; 25 ml Lemon Juice; 1 dash Angostura Bitters; 12 1/2 ml Simple Syrup; Lemon Zest
description: Add all ingredients into mixing glass. Fill the mixing glass to the top with cubed ice and then shake for 10 seconds. Double strain into martini glass. Garnish with lemon zest.
